Devanāgarī: पुरुत्रा चिद्धि वां नरा विह्वयन्ते मनीषिणः
pada pāṭha: puru-trā | cit | hi | vām | narā | vi-hvayante | manīṣiṇaḥ || vāghat-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam ||8.5.16||

IAST: vāghadbhir aśvinā gatam
Griffith: Moved by the priests, O Asvins, conic.
pada pāṭha: puru-trā | cit | hi | vām | narā | vi-hvayante | manīṣiṇaḥ || vāghat-bhiḥ | aśvinā | ā | gatam ||8.5.16||

IAST: janāso vṛktabarhiṣo haviṣmanto araṁkṛtaḥ
Griffith: Men who have trimmed the sacred grass, bringing oblations and prepared,
pada pāṭha: janāsaḥ | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ | haviṣmantaḥ | aram-kr̥taḥ || yuvām | havante | aśvinā ||8.5.17||

IAST: yuvāṁ havante aśvinā
Griffith: O Asvins, are invoking you.
pada pāṭha: janāsaḥ | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ | haviṣmantaḥ | aram-kr̥taḥ || yuvām | havante | aśvinā ||8.5.17||

IAST: asmākam adya vām ayaṁ stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ
Griffith: May this our hymn of praise to-day, most powerful to bring you, be,
pada pāṭha: asmākam | adya | vām | ayam | stomaḥ | vāhiṣṭhaḥ | antamaḥ || yuvābhyām | bhūtu | aśvinā ||8.5.18||

IAST: yuvābhyām bhūtv aśvinā
Griffith: O Asvins, nearest to your hearts.
pada pāṭha: asmākam | adya | vām | ayam | stomaḥ | vāhiṣṭhaḥ | antamaḥ || yuvābhyām | bhūtu | aśvinā ||8.5.18||

IAST: yo ha vām madhuno dṛtir āhito rathacarṣaṇe
Griffith: The skin filled full of savoury meath, laid in the pathway of your car-
Devanāgarī: यो ह वां मधुनो दृतिराहितो रथचर्षणे
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | ha | vām | madhunaḥ | dr̥tiḥ | ā-hitaḥ | ratha-carṣaṇe || tataḥ | pibatam | aśvinā ||8.5.19||

IAST: tataḥ pibatam aśvinā
Griffith: O Asvins, drink ye both therefrom.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | ha | vām | madhunaḥ | dr̥tiḥ | ā-hitaḥ | ratha-carṣaṇe || tataḥ | pibatam | aśvinā ||8.5.19||

IAST: tena no vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śaṁ gave
Griffith: For this, ye Lords of ample wealth, bring blessing for our herd, our kine,
Devanāgarī: तेन नो वाजिनीवसू पश्वे तोकाय शं गवे
pada pāṭha: tena | naḥ | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū | paśve | tokāya | śam | gave || vahatam | pīvarīḥ | iṣaḥ ||8.5.20||

IAST: vahatam pīvarīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: Our progeny, and plenteous food.
pada pāṭha: tena | naḥ | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū | paśve | tokāya | śam | gave || vahatam | pīvarīḥ | iṣaḥ ||8.5.20||

IAST: uta no divyā iṣa uta sindhūm̐r aharvidā
Griffith: Ye too unclose to us like doors the strengthening waters of the sky,
Devanāgarī: उत नो दिव्या इष उत सिन्धूँरहर्विदा
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | divyāḥ | iṣaḥ | uta | sindhūn | ahaḥ-vidā || apa | dvārā-iva | varṣathaḥ ||8.5.21||

IAST: apa dvāreva varṣathaḥ
Griffith: And rivers, ye who find the day.
pada pāṭha: uta | naḥ | divyāḥ | iṣaḥ | uta | sindhūn | ahaḥ-vidā || apa | dvārā-iva | varṣathaḥ ||8.5.21||

IAST: kadā vāṁ taugryo vidhat samudre jahito narā
Griffith: When did the son of' Tugra serve you, Men? Abandoned in the sea,
Devanāgarī: कदा वां तौग्र्यो विधत्समुद्रे जहितो नरा
pada pāṭha: kadā | vām | taugryaḥ | vidhat | samudre | jahitaḥ | narā || yat | vām | rathaḥ | vi-bhiḥ | patāt ||8.5.22||

IAST: yad vāṁ ratho vibhiṣ patāt
Griffith: That with winged steeds your car might fly.
pada pāṭha: kadā | vām | taugryaḥ | vidhat | samudre | jahitaḥ | narā || yat | vām | rathaḥ | vi-bhiḥ | patāt ||8.5.22||

IAST: yuvaṁ kaṇvāya nāsatyā ṛpiriptāya harmye
Griffith: Ye, O Nasatyas, ministered to Kanva with repeated aid,
pada pāṭha: yuvam | kaṇvāya | nāsatyā | api-riptāya | harmye || śaśvat | ūtīḥ | daśasyathaḥ ||8.5.23||

IAST: śaśvad ūtīr daśasyathaḥ
Griffith: When cast into the heated pit.
pada pāṭha: yuvam | kaṇvāya | nāsatyā | api-riptāya | harmye || śaśvat | ūtīḥ | daśasyathaḥ ||8.5.23||

IAST: tābhir ā yātam ūtibhir navyasībhiḥ suśastibhiḥ
Griffith: Come near with those most recent aids of yours which merit eulogy,
pada pāṭha: tābhiḥ | ā | yātam | ūti-bhiḥ | navyasībhiḥ | suśasti-bhiḥ || yat | vām | vr̥ṣaṇvasū iti vr̥ṣaṇ-vasū | huve ||8.5.24||

IAST: yad vāṁ vṛṣaṇvasū huve
Griffith: When I invoke you, Wealthy Gods.
pada pāṭha: tābhiḥ | ā | yātam | ūti-bhiḥ | navyasībhiḥ | suśasti-bhiḥ || yat | vām | vr̥ṣaṇvasū iti vr̥ṣaṇ-vasū | huve ||8.5.24||

IAST: yathā cit kaṇvam āvatam priyamedham upastutam
Griffith: As ye protected Kanva erst, Priyamedha and Upastuta,
pada pāṭha: yathā | cit | kaṇvam | āvatam | priya-medham | upa-stutam || atrim | śiñjāram | aśvinā ||8.5.25||

IAST: atriṁ śiñjāram aśvinā
Griffith: Atri, Sinjara, Asvins Twain
pada pāṭha: yathā | cit | kaṇvam | āvatam | priya-medham | upa-stutam || atrim | śiñjāram | aśvinā ||8.5.25||

IAST: yathota kṛtvye dhane 'ṁśuṁ goṣv agastyam
Griffith: And Amsu in decisive fight, Agastya in the fray for kine.
pada pāṭha: yathā | uta | kr̥tvye | dhane | aṁśum | goṣu | agastyam || yathā | vājeṣu | sobharim ||8.5.26||

IAST: yathā vājeṣu sobharim
Griffith: And, in his battles, Sobhari.
pada pāṭha: yathā | uta | kr̥tvye | dhane | aṁśum | goṣu | agastyam || yathā | vājeṣu | sobharim ||8.5.26||

IAST: etāvad vāṁ vṛṣaṇvasū ato vā bhūyo aśvinā
Griffith: For so much bliss, or even more, O Asvins, Wealthy Gods, than this,
Devanāgarī: एतावद्वां वृषण्वसू अतो वा भूयो अश्विना
pada pāṭha: etāvat | vām | vr̥ṣaṇvasū iti vr̥ṣaṇ-vasū | ataḥ | vā | bhūyaḥ | aśvinā || gr̥ṇantaḥ | sumnam | īmahe ||8.5.27||

IAST: gṛṇantaḥ sumnam īmahe
Griffith: We pray white singing hymns to you.
pada pāṭha: etāvat | vām | vr̥ṣaṇvasū iti vr̥ṣaṇ-vasū | ataḥ | vā | bhūyaḥ | aśvinā || gr̥ṇantaḥ | sumnam | īmahe ||8.5.27||

IAST: rathaṁ hiraṇyavandhuraṁ hiraṇyābhīśum aśvinā
Griffith: Ascend your car with golden seat, O Asvins, and with reins of gold,
pada pāṭha: ratham | hiraṇya-vandhuram | hiraṇya-abhīśum | aśvinā || ā | hi | sthāthaḥ | divi-spr̥śam ||8.5.28||

IAST: ā hi sthātho divispṛśam
Griffith: That reaches even to the sky.
pada pāṭha: ratham | hiraṇya-vandhuram | hiraṇya-abhīśum | aśvinā || ā | hi | sthāthaḥ | divi-spr̥śam ||8.5.28||

IAST: hiraṇyayī vāṁ rabhir īṣā akṣo hiraṇyayaḥ
Griffith: Golden is its supporting shaft, the axle also is of gold,
pada pāṭha: hiraṇyayīm | vām | rabhiḥ | īṣā | akṣaḥ | hiraṇyayaḥ || ubhā | cakrā | hiraṇyayā ||8.5.29||

IAST: ubhā cakrā hiraṇyayā
Griffith: And both the wheels are made of gold.
pada pāṭha: hiraṇyayīm | vām | rabhiḥ | īṣā | akṣaḥ | hiraṇyayaḥ || ubhā | cakrā | hiraṇyayā ||8.5.29||

IAST: tena no vājinīvasū parāvataś cid ā gatam
Griffith: Thereon, ye Lords of ample wealth, come to us even from afar,
pada pāṭha: tena | naḥ | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū | parā-vataḥ | cit | ā | gatam || upa | imām | su-stutim | mama ||8.5.30||

IAST: upemāṁ suṣṭutim mama
Griffith: Come ye to this mine eulogy.
pada pāṭha: tena | naḥ | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū | parā-vataḥ | cit | ā | gatam || upa | imām | su-stutim | mama ||8.5.30||

IAST: ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīr aśnantāv aśvinā
Griffith: From far away ye come to us, Asvins, enjoying plenteous food
pada pāṭha: ā | vahethe iti | parākāt | pūrvīḥ | aśnantau | aśvinā || iṣaḥ | dāsīḥ | amartyā ||8.5.31||

IAST: iṣo dāsīr amartyā
Griffith: Of Dasas, O Immortal Ones.
pada pāṭha: ā | vahethe iti | parākāt | pūrvīḥ | aśnantau | aśvinā || iṣaḥ | dāsīḥ | amartyā ||8.5.31||

IAST: ā no dyumnair ā śravobhir ā rāyā yātam aśvinā
Griffith: With splendour, riches, and renown, O Asvins, hither come to us,
Devanāgarī: आ नो द्युम्नैरा श्रवोभिरा राया यातमश्विना
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | dyumnaiḥ | ā | śravaḥ-bhiḥ | ā | rāyā | yātam | aśvinā || puru-candrā | nāsatyā ||8.5.32||

IAST: puruścandrā nāsatyā
Griffith: Nasatyas, shining brilliantly.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | dyumnaiḥ | ā | śravaḥ-bhiḥ | ā | rāyā | yātam | aśvinā || puru-candrā | nāsatyā ||8.5.32||

IAST: eha vām pruṣitapsavo vayo vahantu parṇinaḥ
Griffith: May dappled horses, steeds who fly with pinions, bring you hitherward
Devanāgarī: एह वां प्रुषितप्सवो वयो वहन्तु पर्णिनः
pada pāṭha: ā | iha | vām | pruṣita-psavaḥ | vayaḥ | vahantu | parṇinaḥ || accha | su-adhvaram | janam ||8.5.33||

IAST: acchā svadhvaraṁ janam
Griffith: To people skilled in sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: ā | iha | vām | pruṣita-psavaḥ | vayaḥ | vahantu | parṇinaḥ || accha | su-adhvaram | janam ||8.5.33||

IAST: rathaṁ vām anugāyasaṁ ya iṣā vartate saha
Griffith: The whcel delayeth not that car of yours accompanied by song,
Devanāgarī: रथं वामनुगायसं य इषा वर्तते सह
pada pāṭha: ratham | vām | anu-gāyasam | yaḥ | iṣā | vartate | saha || na | cakram | abhi | bādhate ||8.5.34||

IAST: na cakram abhi bādhate
Griffith: That cometh with a store of food.
pada pāṭha: ratham | vām | anu-gāyasam | yaḥ | iṣā | vartate | saha || na | cakram | abhi | bādhate ||8.5.34||

IAST: hiraṇyayena rathena dravatpāṇibhir aśvaiḥ
Griffith: Borne on that chariot wrought of gold, with coursers very fleet of foot,
pada pāṭha: hiraṇyayena | rathena | dravatpāṇi-bhiḥ | aśvaiḥ || dhī-javanā | nāsatyā ||8.5.35||

IAST: dhījavanā nāsatyā

IAST: tā naḥ pṛṅktam iṣā rayim

pada pāṭha: yuvam | mr̥gam | jāgr̥-vāṁsam | svadathaḥ | vā | vr̥ṣaṇvasū iti vr̥ṣaṇ-vasū || tā | naḥ | pr̥ṅktam | iṣā | rayim ||8.5.36||

pada pāṭha: tā | me | aśvinā | sanīnām | vidyātam | navānām || yathā | cit | caidyaḥ | kaśuḥ | śatam | uṣṭrānām | dadat | sahasrā | daśa | gonām ||8.5.37||

Griffith: Is magnified by Vatsa's lauds.
pada pāṭha: mahān | indraḥ | yaḥ | ojasā | parjanyaḥ | vr̥ṣṭimān-iva || stomaiḥ | vatsasya | vavr̥dhe ||8.6.1||

pada pāṭha: pra-jām | r̥tasya | piprataḥ | pra | yat | bharanta | vahnayaḥ || viprāḥ | r̥tasya | vāhasā ||8.6.2||

pada pāṭha: kaṇvāḥ | indram | yat | akrata | stomaiḥ | yajñasya | sādhanam || jāmi | bruvate | āyudham ||8.6.3||

Griffith: As rivers bow them to the sea.
pada pāṭha: sam | asya | manyave | viśaḥ | viśvāḥ | namanta | kr̥ṣṭayaḥ || samudrāya-iva | sindhavaḥ ||8.6.4||

Griffith: A skin, the worlds of heaven and earth.
pada pāṭha: ojaḥ | tat | asya | titviṣe | ubhe iti | yat | sam-avartayat || indraḥ | carma-iva | rodasī iti ||8.6.5||

Griffith: Even lightnings like the blaze of fire.

IAST: mamed ugra śrudhī havam
Griffith: Listen, thou Mighty, to my call.

Griffith: Aiders, thereby, of sacrifice;

Griffith: Like Surya who sustaineth all.

Griffith: The drops poured forth have strengthened thee.
pada pāṭha: tvām | it | śavasaḥ | pate | kaṇvāḥ | ukthena | vavr̥dhuḥ || tvām | sutāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||8.6.21||

Griffith: Among the tribes of Nahusas.

Griffith: When, Indra, thou art kind to us.

Griffith: Mighty, unlimited in strength.

Griffith: With drops to thee who spreadest far.

pada pāṭha: upa-hvare | girīṇām | sam-gathe | ca | nadīnām || dhiyā | vipraḥ | ajāyata ||8.6.28||

IAST: dhiyā vipro ajāyata
Griffith: The Sage was manifest with song.
pada pāṭha: upa-hvare | girīṇām | sam-gathe | ca | nadīnām || dhiyā | vipraḥ | ajāyata ||8.6.28||

IAST: ataḥ samudram udvataś cikitvām̐ ava paśyati
Griffith: Thence, marking, from his lofty place downward he looks upon the sea,
pada pāṭha: ataḥ | samudram | ut-vataḥ | cikitvān | ava | paśyati || yataḥ | vipānaḥ | ejati ||8.6.29||

IAST: yato vipāna ejati
Griffith: And thence with rapid stir he moves.
pada pāṭha: ataḥ | samudram | ut-vataḥ | cikitvān | ava | paśyati || yataḥ | vipānaḥ | ejati ||8.6.29||

IAST: ād it pratnasya retaso jyotiṣ paśyanti vāsaram
Griffith: Then, verify, they see the light refulgent of primeval seed,
pada pāṭha: āt | it | pratnasya | retasaḥ | jyotiḥ | paśyanti | vāsaram || paraḥ | yat | idhyate | divā ||8.6.30||

IAST: paro yad idhyate divā
Griffith: Kindled on yonder side of heaven.
pada pāṭha: āt | it | pratnasya | retasaḥ | jyotiḥ | paśyanti | vāsaram || paraḥ | yat | idhyate | divā ||8.6.30||

IAST: kaṇvāsa indra te matiṁ viśve vardhanti pauṁsyam
Griffith: Indra, the Kanvas all exalt thy wisdom and thy manly power,
Devanāgarī: कण्वास इन्द्र ते मतिं विश्वे वर्धन्ति पौंस्यम्
pada pāṭha: kaṇvāsaḥ | indra | te | matim | viśve | vardhanti | pauṁsyam || uto iti | śaviṣṭha | vr̥ṣṇyam ||8.6.31||

IAST: uto śaviṣṭha vṛṣṇyam
Griffith: And, Mightiest! thine heroic strength.
pada pāṭha: kaṇvāsaḥ | indra | te | matim | viśve | vardhanti | pauṁsyam || uto iti | śaviṣṭha | vr̥ṣṇyam ||8.6.31||

IAST: imām ma indra suṣṭutiṁ juṣasva pra su mām ava
Griffith: Accept this eulogy of mine, Indra, and guard me carefully:
Devanāgarī: इमां म इन्द्र सुष्टुतिं जुषस्व प्र सु मामव
pada pāṭha: imām | me | indra | su-stutim | juṣasva | pra | su | mām | ava || uta | pra | vardhaya | matim ||8.6.32||

IAST: uta pra vardhayā matim
Griffith: Strengthen my thought and prosper it.
pada pāṭha: imām | me | indra | su-stutim | juṣasva | pra | su | mām | ava || uta | pra | vardhaya | matim ||8.6.32||

IAST: uta brahmaṇyā vayaṁ tubhyam pravṛddha vajrivaḥ
Griffith: For thee, O Mighty, Thunder-armed, we singers through devotionhave
Devanāgarī: उत ब्रह्मण्या वयं तुभ्यं प्रवृद्ध वज्रिवः
pada pāṭha: uta | brahmaṇyā | vayam | tubhyam | pra-vr̥ddha | vajri-vaḥ || viprāḥ | atakṣma | jīvase ||8.6.33||

IAST: viprā atakṣma jīvase
Griffith: Fashioned the hymn that we may live.
pada pāṭha: uta | brahmaṇyā | vayam | tubhyam | pra-vr̥ddha | vajri-vaḥ || viprāḥ | atakṣma | jīvase ||8.6.33||

IAST: abhi kaṇvā anūṣatāpo na pravatā yatīḥ
Griffith: To Indra have the Kanvas sung, like waters speeding down a slope:
Devanāgarī: अभि कण्वा अनूषतापो न प्रवता यतीः
pada pāṭha: abhi | kaṇvāḥ | anūṣata | āpaḥ | na | pra-vatā | yatīḥ || indram | vanan-vatī | matiḥ ||8.6.34||

IAST: indraṁ vananvatī matiḥ
Griffith: The song is fain to go to him.
pada pāṭha: abhi | kaṇvāḥ | anūṣata | āpaḥ | na | pra-vatā | yatīḥ || indram | vanan-vatī | matiḥ ||8.6.34||

IAST: indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ
Griffith: As rivers swell the ocean, so our hymns of praise make Indra strong,
pada pāṭha: indram | ukthāni | vavr̥dhuḥ | samudram-iva | sindhavaḥ || anutta-manyum | ajaram ||8.6.35||

IAST: anuttamanyum ajaram
Griffith: Eternal, of resistIess wrath.
pada pāṭha: indram | ukthāni | vavr̥dhuḥ | samudram-iva | sindhavaḥ || anutta-manyum | ajaram ||8.6.35||

IAST: ā no yāhi parāvato haribhyāṁ haryatābhyām
Griffith: Come with thy lovely Bay Steeds, come to us from regions far away
Devanāgarī: आ नो याहि परावतो हरिभ्यां हर्यताभ्याम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | yāhi | parā-vataḥ | hari-bhyām | haryatābhyām || imam | indra | sutam | piba ||8.6.36||

IAST: imam indra sutam piba
Griffith: O Indra, drink this Soma juice.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | yāhi | parā-vataḥ | hari-bhyām | haryatābhyām || imam | indra | sutam | piba ||8.6.36||

IAST: tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
Griffith: Best slayer of Vrtras, men whose sacred grass is ready trimmed
pada pāṭha: tvām | it | vr̥trahan-tama | janāsaḥ | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || havante | vāja-sātaye ||8.6.37||

IAST: havante vājasātaye
Griffith: Invoke thee for the gain of spoil.
pada pāṭha: tvām | it | vr̥trahan-tama | janāsaḥ | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || havante | vāja-sātaye ||8.6.37||

IAST: anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakraṁ na varty etaśam
Griffith: The heavens and earth come after thee as the wheel follows Etasa:
Devanāgarī: अनु त्वा रोदसी उभे चक्रं न वर्त्येतशम्
pada pāṭha: anu | tvā | rodasī iti | ubhe iti | cakram | na | varti | etaśam || anu | suvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||8.6.38||

IAST: anu suvānāsa indavaḥ
Griffith: To thee flow Sorna-drops effused.
pada pāṭha: anu | tvā | rodasī iti | ubhe iti | cakram | na | varti | etaśam || anu | suvānāsaḥ | indavaḥ ||8.6.38||

IAST: mandasvā su svarṇara utendra śaryaṇāvati
Griffith: Rejoice, O Indra, in the light, rejoice in Saryandyan,
pada pāṭha: mandasva | su | svaḥ-nare | uta | indra | śaryaṇā-vati || matsva | vivasvataḥ | matī ||8.6.39||

IAST: matsvā vivasvato matī
Griffith: be Glad in the sacrificer's hymn.
pada pāṭha: mandasva | su | svaḥ-nare | uta | indra | śaryaṇā-vati || matsva | vivasvataḥ | matī ||8.6.39||

IAST: vāvṛdhāna upa dyavi vṛṣā vajry aroravīt
Griffith: Grown strong in heaven, the Thunder-armed hath bellowed, Vrtra-slayer, Bull,
pada pāṭha: vavr̥dhānaḥ | upa | dyavi | vr̥ṣā | vajrī | aroravīt || vr̥tra-hā | soma-pātamaḥ ||8.6.40||

IAST: vṛtrahā somapātamaḥ
Griffith: Chief drinker of the Soma juice.
pada pāṭha: vavr̥dhānaḥ | upa | dyavi | vr̥ṣā | vajrī | aroravīt || vr̥tra-hā | soma-pātamaḥ ||8.6.40||

IAST: ṛṣir hi pūrvajā asy eka īśāna ojasā
Griffith: Thou art a Rsi born of old, sole Ruler over all by might:
pada pāṭha: r̥ṣiḥ | hi | pūrva-jāḥ | asi | ekaḥ | īśānaḥ | ojasā || indra | coṣkūyase | vasu ||8.6.41||

IAST: indra coṣkūyase vasu
Griffith: Thou, Indra, guardest well our wealth.
pada pāṭha: r̥ṣiḥ | hi | pūrva-jāḥ | asi | ekaḥ | īśānaḥ | ojasā || indra | coṣkūyase | vasu ||8.6.41||

IAST: asmākaṁ tvā sutām̐ upa vītapṛṣṭhā abhi prayaḥ
Griffith: May thy Bay Steeds with beauteous backs, a hundred, bring thee to the feast,
Devanāgarī: अस्माकं त्वा सुताँ उप वीतपृष्ठा अभि प्रयः
pada pāṭha: asmākam | tvā | sutān | upa | vīta-pr̥ṣṭhāḥ | abhi | prayaḥ || śatam | vahantu | harayaḥ ||8.6.42||

IAST: śataṁ vahantu harayaḥ
Griffith: Bring thee to these our Soma-draughts.
pada pāṭha: asmākam | tvā | sutān | upa | vīta-pr̥ṣṭhāḥ | abhi | prayaḥ || śatam | vahantu | harayaḥ ||8.6.42||

IAST: imāṁ su pūrvyāṁ dhiyam madhor ghṛtasya pipyuṣīm
Griffith: The Kanvas with their hymns of praise have magnified this ancient thought
Devanāgarī: इमां सु पूर्व्यां धियं मधोर्घृतस्य पिप्युषीम्
pada pāṭha: imām | su | pūrvyām | dhiyam | madhoḥ | ghr̥tasya | pipyuṣīm || kaṇvāḥ | ukthena | vavr̥dhuḥ ||8.6.43||

IAST: kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ
Griffith: That swells with streams of meath and oil.
pada pāṭha: imām | su | pūrvyām | dhiyam | madhoḥ | ghr̥tasya | pipyuṣīm || kaṇvāḥ | ukthena | vavr̥dhuḥ ||8.6.43||

IAST: indram id vimahīnām medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ
Griffith: Mid mightiest Gods let mortal man choose Indra at the sacrifice,
pada pāṭha: indram | it | vi-mahīnām | medhe | vr̥ṇīta | martyaḥ || indram | saniṣyuḥ | ūtaye ||8.6.44||

IAST: indraṁ saniṣyur ūtaye
Griffith: Indra, whoe'er would win, for help.
pada pāṭha: indram | it | vi-mahīnām | medhe | vr̥ṇīta | martyaḥ || indram | saniṣyuḥ | ūtaye ||8.6.44||

IAST: arvāñcaṁ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī
Griffith: Thy steeds, by Priyamedhas praised, shall bring thee, God whom all invoke,
pada pāṭha: arvāñcam | tvā | puru-stuta | priyamedha-stutā | harī iti || soma-peyāya | vakṣataḥ ||8.6.45||

IAST: somapeyāya vakṣataḥ
Griffith: Hither to drink the Somajuice.
pada pāṭha: arvāñcam | tvā | puru-stuta | priyamedha-stutā | harī iti || soma-peyāya | vakṣataḥ ||8.6.45||

IAST: śatam ahaṁ tirindire sahasram parśāv ā dade
Griffith: A hundred thousand have I gained from Parsu, from Tirindira,
pada pāṭha: śatam | aham | tirindire | sahasram | parśau | ā | dade || rādhāṁsi | yādvānām ||8.6.46||

IAST: rādhāṁsi yādvānām
Griffith: And presents of the Yadavas.
pada pāṭha: śatam | aham | tirindire | sahasram | parśau | ā | dade || rādhāṁsi | yādvānām ||8.6.46||

IAST: trīṇi śatāny arvatāṁ sahasrā daśa gonām
Griffith: Ten thousand head of kine, and steeds three times a hundred they bestowed
pada pāṭha: trīṇi | śatāni | arvatām | sahasrā | daśa | gonām || daduḥ | pajrāya | sāmne ||8.6.47||

IAST: daduṣ pajrāya sāmne
Griffith: On Pajra for the Sama-song.
pada pāṭha: trīṇi | śatāni | arvatām | sahasrā | daśa | gonām || daduḥ | pajrāya | sāmne ||8.6.47||

IAST: ud ānaṭ kakuho divam uṣṭrāñ caturyujo dadat
Griffith: Kakuha hath reached up to heaven, bestowing buffaloes yoked in fours,
pada pāṭha: ut | ānaṭ | kakuhaḥ | divam | uṣṭrān | catuḥ-yujaḥ | dadat || śravasā | yādvam | janam ||8.6.48||

IAST: śravasā yādvaṁ janam
Griffith: And matched in fame the Yadavas.
pada pāṭha: ut | ānaṭ | kakuhaḥ | divam | uṣṭrān | catuḥ-yujaḥ | dadat || śravasā | yādvam | janam ||8.6.48||

IAST: pra yad vas triṣṭubham iṣam maruto vipro akṣarat
Griffith: O MARUTS, when the sage hath poured the Trstup forth as food for you,
pada pāṭha: pra | yat | vaḥ | tri-stubham | iṣam | marutaḥ | vipraḥ | akṣarat || vi | parvateṣu | rājatha ||8.7.1||

IAST: vi parvateṣu rājatha
Griffith: Ye shine amid the mountain-clouds.
pada pāṭha: pra | yat | vaḥ | tri-stubham | iṣam | marutaḥ | vipraḥ | akṣarat || vi | parvateṣu | rājatha ||8.7.1||

IAST: yad aṅga taviṣīyavo yāmaṁ śubhrā acidhvam
Griffith: When, Bright Ones, fain to show your might ye have determined on your course,
pada pāṭha: yat | aṅga | taviṣī-yavaḥ | yāmam | śubhrāḥ | acidhvam || ni | parvatāḥ | ahāsata ||8.7.2||

IAST: ni parvatā ahāsata
Griffith: The mountain-clouds have bent them down.
pada pāṭha: yat | aṅga | taviṣī-yavaḥ | yāmam | śubhrāḥ | acidhvam || ni | parvatāḥ | ahāsata ||8.7.2||

IAST: ud īrayanta vāyubhir vāśrāsaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ
Griffith: Loud roaring with the winds the Sons of Prsni have upraised themselves:
pada pāṭha: ut | īrayanta | vāyu-bhiḥ | vāśrāsaḥ | pr̥śni-mātaraḥ || dhukṣanta | pipyuṣīm | iṣam ||8.7.3||

IAST: dhukṣanta pipyuṣīm iṣam
Griffith: They have poured out the streaming food.
pada pāṭha: ut | īrayanta | vāyu-bhiḥ | vāśrāsaḥ | pr̥śni-mātaraḥ || dhukṣanta | pipyuṣīm | iṣam ||8.7.3||

IAST: vapanti maruto miham pra vepayanti parvatān
Griffith: The Maruts spread the mist abroad and make mountains rock and reel,
Devanāgarī: वपन्ति मरुतो मिहं प्र वेपयन्ति पर्वतान्
pada pāṭha: vapanti | marutaḥ | miham | pra | vepayanti | parvatān || yat | yāmam | yānti | vāyu-bhiḥ ||8.7.4||

IAST: yad yāmaṁ yānti vāyubhiḥ
Griffith: When with the winds they go their way
pada pāṭha: vapanti | marutaḥ | miham | pra | vepayanti | parvatān || yat | yāmam | yānti | vāyu-bhiḥ ||8.7.4||

IAST: ni yad yāmāya vo girir ni sindhavo vidharmaṇe
Griffith: What time the rivers and the hills before your coming bowed them down,
Devanāgarī: नि यद्यामाय वो गिरिर्नि सिन्धवो विधर्मणे
pada pāṭha: ni | yat | yāmāya | vaḥ | giriḥ | ni | sindhavaḥ | vi-dharmaṇe || mahe | śuṣmāya | yemire ||8.7.5||

IAST: mahe śuṣmāya yemire
Griffith: So to sustain your mighty force.
pada pāṭha: ni | yat | yāmāya | vaḥ | giriḥ | ni | sindhavaḥ | vi-dharmaṇe || mahe | śuṣmāya | yemire ||8.7.5||

IAST: yuṣmām̐ u naktam ūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe
Griffith: We call on you for aid by night, on you for succour in the day,
pada pāṭha: yuṣmān | ūm̐ iti | naktam | ūtaye | yuṣmān | divā | havāmahe || yuṣmān | pra-yati | adhvare ||8.7.6||

IAST: yuṣmān prayaty adhvare
Griffith: On you while sacrifice proceeds.
pada pāṭha: yuṣmān | ūm̐ iti | naktam | ūtaye | yuṣmān | divā | havāmahe || yuṣmān | pra-yati | adhvare ||8.7.6||

IAST: ud u tye aruṇapsavaś citrā yāmebhir īrate
Griffith: These, verily, wondrous, red of hue, speed on their courses with a roar
pada pāṭha: ut | ūm̐ iti | tye | aruṇa-psavaḥ | citrāḥ | yāmebhiḥ | īrate || vāśrāḥ | adhi | snunā | divaḥ ||8.7.7||

IAST: vāśrā adhi ṣṇunā divaḥ
Griffith: Over the ridges of the sky.
pada pāṭha: ut | ūm̐ iti | tye | aruṇa-psavaḥ | citrāḥ | yāmebhiḥ | īrate || vāśrāḥ | adhi | snunā | divaḥ ||8.7.7||

IAST: sṛjanti raśmim ojasā panthāṁ sūryāya yātave
Griffith: With might they drop the loosened rein so that the Sun may run his course,
pada pāṭha: sr̥janti | raśmim | ojasā | panthām | sūryāya | yātave || te | bhānu-bhiḥ | vi | tasthire ||8.7.8||

IAST: te bhānubhir vi tasthire
Griffith: And spread themselves with beams of light.
pada pāṭha: sr̥janti | raśmim | ojasā | panthām | sūryāya | yātave || te | bhānu-bhiḥ | vi | tasthire ||8.7.8||

IAST: imām me maruto giram imaṁ stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ
Griffith: Accept, ye Maruts, this my song, accept ye this mine hymn of praise,
pada pāṭha: imām | me | marutaḥ | giram | imam | stomam | r̥bhukṣaṇaḥ || imam | me | vanata | havam ||8.7.9||

IAST: imam me vanatā havam
Griffith: Accept, Rbhuksans, this my call.
pada pāṭha: imām | me | marutaḥ | giram | imam | stomam | r̥bhukṣaṇaḥ || imam | me | vanata | havam ||8.7.9||

IAST: trīṇi sarāṁsi pṛśnayo duduhre vajriṇe madhu
Griffith: The dappled Cows have poured three lakes, meath for the Thunder-wielding God,
Devanāgarī: त्रीणि सरांसि पृश्नयो दुदुह्रे वज्रिणे मधु
pada pāṭha: trīṇi | sarāṁsi | pr̥śnayaḥ | duduhre | vajriṇe | madhu || utsam | kavandham | udriṇam ||8.7.10||

IAST: utsaṁ kavandham udriṇam
Griffith: From the great cask, the watery cloud.
pada pāṭha: trīṇi | sarāṁsi | pr̥śnayaḥ | duduhre | vajriṇe | madhu || utsam | kavandham | udriṇam ||8.7.10||

IAST: maruto yad dha vo divaḥ sumnāyanto havāmahe
Griffith: O Maruts, quickly come to us when, longing for felicity,
Devanāgarī: मरुतो यद्ध वो दिवः सुम्नायन्तो हवामहे
pada pāṭha: marutaḥ | yat | ha | vaḥ | divaḥ | sumna-yantaḥ | havāmahe || ā | tu | naḥ | upa | gantana ||8.7.11||

IAST: ā tū na upa gantana
Griffith: We call you hither from the sky.
pada pāṭha: marutaḥ | yat | ha | vaḥ | divaḥ | sumna-yantaḥ | havāmahe || ā | tu | naḥ | upa | gantana ||8.7.11||

IAST: yūyaṁ hi ṣṭhā sudānavo rudrā ṛbhukṣaṇo dame
Griffith: For, Rudras and Rbhuksans, ye, Most Bountiful, are in the house,
Devanāgarī: यूयं हि ष्ठा सुदानवो रुद्रा ऋभुक्षणो दमे
pada pāṭha: yūyam | hi | stha | su-dānavaḥ | rudrāḥ | r̥bhukṣaṇaḥ | dame || uta | pra-cetasaḥ | made ||8.7.12||

IAST: uta pracetaso made
Griffith: Wise when the gladdening draught is drunk.
pada pāṭha: yūyam | hi | stha | su-dānavaḥ | rudrāḥ | r̥bhukṣaṇaḥ | dame || uta | pra-cetasaḥ | made ||8.7.12||

IAST: ā no rayim madacyutam purukṣuṁ viśvadhāyasam
Griffith: O Maruts, send us down from heaven riches distilling rapturous joy,
Devanāgarī: आ नो रयिं मदच्युतं पुरुक्षुं विश्वधायसम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | rayim | mada-cyutam | puru-kṣum | viśva-dhāyasam || iyarta | marutaḥ | divaḥ ||8.7.13||

IAST: iyartā maruto divaḥ
Griffith: With plenteous food, sustaining all.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | rayim | mada-cyutam | puru-kṣum | viśva-dhāyasam || iyarta | marutaḥ | divaḥ ||8.7.13||

IAST: adhīva yad girīṇāṁ yāmaṁ śubhrā acidhvam
Griffith: When, Bright Ones, hither from the hills ye have resolved to take your way,
pada pāṭha: adhi-iva | yat | girīṇām | yāmam | śubhrāḥ | acidhvam || suvānaiḥ | mandadhve | indu-bhiḥ ||8.7.14||

IAST: suvānair mandadhva indubhiḥ
Griffith: Ye revel in the drops effused.
pada pāṭha: adhi-iva | yat | girīṇām | yāmam | śubhrāḥ | acidhvam || suvānaiḥ | mandadhve | indu-bhiḥ ||8.7.14||

IAST: etāvataś cid eṣāṁ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ
Griffith: Man should solicit with his lauds happiness which belongs to them,
pada pāṭha: etāvataḥ | cit | eṣām | sumnam | bhikṣeta | martyaḥ || adābhyasya | manma-bhiḥ ||8.7.15||

IAST: adābhyasya manmabhiḥ
Griffith: So great a band invincible.
pada pāṭha: etāvataḥ | cit | eṣām | sumnam | bhikṣeta | martyaḥ || adābhyasya | manma-bhiḥ ||8.7.15||

IAST: ye drapsā iva rodasī dhamanty anu vṛṣṭibhiḥ
Griffith: They who like fiery sparks with showers of rain blow through the heaven and earth,
Devanāgarī: ये द्रप्सा इव रोदसी धमन्त्यनु वृष्टिभिः
pada pāṭha: ye | drapsāḥ-iva | rodasī iti | dhamanti | anu | vr̥ṣṭi-bhiḥ || utsam | duhantaḥ | akṣitam ||8.7.16||

IAST: utsaṁ duhanto akṣitam
Griffith: Milking the spring that never fails.
pada pāṭha: ye | drapsāḥ-iva | rodasī iti | dhamanti | anu | vr̥ṣṭi-bhiḥ || utsam | duhantaḥ | akṣitam ||8.7.16||

IAST: ud u svānebhir īrata ud rathair ud u vāyubhiḥ
Griffith: With chariots and tumultuous roar, with tempests and with hymns of praise
pada pāṭha: ut | ūm̐ iti | svānebhiḥ | īrate | ut | rathaiḥ | ut | ūm̐ iti | vāyu-bhiḥ || ut | stomaiḥ | pr̥śni-mātaraḥ ||8.7.17||

IAST: ut stomaiḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ
Griffith: The Sons of Prsni hurry forth.
pada pāṭha: ut | ūm̐ iti | svānebhiḥ | īrate | ut | rathaiḥ | ut | ūm̐ iti | vāyu-bhiḥ || ut | stomaiḥ | pr̥śni-mātaraḥ ||8.7.17||

IAST: yenāva turvaśaṁ yaduṁ yena kaṇvaṁ dhanaspṛtam
Griffith: For wealth, we think of that whereby ye aided Yadu, Turvasa,
Devanāgarī: येनाव तुर्वशं यदुं येन कण्वं धनस्पृतम्
pada pāṭha: yena | āva | turvaśam | yadum | yena | kaṇvam | dhana-spr̥tam || rāye | su | tasya | dhīmahi ||8.7.18||

IAST: rāye su tasya dhīmahi
Griffith: And KanVa who obtained the spoil.
pada pāṭha: yena | āva | turvaśam | yadum | yena | kaṇvam | dhana-spr̥tam || rāye | su | tasya | dhīmahi ||8.7.18||

IAST: imā u vaḥ sudānavo ghṛtaṁ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ
Griffith: May these our viands Bounteous Ones I that flow in streams like holy oil,
Devanāgarī: इमा उ वः सुदानवो घृतं न पिप्युषीरिषः
pada pāṭha: imāḥ | ūm̐ iti | vaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | ghr̥tam | na | pipyuṣīḥ | iṣaḥ || vardhān | kāṇvasya | manma-bhiḥ ||8.7.19||

IAST: vardhān kāṇvasya manmabhiḥ
Griffith: With Kanva's hymns, increase your might.
pada pāṭha: imāḥ | ūm̐ iti | vaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | ghr̥tam | na | pipyuṣīḥ | iṣaḥ || vardhān | kāṇvasya | manma-bhiḥ ||8.7.19||

IAST: kva nūnaṁ sudānavo madathā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
Griffith: Where, Bounteous Lords for whom the grass is trimmed, are ye rejoicing now?
pada pāṭha: kva | nūnam | su-dānavaḥ | madatha | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || brahmā | kaḥ | vaḥ | saparyati ||8.7.20||

IAST: brahmā ko vaḥ saparyati
Griffith: What Brahman is adoring you?
pada pāṭha: kva | nūnam | su-dānavaḥ | madatha | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || brahmā | kaḥ | vaḥ | saparyati ||8.7.20||

IAST: nahi ṣma yad dha vaḥ purā stomebhir vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
Griffith: Is it not there where ye of old, supplied with sacred grass, for lauds
Devanāgarī: नहि ष्म यद्ध वः पुरा स्तोमेभिर्वृक्तबर्हिषः
pada pāṭha: nahi | sma | yat | ha | vaḥ | purā | stomebhiḥ | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || śardhān | r̥tasya | jinvatha ||8.7.21||

IAST: śardhām̐ ṛtasya jinvatha
Griffith: Inspired the strong in sacrifice?
pada pāṭha: nahi | sma | yat | ha | vaḥ | purā | stomebhiḥ | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || śardhān | r̥tasya | jinvatha ||8.7.21||

IAST: sam u tye mahatīr apaḥ saṁ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam
Griffith: They brought together both the worlds, the mighty waters, and the Sun,
Devanāgarī: समु त्ये महतीरपः सं क्षोणी समु सूर्यम्
pada pāṭha: sam | ūm̐ iti | tye | mahatīḥ | apaḥ | sam | kṣoṇī iti | sam | ūm̐ iti | sūryam || sam | vajram | parva-śaḥ | dadhuḥ ||8.7.22||

IAST: saṁ vajram parvaśo dadhuḥ
Griffith: And, joint by joint, the thunderbolt.
pada pāṭha: sam | ūm̐ iti | tye | mahatīḥ | apaḥ | sam | kṣoṇī iti | sam | ūm̐ iti | sūryam || sam | vajram | parva-śaḥ | dadhuḥ ||8.7.22||

IAST: vi vṛtram parvaśo yayur vi parvatām̐ arājinaḥ
Griffith: They sundered Vrtra limb from limb and split the gloomy mountain-clouds,
Devanāgarī: वि वृत्रं पर्वशो ययुर्वि पर्वताँ अराजिनः
pada pāṭha: vi | vr̥tram | parva-śaḥ | yayuḥ | vi | parvatān | arājinaḥ || cakrāṇāḥ | vr̥ṣṇi | pauṁsyam ||8.7.23||

IAST: cakrāṇā vṛṣṇi pauṁsyam
Griffith: Performing a heroic deed.
pada pāṭha: vi | vr̥tram | parva-śaḥ | yayuḥ | vi | parvatān | arājinaḥ || cakrāṇāḥ | vr̥ṣṇi | pauṁsyam ||8.7.23||

IAST: anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmam āvann uta kratum
Griffith: They reinforced the power and strength of Trita as he fought, and helped
pada pāṭha: anu | tritasya | yudhyataḥ | śuṣmam | āvan | uta | kratum || anu | indram | vr̥tra-tūrye ||8.7.24||

IAST: anv indraṁ vṛtratūrye
Griffith: Indra in battle with the foe.
pada pāṭha: anu | tritasya | yudhyataḥ | śuṣmam | āvan | uta | kratum || anu | indram | vr̥tra-tūrye ||8.7.24||

IAST: vidyuddhastā abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ
Griffith: They deck themselves for glory, bright, celestial, lightning in their hands,
pada pāṭha: vidyut-hastāḥ | abhi-dyavaḥ | śiprāḥ | śīrṣan | hiraṇyayīḥ || śubhrāḥ | vi | añjata | śriye ||8.7.25||

IAST: śubhrā vy añjata śriye
Griffith: And helms of gold upon their heads.
pada pāṭha: vidyut-hastāḥ | abhi-dyavaḥ | śiprāḥ | śīrṣan | hiraṇyayīḥ || śubhrāḥ | vi | añjata | śriye ||8.7.25||

IAST: uśanā yat parāvata ukṣṇo randhram ayātana
Griffith: When eagerly ye from far away came to the cavern of the Bull,
pada pāṭha: uśanā | yat | parā-vataḥ | ukṣṇaḥ | randhram | ayātana || dyauḥ | na | cakradat | bhiyā ||8.7.26||

IAST: dyaur na cakradad bhiyā
Griffith: He bellowed in his fear like Heaven.
pada pāṭha: uśanā | yat | parā-vataḥ | ukṣṇaḥ | randhram | ayātana || dyauḥ | na | cakradat | bhiyā ||8.7.26||

IAST: ā no makhasya dāvane 'śvair hiraṇyapāṇibhiḥ
Griffith: Borne by your golden-footed steeds, O Gods, come hither to receive
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | makhasya | dāvane | aśvaiḥ | hiraṇyapāṇi-bhiḥ || devāsaḥ | upa | gantana ||8.7.27||

IAST: devāsa upa gantana
Griffith: The sacrifice we offer you.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | makhasya | dāvane | aśvaiḥ | hiraṇyapāṇi-bhiḥ || devāsaḥ | upa | gantana ||8.7.27||

IAST: yad eṣām pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ
Griffith: When the red leader draws along their spotted deer yoked to the car.
pada pāṭha: yat | eṣām | pr̥ṣatīḥ | rathe | praṣṭiḥ | vahati | rohitaḥ || yānti | śubhrāḥ | riṇan | apaḥ ||8.7.28||

IAST: yānti śubhrā riṇann apaḥ
Griffith: The Bright Ones come, and shed the rain.
pada pāṭha: yat | eṣām | pr̥ṣatīḥ | rathe | praṣṭiḥ | vahati | rohitaḥ || yānti | śubhrāḥ | riṇan | apaḥ ||8.7.28||

IAST: suṣome śaryaṇāvaty ārjīke pastyāvati
Griffith: Susoma, Saryakiavan, and Arjika full of homes, have they.
pada pāṭha: su-some | śaryaṇā-vati | ārjīke | pastya-vati || yayuḥ | ni-cakrayā | naraḥ ||8.7.29||

IAST: yayur nicakrayā naraḥ
Griffith: These Heroes, sought with downward car.
pada pāṭha: su-some | śaryaṇā-vati | ārjīke | pastya-vati || yayuḥ | ni-cakrayā | naraḥ ||8.7.29||

IAST: kadā gacchātha maruta itthā vipraṁ havamānam
Griffith: When, Maruts, ye come to him, the singer who invokes you thus,
Devanāgarī: कदा गच्छाथ मरुत इत्था विप्रं हवमानम्
pada pāṭha: kadā | gacchātha | marutaḥ | itthā | vipram | havamānam || mārḍīkebhiḥ | nādhamānam ||8.7.30||

IAST: mārḍīkebhir nādhamānam
Griffith: With favours to your suppliant?
pada pāṭha: kadā | gacchātha | marutaḥ | itthā | vipram | havamānam || mārḍīkebhiḥ | nādhamānam ||8.7.30||

IAST: kad dha nūnaṁ kadhapriyo yad indram ajahātana
Griffith: What now? where have ye still a friend since ye left Indra all alone?
pada pāṭha: kat | ha | nūnam | kadha-priyaḥ | yat | indram | ajahātana || kaḥ | vaḥ | sakhi-tve | ohate ||8.7.31||

IAST: ko vaḥ sakhitva ohate
Griffith: Who counteth on your friendship now?
pada pāṭha: kat | ha | nūnam | kadha-priyaḥ | yat | indram | ajahātana || kaḥ | vaḥ | sakhi-tve | ohate ||8.7.31||

IAST: saho ṣu ṇo vajrahastaiḥ kaṇvāso agnim marudbhiḥ
Griffith: The Kanvas sing forth Agni's praise together with our Maruts' who
Devanāgarī: सहो षु णो वज्रहस्तैः कण्वासो अग्निं मरुद्भिः
pada pāṭha: saho iti | su | naḥ | vajra-hastaiḥ | kaṇvāsaḥ | agnim | marut-bhiḥ || stuṣe | hiraṇya-vāśībhiḥ ||8.7.32||

IAST: stuṣe hiraṇyavāśībhiḥ
Griffith: Wield thunder and wear swords of gold.
pada pāṭha: saho iti | su | naḥ | vajra-hastaiḥ | kaṇvāsaḥ | agnim | marut-bhiḥ || stuṣe | hiraṇya-vāśībhiḥ ||8.7.32||

IAST: o ṣu vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūn ā navyase suvitāya
Griffith: Hither for new felicity may I attract the Impetuous Ones,
Devanāgarī: ओ षु वृष्णः प्रयज्यूना नव्यसे सुविताय
pada pāṭha: o iti | su | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | pra-yajyūn | ā | navyase | suvitāya || vavr̥tyām | citra-vājān ||8.7.33||

IAST: vavṛtyāṁ citravājān
Griffith: The Heroes with their wondrous strength
pada pāṭha: o iti | su | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | pra-yajyūn | ā | navyase | suvitāya || vavr̥tyām | citra-vājān ||8.7.33||

IAST: girayaś cin ni jihate parśānāso manyamānāḥ
Griffith: Before them sink the very hills deerning themseives abysses: yea,
pada pāṭha: girayaḥ | cit | ni | jihate | parśānāsaḥ | manyamānāḥ || parvatāḥ | cit | ni | yemire ||8.7.34||

IAST: parvatāś cin ni yemire
Griffith: Even the mountains bend them down.
pada pāṭha: girayaḥ | cit | ni | jihate | parśānāsaḥ | manyamānāḥ || parvatāḥ | cit | ni | yemire ||8.7.34||

IAST: ākṣṇayāvāno vahanty antarikṣeṇa patataḥ
Griffith: Steeds flying on their tortuous path through mid-air carry them, and give
pada pāṭha: ā | akṣṇa-yāvānaḥ | vahanti | antarikṣeṇa | patataḥ || dhātāraḥ | stuvate | vayaḥ ||8.7.35||

IAST: dhātāraḥ stuvate vayaḥ
Griffith: The man who lauds them strength and life.
pada pāṭha: ā | akṣṇa-yāvānaḥ | vahanti | antarikṣeṇa | patataḥ || dhātāraḥ | stuvate | vayaḥ ||8.7.35||

IAST: agnir hi jāni pūrvyaś chando na sūro arciṣā
Griffith: Agni was born the first of all, like Surya lovely with his light:
Devanāgarī: अग्निर्हि जानि पूर्व्यश्छन्दो न सूरो अर्चिषा
pada pāṭha: agniḥ | hi | jani | pūrvyaḥ | chandaḥ | na | sūraḥ | arciṣā || te | bhānu-bhiḥ | vi | tasthire ||8.7.36||

IAST: te bhānubhir vi tasthire
Griffith: With lustre these have spread abroad.
pada pāṭha: agniḥ | hi | jani | pūrvyaḥ | chandaḥ | na | sūraḥ | arciṣā || te | bhānu-bhiḥ | vi | tasthire ||8.7.36||

IAST: ā no viśvābhir ūtibhir aśvinā gacchataṁ yuvam
Griffith: WITH all the succours that are yours, O Asvins, hither come to us:
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | gacchatam | yuvam || dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī iti hiraṇya-vartanī | pibatam | somyam | madhu ||8.8.1||

IAST: dasrā hiraṇyavartanī pibataṁ somyam madhu
Griffith: Wonderful, borne on paths of gold, drink ye the meath with Soma juice.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | aśvinā | gacchatam | yuvam || dasrā | hiraṇyavartanī iti hiraṇya-vartanī | pibatam | somyam | madhu ||8.8.1||

IAST: ā nūnaṁ yātam aśvinā rathena sūryatvacā
Griffith: Come now, ye Asvins, on your car decked with a sun-bright canopy,
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | yātam | aśvinā | rathena | sūrya-tvacā || bhujī iti | hiraṇya-peśasā | kavī iti | gambhīra-cetasā ||8.8.2||

IAST: bhujī hiraṇyapeśasā kavī gambhīracetasā
Griffith: Bountiful, with your golden forms, Sages with depth of intellect.
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | yātam | aśvinā | rathena | sūrya-tvacā || bhujī iti | hiraṇya-peśasā | kavī iti | gambhīra-cetasā ||8.8.2||

IAST: ā yātaṁ nahuṣas pary āntarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ
Griffith: Come hither from the Nahusas, come, drawn by pure hymns, from mid-air.
pada pāṭha: ā | yātam | nahuṣaḥ | pari | ā | antarikṣāt | suvr̥kti-bhiḥ || pibāthaḥ | aśvinā | madhu | kaṇvānām | savane | sutam ||8.8.3||

IAST: pibātho aśvinā madhu kaṇvānāṁ savane sutam
Griffith: O Asvins, drink the savoury juice shed in the Kanvas' sacrifice.
Devanāgarī: पिबाथो अश्विना मधु कण्वानां सवने सुतम्
pada pāṭha: ā | yātam | nahuṣaḥ | pari | ā | antarikṣāt | suvr̥kti-bhiḥ || pibāthaḥ | aśvinā | madhu | kaṇvānām | savane | sutam ||8.8.3||

IAST: ā no yātaṁ divas pary āntarikṣād adhapriyā
Griffith: Come to us hither from the heavens, come from mid-air, well-loved by us:
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | yātam | divaḥ | pari | ā | antarikṣāt | adha-priyā || putraḥ | kaṇvasya | vām | iha | susāva | somyam | madhu ||8.8.4||

IAST: putraḥ kaṇvasya vām iha suṣāva somyam madhu
Griffith: Here Kanva's son hath pressed for you the pleasant meath of Soma juice.
Devanāgarī: पुत्रः कण्वस्य वामिह सुषाव सोम्यं मधु
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | yātam | divaḥ | pari | ā | antarikṣāt | adha-priyā || putraḥ | kaṇvasya | vām | iha | susāva | somyam | madhu ||8.8.4||

IAST: ā no yātam upaśruty aśvinā somapītaye
Griffith: Come, Asvins, to give car to us, to drink the Soma, Asvins, come.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | yātam | upa-śruti | aśvinā | soma-pītaye || svāhā | stomasya | vardhanā | pra | kavī iti | dhīti-bhiḥ | narā ||8.8.5||

IAST: svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhir narā
Griffith: Hail, Strengtheners of the praise-song speed onward, ye Heroes, with your thoughts.
Devanāgarī: स्वाहा स्तोमस्य वर्धना प्र कवी धीतिभिर्नरा
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | yātam | upa-śruti | aśvinā | soma-pītaye || svāhā | stomasya | vardhanā | pra | kavī iti | dhīti-bhiḥ | narā ||8.8.5||

IAST: yac cid dhi vām pura ṛṣayo juhūre 'vase narā
Griffith: As, Heroes, in the olden time the Rsis called you to their aid,
Devanāgarī: यच्चिद्धि वां पुर ऋषयो जुहूरेऽवसे नरा
pada pāṭha: yat | cit | hi | vām | purā | r̥ṣayaḥ | juhūre | avase | narā || ā | yātam | aśvinā | ā | gatam | upa | imām | su-stutim | mama ||8.8.6||

IAST: ā yātam aśvinā gatam upemāṁ suṣṭutim mama
Griffith: So now, O Asvins, come to us, come near to this mine eulogy.
pada pāṭha: yat | cit | hi | vām | purā | r̥ṣayaḥ | juhūre | avase | narā || ā | yātam | aśvinā | ā | gatam | upa | imām | su-stutim | mama ||8.8.6||

IAST: divaś cid rocanād adhy ā no gantaṁ svarvidā
Griffith: Even from the luminous sphere of heaven come to us, ye who find the light,
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | cit | rocanāt | adhi | ā | naḥ | gantam | svaḥ-vidā || dhībhiḥ | vatsa-pracetasā | stomebhiḥ | havana-śrutā ||8.8.7||

IAST: dhībhir vatsapracetasā stomebhir havanaśrutā
Griffith: Carers for Vatsa, through our prayers and lauds, O yewho hearour call.
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | cit | rocanāt | adhi | ā | naḥ | gantam | svaḥ-vidā || dhībhiḥ | vatsa-pracetasā | stomebhiḥ | havana-śrutā ||8.8.7||

IAST: kim anye pary āsate 'smat stomebhir aśvinā
Griffith: Do others more than we adore the Asvins with their hymns of praise?
pada pāṭha: kim | anye | pari | āsate | asmat | stomebhiḥ | aśvinā || putraḥ | kaṇvasya | vām | r̥ṣiḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vatsaḥ | avīvr̥dhat ||8.8.8||

IAST: putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat
Griffith: The Rsi Vatsa, Kanva's son, hath magnified you with his songs.
pada pāṭha: kim | anye | pari | āsate | asmat | stomebhiḥ | aśvinā || putraḥ | kaṇvasya | vām | r̥ṣiḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vatsaḥ | avīvr̥dhat ||8.8.8||

IAST: ā vāṁ vipra ihāvase 'hvat stomebhir aśvinā
Griffith: The holy singer with his hymns hath called you, Asvins, hither-ward;
pada pāṭha: ā | vām | vipraḥ | iha | avase | ahvat | stomebhiḥ | aśvinā || ariprā | vr̥trahan-tamā | tā | naḥ | bhūtam | mayaḥ-bhuvā ||8.8.9||

IAST: ariprā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam mayobhuvā
Griffith: Best Vrtra-slayers, free from stain, as such bring us felicity.
Devanāgarī: अरिप्रा वृत्रहन्तमा ता नो भूतं मयोभुवा
pada pāṭha: ā | vām | vipraḥ | iha | avase | ahvat | stomebhiḥ | aśvinā || ariprā | vr̥trahan-tamā | tā | naḥ | bhūtam | mayaḥ-bhuvā ||8.8.9||

IAST: ā yad vāṁ yoṣaṇā ratham atiṣṭhad vājinīvasū
Griffith: What time, ye Lords of ample wealth, the Lady mounted on your car,
pada pāṭha: ā | yat | vām | yoṣaṇā | ratham | atiṣṭhat | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū || viśvāni | aśvinā | yuvam | pra | dhītāni | agacchatam ||8.8.10||

IAST: viśvāny aśvinā yuvam pra dhītāny agacchatam
Griffith: Then, O ye Asvins, ye attained all wishes that your hearts desired.
pada pāṭha: ā | yat | vām | yoṣaṇā | ratham | atiṣṭhat | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū || viśvāni | aśvinā | yuvam | pra | dhītāni | agacchatam ||8.8.10||

IAST: ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā
Griffith: Come thence, O Asvins, on your car that hath a thousand ornaments:
pada pāṭha: ataḥ | sahasra-nirnijā | rathena | ā | yātam | aśvinā || vatsaḥ | vām | madhu-mat | vacaḥ | aśaṁsīt | kāvyaḥ | kaviḥ ||8.8.11||

IAST: vatso vām madhumad vaco 'śaṁsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ
Griffith: Vatsa the sage, the sage's son, hath sung a song of sweets to you.
pada pāṭha: ataḥ | sahasra-nirnijā | rathena | ā | yātam | aśvinā || vatsaḥ | vām | madhu-mat | vacaḥ | aśaṁsīt | kāvyaḥ | kaviḥ ||8.8.11||

IAST: purumandrā purūvasū manotarā rayīṇām
Griffith: Cheerers of many, rich in goods, discoverers of opulence,
pada pāṭha: puru-mandrā | puruvasū iti puru-vasū | manotarā | rayīṇām || stomam | me | aśvinau | imam | abhi | vahnī iti | anūṣātām ||8.8.12||

IAST: stomam me aśvināv imam abhi vahnī anūṣātām
Griffith: The Asvins, Riders through the sky, have welcomed this my song of praise.
pada pāṭha: puru-mandrā | puruvasū iti puru-vasū | manotarā | rayīṇām || stomam | me | aśvinau | imam | abhi | vahnī iti | anūṣātām ||8.8.12||

IAST: ā no viśvāny aśvinā dhattaṁ rādhāṁsy ahrayā
Griffith: O Asvins, grant us all rich gifts wherewith no man mav interfere.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśvāni | aśvinā | dhattam | rādhāṁsi | ahrayā || kr̥tam | naḥ | r̥tviya-vataḥ | mā | naḥ | rīradhatam | nide ||8.8.13||

IAST: kṛtaṁ na ṛtviyāvato mā no rīradhataṁ nide
Griffith: Make us observe the stated times: give us not over to reproach.
Devanāgarī: कृतं न ऋत्वियावतो मा नो रीरधतं निदे
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśvāni | aśvinā | dhattam | rādhāṁsi | ahrayā || kr̥tam | naḥ | r̥tviya-vataḥ | mā | naḥ | rīradhatam | nide ||8.8.13||

IAST: yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhy ambare
Griffith: Whether, Nasatyas, ye be nigh, or whether ye be far away,
pada pāṭha: yat | nāsatyā | parā-vati | yat | vā | sthaḥ | adhi | ambare || ataḥ | sahasra-nirnijā | rathena | ā | yātam | aśvinā ||8.8.14||

IAST: ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā
Griffith: Come thence, O Asvins, on your car that hath a thousand ornaments.
pada pāṭha: yat | nāsatyā | parā-vati | yat | vā | sthaḥ | adhi | ambare || ataḥ | sahasra-nirnijā | rathena | ā | yātam | aśvinā ||8.8.14||

IAST: yo vāṁ nāsatyāv ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat
Griffith: Vatsa the Rsi with his songs, Nasatyas, hath exalted you:
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | vām | nāsatyau | r̥ṣiḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vatsaḥ | avīvr̥dhat || tasmai | sahasra-nirnijam | iṣam | dhattam | ghr̥ta-ścutam ||8.8.15||

IAST: tasmai sahasranirṇijam iṣaṁ dhattaṁ ghṛtaścutam
Griffith: Grant him rich food distilling oil, graced with a thousand ornaments.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | vām | nāsatyau | r̥ṣiḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vatsaḥ | avīvr̥dhat || tasmai | sahasra-nirnijam | iṣam | dhattam | ghr̥ta-ścutam ||8.8.15||

IAST: prāsmā ūrjaṁ ghṛtaścutam aśvinā yacchataṁ yuvam
Griffith: Bestow on him, O Asvins, food that strengthens, and that drops with oil,
pada pāṭha: pra | asmai | ūrjam | ghr̥ta-ścutam | aśvinā | yacchatam | yuvam || yaḥ | vām | sumnāya | tustavat | vasu-yāt | dānunaḥ | patī iti ||8.8.16||

IAST: yo vāṁ sumnāya tuṣṭavad vasūyād dānunas patī
Griffith: On him who praises you for bliss, and, Lords of bounty, prays for wealth.
pada pāṭha: pra | asmai | ūrjam | ghr̥ta-ścutam | aśvinā | yacchatam | yuvam || yaḥ | vām | sumnāya | tustavat | vasu-yāt | dānunaḥ | patī iti ||8.8.16||

IAST: ā no gantaṁ riśādasemaṁ stomam purubhujā
Griffith: Come to us, ye who slay the foe, Lords of rich treasure, to this hymn.
Devanāgarī: आ नो गन्तं रिशादसेमं स्तोमं पुरुभुजा
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | gantam | riśādasā | imam | stomam | puru-bhujā || kr̥tam | naḥ | su-śriyaḥ | narā | imā | dātam | abhiṣṭaye ||8.8.17||

IAST: kṛtaṁ naḥ suśriyo naremā dātam abhiṣṭaye
Griffith: O Heroes, give us high renown and these good things of earth for help.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | gantam | riśādasā | imam | stomam | puru-bhujā || kr̥tam | naḥ | su-śriyaḥ | narā | imā | dātam | abhiṣṭaye ||8.8.17||

IAST: ā vāṁ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata
Griffith: The Priyamedhas have invoked you with all succours that are yours,
pada pāṭha: ā | vām | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | priya-medhāḥ | ahūṣata || rājantau | adhvarāṇām | aśvinā | yāma-hūtiṣu ||8.8.18||

IAST: rājantāv adhvarāṇām aśvinā yāmahūtiṣu
Griffith: You, Asvins, Lords of solemn rites, with calls entreating you to come.
pada pāṭha: ā | vām | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | priya-medhāḥ | ahūṣata || rājantau | adhvarāṇām | aśvinā | yāma-hūtiṣu ||8.8.18||

IAST: ā no gantam mayobhuvāśvinā śambhuvā yuvam
Griffith: Come to us, Asvins, ye Who bring felicity, auspicious Ones,
Devanāgarī: आ नो गन्तं मयोभुवाश्विना शम्भुवा युवम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | gantam | mayaḥ-bhuvā | aśvinā | śam-bhuvā | yuvam || yaḥ | vām | vipanyū iti | dhīti-bhiḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vatsaḥ | avīvr̥dhat ||8.8.19||

IAST: yo vāṁ vipanyū dhītibhir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat
Griffith: To Vatsa who with prayer and hymn, lovers of song, hath honoured you.
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | gantam | mayaḥ-bhuvā | aśvinā | śam-bhuvā | yuvam || yaḥ | vām | vipanyū iti | dhīti-bhiḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | vatsaḥ | avīvr̥dhat ||8.8.19||

IAST: yābhiḥ kaṇvam medhātithiṁ yābhir vaśaṁ daśavrajam
Griffith: Aid us, O Heroes, for those hymns for which ye helped GoSarya erst,
pada pāṭha: yābhiḥ | kaṇvam | medha-atithim | yābhiḥ | vaśam | daśa-vrajam || yābhiḥ | go-śaryam | āvatam | tābhiḥ | naḥ | avatam | narā ||8.8.20||

IAST: yābhir gośaryam āvataṁ tābhir no 'vataṁ narā
Griffith: Gave Vasa, Dasavraja aid, and Kanva and Medhatithi:
pada pāṭha: yābhiḥ | kaṇvam | medha-atithim | yābhiḥ | vaśam | daśa-vrajam || yābhiḥ | go-śaryam | āvatam | tābhiḥ | naḥ | avatam | narā ||8.8.20||

IAST: yābhir narā trasadasyum āvataṁ kṛtvye dhane
Griffith: And favoured Trasadasyu, ye Heroes, in spoil-deciding fray:
pada pāṭha: yābhiḥ | narā | trasadasyum | āvatam | kr̥tvye | dhane || tābhiḥ | su | asmān | aśvinā | pra | avatam | vāja-sātaye ||8.8.21||

IAST: tābhiḥ ṣv asmām̐ aśvinā prāvataṁ vājasātaye
Griffith: For these, O Asvins, graciously assist us in acquiring strength.
pada pāṭha: yābhiḥ | narā | trasadasyum | āvatam | kr̥tvye | dhane || tābhiḥ | su | asmān | aśvinā | pra | avatam | vāja-sātaye ||8.8.21||

IAST: pra vāṁ stomāḥ suvṛktayo giro vardhantv aśvinā
Griffith: O Asvins, may pure hymns of ours, and songs and praises, honour you:
Devanāgarī: प्र वां स्तोमाः सुवृक्तयो गिरो वर्धन्त्वश्विना
pada pāṭha: pra | vām | stomāḥ | su-vr̥ktayaḥ | giraḥ | vardhantu | aśvinā || puru-trā | vr̥trahan-tamā | tā | naḥ | bhūtam | puru-spr̥hā ||8.8.22||

IAST: purutrā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam puruspṛhā
Griffith: Best slayers everywhere of foes, as such we fondly yearn for you.
Devanāgarī: पुरुत्रा वृत्रहन्तमा ता नो भूतं पुरुस्पृहा
pada pāṭha: pra | vām | stomāḥ | su-vr̥ktayaḥ | giraḥ | vardhantu | aśvinā || puru-trā | vr̥trahan-tamā | tā | naḥ | bhūtam | puru-spr̥hā ||8.8.22||

IAST: trīṇi padāny aśvinor āviḥ sānti guhā paraḥ
Griffith: Three places of the Asvins, erst concealed, are made apparent now.
pada pāṭha: trīṇi | padāni | aśvinoḥ | āviḥ | santi | guhā | paraḥ || kavī iti | r̥tasya | patma-bhiḥ | arvāk | jīvebhyaḥ | pari ||8.8.23||

IAST: kavī ṛtasya patmabhir arvāg jīvebhyas pari
Griffith: Both Sages, with the flight of Law come hither unto those who live.
pada pāṭha: trīṇi | padāni | aśvinoḥ | āviḥ | santi | guhā | paraḥ || kavī iti | r̥tasya | patma-bhiḥ | arvāk | jīvebhyaḥ | pari ||8.8.23||

IAST: ā nūnam aśvinā yuvaṁ vatsasya gantam avase
Griffith: To help and favour Vatsa now, O Asvins, come ye hitherward.
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | aśvinā | yuvam | vatsasya | gantam | avase || pra | asmai | yacchatam | avr̥kam | pr̥thu | chardiḥ | yuyutam | yāḥ | arātayaḥ ||8.9.1||

IAST: prāsmai yacchatam avṛkam pṛthu cchardir yuyutaṁ yā arātayaḥ
Griffith: Bestow on him a dwelling spacious and secure, and keep malignities away.
Devanāgarī: प्रास्मै यच्छतमवृकं पृथु च्छर्दिर्युयुतं या अरातयः
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | aśvinā | yuvam | vatsasya | gantam | avase || pra | asmai | yacchatam | avr̥kam | pr̥thu | chardiḥ | yuyutam | yāḥ | arātayaḥ ||8.9.1||

IAST: yad antarikṣe yad divi yat pañca mānuṣām̐ anu
Griffith: All manliness that is in heaven, with the Five Tribes, or in mid-air,
pada pāṭha: yat | antarikṣe | yat | divi | yat | pañca | mānuṣān | anu || nr̥mṇam | tat | dhattam | aśvinā ||8.9.2||

IAST: nṛmṇaṁ tad dhattam aśvinā
Griffith: Bestow, ye Asvins, upon us.
pada pāṭha: yat | antarikṣe | yat | divi | yat | pañca | mānuṣān | anu || nr̥mṇam | tat | dhattam | aśvinā ||8.9.2||

IAST: ye vāṁ daṁsāṁsy aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ
Griffith: Remember Kanva first of all among the singers, Asvins, who
pada pāṭha: ye | vām | daṁsāṁsi | aśvinā | viprāsaḥ | pari-mamr̥śuḥ || eva | it | kāṇvasya | bodhatam ||8.9.3||

IAST: evet kāṇvasya bodhatam
Griffith: Have thought upon your wondrous deeds.
pada pāṭha: ye | vām | daṁsāṁsi | aśvinā | viprāsaḥ | pari-mamr̥śuḥ || eva | it | kāṇvasya | bodhatam ||8.9.3||

IAST: ayaṁ vāṁ gharmo aśvinā stomena pari ṣicyate
Griffith: Asvins, for you with song of praise this hot oblation is effused,
Devanāgarī: अयं वां घर्मो अश्विना स्तोमेन परि षिच्यते
pada pāṭha: ayam | vām | gharmaḥ | aśvinā | stomena | pari | sicyate || ayam | somaḥ | madhu-mān | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū | yena | vr̥tram | ciketathaḥ ||8.9.4||

IAST: ayaṁ somo madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtraṁ ciketathaḥ
Griffith: This your sweet Soma juice, ye Lords of ample wealth, through which ye think upon the foe.
Devanāgarī: अयं सोमो मधुमान्वाजिनीवसू येन वृत्रं चिकेतथः
pada pāṭha: ayam | vām | gharmaḥ | aśvinā | stomena | pari | sicyate || ayam | somaḥ | madhu-mān | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū | yena | vr̥tram | ciketathaḥ ||8.9.4||

IAST: yad apsu yad vanaspatau yad oṣadhīṣu purudaṁsasā kṛtam
Griffith: Whatever ye have done in floods, in the tree, Wonder-Workers, and in growing plants,
pada pāṭha: yat | ap-su | yat | vanaspatau | yat | oṣadhīṣu | puru-daṁsasā | kr̥tam || tena | mā | aviṣṭam | aśvinā ||8.9.5||

IAST: tena māviṣṭam aśvinā
Griffith: Therewith, O Asvins, succour me.
pada pāṭha: yat | ap-su | yat | vanaspatau | yat | oṣadhīṣu | puru-daṁsasā | kr̥tam || tena | mā | aviṣṭam | aśvinā ||8.9.5||

IAST: yan nāsatyā bhuraṇyatho yad vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ
Griffith: What force, Nasatyas, ye exert, whatever, Gods, ye tend and heal,
pada pāṭha: yat | nāsatyā | bhuraṇyathaḥ | yat | vā | devā | bhiṣajyathaḥ || ayam | vām | vatsaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | na | vindhate | haviṣmantam | hi | gacchathaḥ ||8.9.6||

IAST: ayaṁ vāṁ vatso matibhir na vindhate haviṣmantaṁ hi gacchathaḥ
Griffith: This your own Vatsa gains not by his hymns alone: ye visit him who offers gifts.
Devanāgarī: अयं वां वत्सो मतिभिर्न विन्धते हविष्मन्तं हि गच्छथः
pada pāṭha: yat | nāsatyā | bhuraṇyathaḥ | yat | vā | devā | bhiṣajyathaḥ || ayam | vām | vatsaḥ | mati-bhiḥ | na | vindhate | haviṣmantam | hi | gacchathaḥ ||8.9.6||

IAST: ā nūnam aśvinor ṛṣiḥ stomaṁ ciketa vāmayā
Griffith: Now hath the Rsi splendidly thought out the Asvins' hymn of praise.
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | aśvinoḥ | r̥ṣiḥ | stomam | ciketa | vāmayā || ā | somam | madhumat-tamam | gharmam | siñcāt | atharvaṇi ||8.9.7||

IAST: ā somam madhumattamaṁ gharmaṁ siñcād atharvaṇi
Griffith: Let the Atharvan pour the warm oblation forth, and Soma very rich in sweets.
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | aśvinoḥ | r̥ṣiḥ | stomam | ciketa | vāmayā || ā | somam | madhumat-tamam | gharmam | siñcāt | atharvaṇi ||8.9.7||

IAST: ā nūnaṁ raghuvartaniṁ rathaṁ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā
Griffith: Ye Asvins, now ascend your car that lightly rolls upon its way.
Devanāgarī: आ नूनं रघुवर्तनिं रथं तिष्ठाथो अश्विना
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | raghu-vartanim | ratham | tiṣṭhāthaḥ | aśvinā || ā | vām | stomāḥ | ime | mama | nabhaḥ | na | cucyavīrata ||8.9.8||

IAST: ā vāṁ stomā ime mama nabho na cucyavīrata
Griffith: May these my praises make you speed hitherward like a cloud of heaven.
Devanāgarī: आ वां स्तोमा इमे मम नभो न चुच्यवीरत
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | raghu-vartanim | ratham | tiṣṭhāthaḥ | aśvinā || ā | vām | stomāḥ | ime | mama | nabhaḥ | na | cucyavīrata ||8.9.8||

IAST: yad adya vāṁ nāsatyokthair ācucyuvīmahi
Griffith: When, O Nasatyas, we this day make you speed hither with our hymns,
pada pāṭha: yat | adya | vām | nāsatyā | ukthaiḥ | ā-cucyuvīmahi || yat | vā | vāṇībhiḥ | aśvinā | eva | it | kāṇvasya | bodhatam ||8.9.9||

IAST: yad vā vāṇībhir aśvinevet kāṇvasya bodhatam
Griffith: Or, Asvins, with our songs of praise, remember Kanya specially.
pada pāṭha: yat | adya | vām | nāsatyā | ukthaiḥ | ā-cucyuvīmahi || yat | vā | vāṇībhiḥ | aśvinā | eva | it | kāṇvasya | bodhatam ||8.9.9||

IAST: yad vāṁ kakṣīvām̐ uta yad vyaśva ṛṣir yad vāṁ dīrghatamā juhāva
Griffith: As erst Kaksivan and the Rsi Vyasva, as erst Dirghatamas invoked your presence,
Devanāgarī: यद्वां कक्षीवाँ उत यद्व्यश्व ऋषिर्यद्वां दीर्घतमा जुहाव
pada pāṭha: yat | vām | kakṣīvān | uta | yat | vi-aśvaḥ | r̥ṣiḥ | yat | vām | dīrgha-tamāḥ | juhāva || pr̥thī | yat | vām | vainyaḥ | sadaneṣu | eva | it | ataḥ | aśvinā | cetayethām ||8.9.10||

IAST: pṛthī yad vāṁ vainyaḥ sādaneṣv eved ato aśvinā cetayethām
Griffith: Or, in the sacrificial chambers, Vainya Prthi, so be ye mindful of us here, O Asvins.
Devanāgarī: पृथी यद्वां वैन्यः सादनेष्वेवेदतो अश्विना चेतयेथाम्
pada pāṭha: yat | vām | kakṣīvān | uta | yat | vi-aśvaḥ | r̥ṣiḥ | yat | vām | dīrgha-tamāḥ | juhāva || pr̥thī | yat | vām | vainyaḥ | sadaneṣu | eva | it | ataḥ | aśvinā | cetayethām ||8.9.10||

IAST: yātaṁ chardiṣpā uta naḥ paraspā bhūtaṁ jagatpā uta nas tanūpā
Griffith: Come as home-guardians, saving us from foemen, guarding our living creatures and our bodies,
Devanāgarī: यातं छर्दिष्पा उत नः परस्पा भूतं जगत्पा उत नस्तनूपा
pada pāṭha: yātam | chardiḥ-pau | uta | naḥ | paraḥ-pā | bhūtam | jagat-pau | uta | naḥ | tanū-pā || vartiḥ | tokāya | tanayāya | yātam ||8.9.11||

IAST: vartis tokāya tanayāya yātam
Griffith: Come to the house to give us seed and offspring,
pada pāṭha: yātam | chardiḥ-pau | uta | naḥ | paraḥ-pā | bhūtam | jagat-pau | uta | naḥ | tanū-pā || vartiḥ | tokāya | tanayāya | yātam ||8.9.11||

IAST: yad indreṇa sarathaṁ yātho aśvinā yad vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ samokasā
Griffith: Whether with Indra ye be faring, Asvins, or resting in one dwelling-place with Vayu,
Devanāgarī: यदिन्द्रेण सरथं याथो अश्विना यद्वा वायुना भवथः समोकसा
pada pāṭha: yat | indreṇa | sa-ratham | yāthaḥ | aśvinā | yat | vā | vāyunā | bhavathaḥ | sam-okasā || yat | ādityebhiḥ | r̥bhu-bhiḥ | sa-joṣasā | yat | vā | viṣṇoḥ | vi-kramaṇeṣu | tiṣṭhathaḥ ||8.9.12||

IAST: yad ādityebhir ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yad vā viṣṇor vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ
Griffith: In concord with the Rbhus or Adityas, or standing still in Visnu's striding-places.
pada pāṭha: yat | indreṇa | sa-ratham | yāthaḥ | aśvinā | yat | vā | vāyunā | bhavathaḥ | sam-okasā || yat | ādityebhiḥ | r̥bhu-bhiḥ | sa-joṣasā | yat | vā | viṣṇoḥ | vi-kramaṇeṣu | tiṣṭhathaḥ ||8.9.12||

IAST: yad adyāśvināv ahaṁ huveya vājasātaye
Griffith: When I, O Asvins, call on you to-day that I may gather strength,
pada pāṭha: yat | adya | aśvinau | aham | huveya | vāja-sātaye || yat | pr̥t-su | turvaṇe | sahaḥ | tat | śreṣṭham | aśvinoḥ | avaḥ ||8.9.13||

IAST: yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahas tac chreṣṭham aśvinor avaḥ
Griffith: Or as all-conquering might in war, be that the Asvins' noblest grace.
pada pāṭha: yat | adya | aśvinau | aham | huveya | vāja-sātaye || yat | pr̥t-su | turvaṇe | sahaḥ | tat | śreṣṭham | aśvinoḥ | avaḥ ||8.9.13||

IAST: ā nūnaṁ yātam aśvinemā havyāni vāṁ hitā
Griffith: Now come, ye Asvins, hitherward: here are oblations set for you;
Devanāgarī: आ नूनं यातमश्विनेमा हव्यानि वां हिता
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | yātam | aśvinā | imā | havyāni | vām | hitā || ime | somāsaḥ | adhi | turvaśe | yadau | ime | kaṇveṣu | vām | atha ||8.9.14||

IAST: ime somāso adhi turvaśe yadāv ime kaṇveṣu vām atha
Griffith: These Soma-draughts to aid Yadu and Turvasa, these offered you mid Kaniva's Sons.
Devanāgarī: इमे सोमासो अधि तुर्वशे यदाविमे कण्वेषु वामथ
pada pāṭha: ā | nūnam | yātam | aśvinā | imā | havyāni | vām | hitā || ime | somāsaḥ | adhi | turvaśe | yadau | ime | kaṇveṣu | vām | atha ||8.9.14||

IAST: yan nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam
Griffith: Whatever healing balm is yours, Nisatyas, near or far away,
pada pāṭha: yat | nāsatyā | parāke | arvāke | asti | bheṣajam || tena | nūnam | vi-madāya | pra-cetasā | chardiḥ | vatsāya | yacchatam ||8.9.15||

IAST: tena nūnaṁ vimadāya pracetasā chardir vatsāya yacchatam
Griffith: Therewith, great Sages, grant a home to Vatsa and to Vimada.
Devanāgarī: तेन नूनं विमदाय प्रचेतसा छर्दिर्वत्साय यच्छतम्
pada pāṭha: yat | nāsatyā | parāke | arvāke | asti | bheṣajam || tena | nūnam | vi-madāya | pra-cetasā | chardiḥ | vatsāya | yacchatam ||8.9.15||

IAST: abhutsy u pra devyā sākaṁ vācāham aśvinoḥ
Griffith: Together with the Goddess, with the Asvins' Speech have I awoke.
pada pāṭha: abhutsi | ūm̐ iti | pra | devyā | sākam | vācā | aham | aśvinoḥ || vi | āvaḥ | devi | ā | matim | vi | rātim | martyebhyaḥ ||8.9.16||

IAST: vy āvar devy ā matiṁ vi rātim martyebhyaḥ
Griffith: Thou, Goddess, hast disclosed the hymn, and holy gift from mortal men.
pada pāṭha: abhutsi | ūm̐ iti | pra | devyā | sākam | vācā | aham | aśvinoḥ || vi | āvaḥ | devi | ā | matim | vi | rātim | martyebhyaḥ ||8.9.16||

IAST: pra bodhayoṣo aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi
Griffith: Awake the Asvins, Goddess Dawn! Up Mighty Lady of sweet strains!
Devanāgarī: प्र बोधयोषो अश्विना प्र देवि सूनृते महि
pada pāṭha: pra | bodhaya | uṣaḥ | aśvinā | pra | devi | sūnr̥te | mahi || pra | yajña-hotaḥ | ānuṣak | pra | madāya | śravaḥ | br̥hat ||8.9.17||

IAST: pra yajñahotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravo bṛhat
Griffith: Rise, straightway, priest of sacrifice! High glory to the gladdening draught!
pada pāṭha: pra | bodhaya | uṣaḥ | aśvinā | pra | devi | sūnr̥te | mahi || pra | yajña-hotaḥ | ānuṣak | pra | madāya | śravaḥ | br̥hat ||8.9.17||

IAST: yad uṣo yāsi bhānunā saṁ sūryeṇa rocase
Griffith: Thou, Dawn, approaching with thy light shinest together with the Sun,
Devanāgarī: यदुषो यासि भानुना सं सूर्येण रोचसे
pada pāṭha: yat | uṣaḥ | yāsi | bhānunā | sam | sūryeṇa | rocase || ā | ha | ayam | aśvinoḥ | rathaḥ | vartiḥ | yāti | nr̥-pāyyam ||8.9.18||

IAST: ā hāyam aśvino ratho vartir yāti nṛpāyyam
Griffith: And to this man-protecting home the chariot of the Asvins comes.
pada pāṭha: yat | uṣaḥ | yāsi | bhānunā | sam | sūryeṇa | rocase || ā | ha | ayam | aśvinoḥ | rathaḥ | vartiḥ | yāti | nr̥-pāyyam ||8.9.18||

IAST: yad āpītāso aṁśavo gāvo na duhra ūdhabhiḥ
Griffith: When yellow stalks give forth the juice, as cows from udders pour their milk,
Devanāgarī: यदापीतासो अंशवो गावो न दुह्र ऊधभिः
pada pāṭha: yat | ā-pītāsaḥ | aṁśavaḥ | gāvaḥ | na | duhre | ūdha-bhiḥ || yat | vā | vāṇīḥ | anūṣata | pra | deva-yantaḥ | aśvinā ||8.9.19||

IAST: yad vā vāṇīr anūṣata pra devayanto aśvinā
Griffith: And voices sound the song of praise, the Asvins' worshippers show first.
pada pāṭha: yat | ā-pītāsaḥ | aṁśavaḥ | gāvaḥ | na | duhre | ūdha-bhiḥ || yat | vā | vāṇīḥ | anūṣata | pra | deva-yantaḥ | aśvinā ||8.9.19||

IAST: pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe
Griffith: Forward for glory and for strength, protection that shall conquer men,
Devanāgarī: प्र द्युम्नाय प्र शवसे प्र नृषाह्याय शर्मणे
pada pāṭha: pra | dyumnāya | pra | śavase | pra | nr̥-sahyāya | śarmaṇe || pra | dakṣāya | pra-cetasā ||8.9.20||

IAST: pra dakṣāya pracetasā
Griffith: And power and skill, most sapient Ones!
pada pāṭha: pra | dyumnāya | pra | śavase | pra | nr̥-sahyāya | śarmaṇe || pra | dakṣāya | pra-cetasā ||8.9.20||

IAST: yan nūnaṁ dhībhir aśvinā pitur yonā niṣīdathaḥ
Griffith: When Asvins, worthy of our lauds, ye seat you in the father's house.
pada pāṭha: yat | nūnam | dhībhiḥ | aśvinā | pituḥ | yonā | ni-sīdathaḥ || yat | vā | sumnebhiḥ | ukthyā ||8.9.21||

IAST: yad vā sumnebhir ukthyā
Griffith: With wisdom or the bliss ye bring.
pada pāṭha: yat | nūnam | dhībhiḥ | aśvinā | pituḥ | yonā | ni-sīdathaḥ || yat | vā | sumnebhiḥ | ukthyā ||8.9.21||

IAST: yat stho dīrghaprasadmani yad vādo rocane divaḥ
Griffith: WHETHER ye travel far away or dwell in yonder light of heaven,
pada pāṭha: yat | sthaḥ | dīrgha-prasadmani | yat | vā | adaḥ | rocane | divaḥ || yat | vā | samudre | adhi | ā-kr̥te | gr̥he | ataḥ | ā | yātam | aśvinā ||8.10.1||

IAST: yad vā samudre adhy ākṛte gṛhe 'ta ā yātam aśvinā
Griffith: Or in a mansion that is built above the sea, come thence, ye Asvins, hitherward.
Devanāgarī: यद्वा समुद्रे अध्याकृते गृहेऽत आ यातमश्विना
pada pāṭha: yat | sthaḥ | dīrgha-prasadmani | yat | vā | adaḥ | rocane | divaḥ || yat | vā | samudre | adhi | ā-kr̥te | gr̥he | ataḥ | ā | yātam | aśvinā ||8.10.1||

IAST: yad vā yajñam manave sammimikṣathur evet kāṇvasya bodhatam
Griffith: Or if for Manu.ye prepared the sacrifice, remember also Kanva's son.
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | yajñam | manave | sam-mimikṣathuḥ | eva | it | kāṇvasya | bodhatam || br̥haspatim | viśvān | devān | aham | huve | indrāviṣṇū iti | aśvinau | āśu-heṣasā ||8.10.2||

IAST: bṛhaspatiṁ viśvān devām̐ ahaṁ huva indrāviṣṇū aśvināv āśuheṣasā
Griffith: I call Brhaspati, Indra, Visnu, all the gods, the Asvins borne by rapid steeds.
Devanāgarī: बृहस्पतिं विश्वान्देवाँ अहं हुव इन्द्राविष्णू अश्विनावाशुहेषसा
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | yajñam | manave | sam-mimikṣathuḥ | eva | it | kāṇvasya | bodhatam || br̥haspatim | viśvān | devān | aham | huve | indrāviṣṇū iti | aśvinau | āśu-heṣasā ||8.10.2||

IAST: tyā nv aśvinā huve sudaṁsasā gṛbhe kṛtā
Griffith: Those Asvins I invoke who work marvels, brought hither to receive,
Devanāgarī: त्या न्वश्विना हुवे सुदंससा गृभे कृता
pada pāṭha: tyā | nu | aśvinā | huve | su-daṁsasā | gr̥bhe | kr̥tā || yayoḥ | asti | pra | naḥ | sakhyam | deveṣu | adhi | āpyam ||8.10.3||

IAST: yayor asti pra ṇaḥ sakhyaṁ deveṣv adhy āpyam
Griffith: With whom our friendship is most famed, and kinship passing that of Gods.
pada pāṭha: tyā | nu | aśvinā | huve | su-daṁsasā | gr̥bhe | kr̥tā || yayoḥ | asti | pra | naḥ | sakhyam | deveṣu | adhi | āpyam ||8.10.3||

IAST: yayor adhi pra yajñā asūre santi sūrayaḥ
Griffith: On whom the solemn rites depend, whose worshippers rise without the Sun:
Devanāgarī: ययोरधि प्र यज्ञा असूरे सन्ति सूरयः
pada pāṭha: yayoḥ | adhi | pra | yajñāḥ | asūre | santi | sūrayaḥ || tā | yajñasya | adhvarasya | pra-cetasā | svadhābhiḥ | yā | pibataḥ | somyam | madhu ||8.10.4||

IAST: tā yajñasyādhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhir yā pibataḥ somyam madhu
Griffith: These who foreknow the holy work of sacrifice, and by their Godhead drink the sweets of Soma juice.
Devanāgarī: ता यज्ञस्याध्वरस्य प्रचेतसा स्वधाभिर्या पिबतः सोम्यं मधु
pada pāṭha: yayoḥ | adhi | pra | yajñāḥ | asūre | santi | sūrayaḥ || tā | yajñasya | adhvarasya | pra-cetasā | svadhābhiḥ | yā | pibataḥ | somyam | madhu ||8.10.4||

IAST: yad adyāśvināv apāg yat prāk stho vājinīvasū
Griffith: Whether ye, Lords of ample wealth, now linger in the cast or west,
pada pāṭha: yat | adya | aśvinau | apāk | yat | prāk | sthaḥ | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū || yat | druhyavi | anavi | turvaśe | yadau | huve | vām | atha | mā | ā | gatam ||8.10.5||

IAST: yad druhyavy anavi turvaśe yadau huve vām atha mā gatam
Griffith: With Druhyu, or with Anu, Yadu, Turvaga, I call you hither; come to me.
Devanāgarī: यद्द्रुह्यव्यनवि तुर्वशे यदौ हुवे वामथ मा गतम्
pada pāṭha: yat | adya | aśvinau | apāk | yat | prāk | sthaḥ | vājinīvasū iti vājinī-vasū || yat | druhyavi | anavi | turvaśe | yadau | huve | vām | atha | mā | ā | gatam ||8.10.5||

IAST: yad antarikṣe patathaḥ purubhujā yad veme rodasī anu
Griffith: Lords of great riches, whether through the firmament ye fly or speed through heaven and earth,
Devanāgarī: यदन्तरिक्षे पतथः पुरुभुजा यद्वेमे रोदसी अनु
pada pāṭha: yat | antarikṣe | patathaḥ | puru-bhujā | yat | vā | ime iti | rodasī iti | anu || yat | vā | svadhābhiḥ | adhi-tiṣṭhathaḥ | ratham | ataḥ | ā | yātam | aśvinā ||8.10.6||

IAST: yad vā svadhābhir adhitiṣṭhatho ratham ata ā yātam aśvinā
Griffith: Or with your Godlike natures stand upon your cars, come thence, O Asvins, hitherward.
pada pāṭha: yat | antarikṣe | patathaḥ | puru-bhujā | yat | vā | ime iti | rodasī iti | anu || yat | vā | svadhābhiḥ | adhi-tiṣṭhathaḥ | ratham | ataḥ | ā | yātam | aśvinā ||8.10.6||

IAST: tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā
Griffith: THOU Agni, God mid mortal men, art guard of sacred rites, thou art
Devanāgarī: त्वमग्ने व्रतपा असि देव आ मर्त्येष्वा
pada pāṭha: tvam | agne | vrata-pāḥ | asi | devaḥ | ā | martyeṣu | ā || tvam | yajñeṣu | īḍyaḥ ||8.11.1||

IAST: tvaṁ yajñeṣv īḍyaḥ
Griffith: To be adored at sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: tvam | agne | vrata-pāḥ | asi | devaḥ | ā | martyeṣu | ā || tvam | yajñeṣu | īḍyaḥ ||8.11.1||

IAST: tvam asi praśasyo vidatheṣu sahantya
Griffith: O Mighty Agni, thou must be glorified at our festivals,
pada pāṭha: tvam | asi | pra-śasyaḥ | vidatheṣu | sahantya || agne | rathīḥ | adhvarāṇām ||8.11.2||

IAST: agne rathīr adhvarāṇām
Griffith: Bearing our offerings to the Gods.
pada pāṭha: tvam | asi | pra-śasyaḥ | vidatheṣu | sahantya || agne | rathīḥ | adhvarāṇām ||8.11.2||

IAST: sa tvam asmad apa dviṣo yuyodhi jātavedaḥ
Griffith: O Jatavedas Agni, fight and drive our foes afar from us,
pada pāṭha: saḥ | tvam | asmat | apa | dviṣaḥ | yuyodhi | jāta-vedaḥ || adevīḥ | agne | arātīḥ ||8.11.3||

IAST: adevīr agne arātīḥ
Griffith: Themand their godless enmities.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | tvam | asmat | apa | dviṣaḥ | yuyodhi | jāta-vedaḥ || adevīḥ | agne | arātīḥ ||8.11.3||

IAST: anti cit santam aha yajñam martasya ripoḥ
Griffith: Thou, Jatavedas, seekest not the worship of a hostile man,
pada pāṭha: anti | cit | santam | aha | yajñam | martasya | ripoḥ || na | upa | veṣi | jāta-vedaḥ ||8.11.4||

IAST: nopa veṣi jātavedaḥ
Griffith: However nigh itbe to thee.
pada pāṭha: anti | cit | santam | aha | yajñam | martasya | ripoḥ || na | upa | veṣi | jāta-vedaḥ ||8.11.4||

IAST: martā amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe
Griffith: We sages, mortals as we are, adore the mighty name oof thee,
Devanāgarī: मर्ता अमर्त्यस्य ते भूरि नाम मनामहे
pada pāṭha: martāḥ | amartyasya | te | bhūri | nāma | manāmahe || viprāsaḥ | jāta-vedasaḥ ||8.11.5||

IAST: viprāso jātavedasaḥ
Griffith: Immortal Jatavedas' name.
pada pāṭha: martāḥ | amartyasya | te | bhūri | nāma | manāmahe || viprāsaḥ | jāta-vedasaḥ ||8.11.5||

IAST: vipraṁ viprāso 'vase devam martāsa ūtaye
Griffith: Sages, we call the Sage to help, mortals, we call the God to aid:
pada pāṭha: vipram | viprāsaḥ | avase | devam | martāsaḥ | ūtaye || agnim | gīḥ-bhiḥ | havāmahe ||8.11.6||

IAST: agniṁ gīrbhir havāmahe
Griffith: We call on Agni with our songs.
pada pāṭha: vipram | viprāsaḥ | avase | devam | martāsaḥ | ūtaye || agnim | gīḥ-bhiḥ | havāmahe ||8.11.6||

IAST: ā te vatso mano yamat paramāc cit sadhasthāt
Griffith: May Vatsa draw- thy mind away even from thy loftiest dwelling-place,
pada pāṭha: ā | te | vatsaḥ | manaḥ | yamat | paramāt | cit | sadha-sthāt || agne | tvām-kāmayā | girā ||8.11.7||

IAST: agne tvāṁkāmayā girā
Griffith: Agni, with song that yearns for thee.
pada pāṭha: ā | te | vatsaḥ | manaḥ | yamat | paramāt | cit | sadha-sthāt || agne | tvām-kāmayā | girā ||8.11.7||

IAST: purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ
Griffith: Thou art the same in many a place: mid all the people thou art Lord.
Devanāgarī: पुरुत्रा हि सदृङ्ङसि विशो विश्वा अनु प्रभुः
pada pāṭha: puru-trā | hi | sa-dr̥ṅ | asi | viśaḥ | viśvāḥ | anu | pra-bhuḥ || samat-su | tvā | havāmahe ||8.11.8||

IAST: samatsu tvā havāmahe
Griffith: In fray and fightt we call on thee.
pada pāṭha: puru-trā | hi | sa-dr̥ṅ | asi | viśaḥ | viśvāḥ | anu | pra-bhuḥ || samat-su | tvā | havāmahe ||8.11.8||

IAST: samatsv agnim avase vājayanto havāmahe
Griffith: When we are seeking strength we call Agni to help us in the strife,
pada pāṭha: samat-su | agnim | avase | vāja-yantaḥ | havāmahe || vājeṣu | citra-rādhasam ||8.11.9||

IAST: vājeṣu citrarādhasam
Griffith: The giver of rich gifts in war.
pada pāṭha: samat-su | agnim | avase | vāja-yantaḥ | havāmahe || vājeṣu | citra-rādhasam ||8.11.9||

IAST: pratno hi kam īḍyo adhvareṣu sanāc ca hotā navyaś ca satsi
Griffith: Ancient, adorablie at sacrifices, Priest from of old, meet for our praise, thou sittest.
Devanāgarī: प्रत्नो हि कमीड्यो अध्वरेषु सनाच्च होता नव्यश्च सत्सि
pada pāṭha: pratnaḥ | hi | kam | īḍyaḥ | adhvareṣu | sanāt | ca | hotā | navyaḥ | ca | satsi || svām | ca | agne | tanvam | piprayasva | asmabhyam | ca | saubhagam | ā | yajasva ||8.11.10||

IAST: svāṁ cāgne tanvam piprayasvāsmabhyaṁ ca saubhagam ā yajasva
Griffith: Fill full and satisfy thy body, Agni, and win us happiness by offering worship.
Devanāgarī: स्वां चाग्ने तन्वं पिप्रयस्वास्मभ्यं च सौभगमा यजस्व
pada pāṭha: pratnaḥ | hi | kam | īḍyaḥ | adhvareṣu | sanāt | ca | hotā | navyaḥ | ca | satsi || svām | ca | agne | tanvam | piprayasva | asmabhyam | ca | saubhagam | ā | yajasva ||8.11.10||

IAST: ya indra somapātamo madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati
Griffith: JOY, Mightiest Indra, known and marked, sprung most from Soma-draughts, wherewith
Devanāgarī: य इन्द्र सोमपातमो मदः शविष्ठ चेतति
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | indra | soma-pātamaḥ | madaḥ | śaviṣṭha | cetati || yena | haṁsi | ni | atriṇam | tam | īmahe ||8.12.1||

IAST: yenā haṁsi ny atriṇaṁ tam īmahe
Griffith: Thou smitest down the greedy fiend, for that we long.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | indra | soma-pātamaḥ | madaḥ | śaviṣṭha | cetati || yena | haṁsi | ni | atriṇam | tam | īmahe ||8.12.1||

IAST: yenā daśagvam adhriguṁ vepayantaṁ svarṇaram
Griffith: Wherewith thou bolpest Adhrigu, the great Dasagva, and the God
pada pāṭha: yena | daśa-gvam | adhri-gum | vepayantam | svaḥ-naram || yena | samudram | āvitha | tam | īmahe ||8.12.2||

IAST: yenā samudram āvithā tam īmahe
Griffith: Who stirs the sunlight, and the sea, for that we long.
pada pāṭha: yena | daśa-gvam | adhri-gum | vepayantam | svaḥ-naram || yena | samudram | āvitha | tam | īmahe ||8.12.2||

IAST: yena sindhum mahīr apo rathām̐ iva pracodayaḥ
Griffith: Wherewith thou dravest forth like cars Sindhu and all the mighty floods
Devanāgarī: येन सिन्धुं महीरपो रथाँ इव प्रचोदयः
pada pāṭha: yena | sindhum | mahīḥ | apaḥ | rathān-iva | pra-codayaḥ || panthām | r̥tasya | yātave | tam | īmahe ||8.12.3||

IAST: panthām ṛtasya yātave tam īmahe
Griffith: To go the way ordained by Law, for that we long.
pada pāṭha: yena | sindhum | mahīḥ | apaḥ | rathān-iva | pra-codayaḥ || panthām | r̥tasya | yātave | tam | īmahe ||8.12.3||

IAST: imaṁ stomam abhiṣṭaye ghṛtaṁ na pūtam adrivaḥ
Griffith: Accept this laud for aid, made pure like oil, thou Caster of the Stone,
pada pāṭha: imam | stomam | abhiṣṭaye | ghr̥tam | na | pūtam | adri-vaḥ || yena | nu | sadyaḥ | ojasā | vavakṣitha ||8.12.4||

IAST: yenā nu sadya ojasā vavakṣitha
Griffith: Whereby even in a moment thou hast waxen great.
pada pāṭha: imam | stomam | abhiṣṭaye | ghr̥tam | na | pūtam | adri-vaḥ || yena | nu | sadyaḥ | ojasā | vavakṣitha ||8.12.4||

IAST: imaṁ juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudra iva pinvate
Griffith: Be pleased, Song-lover, with this song it flows abundant like the sea.
Devanāgarī: इमं जुषस्व गिर्वणः समुद्र इव पिन्वते
pada pāṭha: imam | juṣasva | girvaṇaḥ | samudraḥ-iva | pinvate || indra | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | vavakṣitha ||8.12.5||

IAST: indra viśvābhir ūtibhir vavakṣitha
Griffith: Indra, with all thy succours thou hast waxen great.
pada pāṭha: imam | juṣasva | girvaṇaḥ | samudraḥ-iva | pinvate || indra | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | vavakṣitha ||8.12.5||

IAST: yo no devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe
Griffith: The God who from afar hath sent gifts to maintain our friendship's bond,
Devanāgarī: यो नो देवः परावतः सखित्वनाय मामहे
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | naḥ | devaḥ | parā-vataḥ | sakhi-tvanāya | mamahe || divaḥ | na | vr̥ṣṭim | prathayan | vavakṣitha ||8.12.6||

IAST: divo na vṛṣṭim prathayan vavakṣitha
Griffith: Thou. spreading them like rain from heaven, hast waxen great.
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | naḥ | devaḥ | parā-vataḥ | sakhi-tvanāya | mamahe || divaḥ | na | vr̥ṣṭim | prathayan | vavakṣitha ||8.12.6||

IAST: vavakṣur asya ketava uta vajro gabhastyoḥ
Griffith: The beams that mark him have grown strong, the thunder rests between his arms,
pada pāṭha: vavakṣuḥ | asya | ketavaḥ | uta | vajraḥ | gabhastyoḥ || yat | sūryaḥ | na | rodasī iti | avardhayat ||8.12.7||

IAST: yat sūryo na rodasī avardhayat
Griffith: When, like the Sun, he hath increased both Heaven and Earth.
pada pāṭha: vavakṣuḥ | asya | ketavaḥ | uta | vajraḥ | gabhastyoḥ || yat | sūryaḥ | na | rodasī iti | avardhayat ||8.12.7||

IAST: yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasram mahiṣām̐ aghaḥ
Griffith: When, Mighty Lord of Heroes, thou didst cat a thousand buffaloes,
Devanāgarī: यदि प्रवृद्ध सत्पते सहस्रं महिषाँ अघः
pada pāṭha: yadi | pra-vr̥ddha | sat-pate | sahasram | mahiṣān | aghaḥ || āt | it | te | indriyam | mahi | pra | vavr̥dhe ||8.12.8||

IAST: ād it ta indriyam mahi pra vāvṛdhe
Griffith: Then grew and waxed exceeding great thine Indra-power.
pada pāṭha: yadi | pra-vr̥ddha | sat-pate | sahasram | mahiṣān | aghaḥ || āt | it | te | indriyam | mahi | pra | vavr̥dhe ||8.12.8||

IAST: indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhir ny arśasānam oṣati
Griffith: Indra consumeth with the rays of Surya the malicious man:
pada pāṭha: indraḥ | sūryasya | raśmi-bhiḥ | ni | arśasānam | oṣati || agniḥ | vanā-iva | sasahiḥ | pra | vavr̥dhe ||8.12.9||

IAST: agnir vaneva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe
Griffith: Like Agni conquering the woods, he hath grown strong.
pada pāṭha: indraḥ | sūryasya | raśmi-bhiḥ | ni | arśasānam | oṣati || agniḥ | vanā-iva | sasahiḥ | pra | vavr̥dhe ||8.12.9||

IAST: iyaṁ ta ṛtviyāvatī dhītir eti navīyasī
Griffith: This newest thought of ours that suits the time approaches unto thee:
pada pāṭha: iyam | te | r̥tviya-vatī | dhītiḥ | eti | navīyasī || saparyantī | puru-priyā | mimīte | it ||8.12.10||

IAST: saparyantī purupriyā mimīta it
Griffith: Serving, beloved in many a place it metes and marks.
pada pāṭha: iyam | te | r̥tviya-vatī | dhītiḥ | eti | navīyasī || saparyantī | puru-priyā | mimīte | it ||8.12.10||

IAST: garbho yajñasya devayuḥ kratum punīta ānuṣak
Griffith: The pious germ of sacrifice directly purifies the soul.
Devanāgarī: गर्भो यज्ञस्य देवयुः क्रतुं पुनीत आनुषक्
pada pāṭha: garbhaḥ | yajñasya | deva-yuḥ | kratum | punīte | ānuṣak || stomaiḥ | indrasya | vavr̥dhe | mimīte | it ||8.12.11||

IAST: stomair indrasya vāvṛdhe mimīta it
Griffith: By Indra's lauds it waxes great, it metes and marks.
pada pāṭha: garbhaḥ | yajñasya | deva-yuḥ | kratum | punīte | ānuṣak || stomaiḥ | indrasya | vavr̥dhe | mimīte | it ||8.12.11||

IAST: sanir mitrasya papratha indraḥ somasya pītaye
Griffith: Indra who wins the friend hath spread himself to drink the Soma-draught:
pada pāṭha: saniḥ | mitrasya | paprathe | indraḥ | somasya | pītaye || prācī | vāśī-iva | sunvate | mimīte | it ||8.12.12||

IAST: prācī vāśīva sunvate mimīta it
Griffith: Like worshipper's dilating praise; it metes and marks.
pada pāṭha: saniḥ | mitrasya | paprathe | indraḥ | somasya | pītaye || prācī | vāśī-iva | sunvate | mimīte | it ||8.12.12||

IAST: yaṁ viprā ukthavāhaso 'bhipramandur āyavaḥ
Griffith: He whom the sages, living men, have gladdened, offering up their hymns,
pada pāṭha: yam | viprāḥ | uktha-vāhasaḥ | abhi-pramanduḥ | āyavaḥ || ghr̥tam | na | pipye | āsani | r̥tasya | yat ||8.12.13||

IAST: ghṛtaṁ na pipya āsany ṛtasya yat
Griffith: Hath swelled like oil of sacrifice in Agni's mouth.
pada pāṭha: yam | viprāḥ | uktha-vāhasaḥ | abhi-pramanduḥ | āyavaḥ || ghr̥tam | na | pipye | āsani | r̥tasya | yat ||8.12.13||

IAST: uta svarāje aditiḥ stomam indrāya jījanat
Griffith: Aditi also hath brought forth a hymn for Indra, Sovran Lord:
pada pāṭha: uta | sva-rāje | aditiḥ | stomam | indrāya | jījanat || puru-praśastam | ūtaye | r̥tasya | yat ||8.12.14||

IAST: purupraśastam ūtaya ṛtasya yat
Griffith: The work of sacrifice for help is glorified.
pada pāṭha: uta | sva-rāje | aditiḥ | stomam | indrāya | jījanat || puru-praśastam | ūtaye | r̥tasya | yat ||8.12.14||

IAST: abhi vahnaya ūtaye 'nūṣata praśastaye
Griffith: The ministering priests have sung their songs for aid and eulogy:
pada pāṭha: abhi | vahnayaḥ | ūtaye | anūṣata | pra-śastaye || na | deva | vi-vratā | harī iti | r̥tasya | yat ||8.12.15||

IAST: na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat
Griffith: God, thy Bays turn not from the rite which Law ordains.
Devanāgarī: न देव विव्रता हरी ऋतस्य यत्
pada pāṭha: abhi | vahnayaḥ | ūtaye | anūṣata | pra-śastaye || na | deva | vi-vratā | harī iti | r̥tasya | yat ||8.12.15||

IAST: yat somam indra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye
Griffith: If, Indra, thou drink Soma by Visnu's or Trta Aptya's side,
Devanāgarī: यत्सोममिन्द्र विष्णवि यद्वा घ त्रित आप्त्ये
pada pāṭha: yat | somam | indra | viṣṇavi | yat | vā | gha | trite | āptye || yat | vā | marut-su | mandase | sam | indu-bhiḥ ||8.12.16||

IAST: yad vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ
Griffith: Or with the Maruts take delight in flowing drops;
pada pāṭha: yat | somam | indra | viṣṇavi | yat | vā | gha | trite | āptye || yat | vā | marut-su | mandase | sam | indu-bhiḥ ||8.12.16||

IAST: yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase
Griffith: Or, Sakra, if thou gladden thee afar or in the sea of air,
Devanāgarī: यद्वा शक्र परावति समुद्रे अधि मन्दसे
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | śakra | parā-vati | samudre | adhi | mandase || asmākam | it | sute | raṇa | sam | indu-bhiḥ ||8.12.17||

IAST: asmākam it sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ
Griffith: Rejoice thee in this juice of ours, in flowing drops.
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | śakra | parā-vati | samudre | adhi | mandase || asmākam | it | sute | raṇa | sam | indu-bhiḥ ||8.12.17||

IAST: yad vāsi sunvato vṛdho yajamānasya satpate
Griffith: Or, Lord of Heroes if thou aid the worshipper who shed; the, juice,
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | asi | sunvataḥ | vr̥dhaḥ | yajamānasya | sat-pate || ukthe | vā | yasya | raṇyasi | sam | indu-bhiḥ ||8.12.18||

IAST: ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ
Griffith: Or him whose laud delights thee, and his flowing drops.
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | asi | sunvataḥ | vr̥dhaḥ | yajamānasya | sat-pate || ukthe | vā | yasya | raṇyasi | sam | indu-bhiḥ ||8.12.18||

IAST: devaṁ-devaṁ vo 'vasa indram-indraṁ gṛṇīṣaṇi
Griffith: To magnify the God, the God, Indra, yea, Indra for your help,
pada pāṭha: devam-devam | vaḥ | avase | indram-indram | gr̥ṇīṣaṇi || adha | yajñāya | turvaṇe | vi | ānaśuḥ ||8.12.19||

IAST: adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vy ānaśuḥ
Griffith: And promptly end the sacrifice-this have they gained.
pada pāṭha: devam-devam | vaḥ | avase | indram-indram | gr̥ṇīṣaṇi || adha | yajñāya | turvaṇe | vi | ānaśuḥ ||8.12.19||

IAST: yajñebhir yajñavāhasaṁ somebhiḥ somapātamam
Griffith: With worship, him whom men adore, with Soma, him who drinks it most,
pada pāṭha: yajñebhiḥ | yajña-vāhasam | somebhiḥ | soma-pātamam || hotrābhiḥ | indram | vavr̥dhuḥ | vi | ānaśuḥ ||8.12.20||

IAST: hotrābhir indraṁ vāvṛdhur vy ānaśuḥ
Griffith: Indra with lauds have they increasedthis have they gained.
