IAST: ya ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somaṁ dhṛṣitāpibat
Griffith: Indra who knew full well disclosed the kine to the Angirases.
Devanāgarī: य उक्था केवला दधे यः सोमं धृषितापिबत्
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | ukthā | kevalā | dadhe | yaḥ | somam | dhr̥ṣitā | apibat || yasmai | viṣṇuḥ | trīṇi | padā | vi-cakrame | upa | mitrasya | dharma-bhiḥ ||8.52.3||

IAST: yasmai viṣṇus trīṇi padā vicakrama upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ
Griffith: This his great deed must be extolled.
Devanāgarī: यस्मै विष्णुस्त्रीणि पदा विचक्रम उप मित्रस्य धर्मभिः
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | ukthā | kevalā | dadhe | yaḥ | somam | dhr̥ṣitā | apibat || yasmai | viṣṇuḥ | trīṇi | padā | vi-cakrame | upa | mitrasya | dharma-bhiḥ ||8.52.3||

IAST: yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākano vāje vājiñ chatakrato
Griffith: Indra, promoter of the song, the sage's Strengthener as of old,
Devanāgarī: यस्य त्वमिन्द्र स्तोमेषु चाकनो वाजे वाजिञ्छतक्रतो
pada pāṭha: yasya | tvam | indra | stomeṣu | cākanaḥ | vāje | vājin | śatakrato iti śata-krato || tam | tvā | vayam | sudughām-iva | go-duhaḥ | juhūmasi | śravasyavaḥ ||8.52.4||

IAST: taṁ tvā vayaṁ sudughām iva goduho juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ
Griffith: Shall come to bless and succour us at presentation of this laud.
Devanāgarī: तं त्वा वयं सुदुघामिव गोदुहो जुहूमसि श्रवस्यवः
pada pāṭha: yasya | tvam | indra | stomeṣu | cākanaḥ | vāje | vājin | śatakrato iti śata-krato || tam | tvā | vayam | sudughām-iva | go-duhaḥ | juhūmasi | śravasyavaḥ ||8.52.4||

IAST: yo no dātā sa naḥ pitā mahām̐ ugra īśānakṛt
Griffith: Now after their desire's intent the pious singers with the cry
Devanāgarī: यो नो दाता स नः पिता महाँ उग्र ईशानकृत्
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | naḥ | dātā | saḥ | naḥ | pitā | mahān | ugraḥ | īśāna-kr̥t || ayāman | ugraḥ | magha-vā | puru-vasuḥ | goḥ | aśvasya | pra | dātu | naḥ ||8.52.5||

IAST: ayāmann ugro maghavā purūvasur gor aśvasya pra dātu naḥ
Griffith: Of Hail! have sung loud hymns to thee, Indra, to gain a stall of kine.
Devanāgarī: अयामन्नुग्रो मघवा पुरूवसुर्गोरश्वस्य प्र दातु नः
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | naḥ | dātā | saḥ | naḥ | pitā | mahān | ugraḥ | īśāna-kr̥t || ayāman | ugraḥ | magha-vā | puru-vasuḥ | goḥ | aśvasya | pra | dātu | naḥ ||8.52.5||

IAST: yasmai tvaṁ vaso dānāya maṁhase sa rāyas poṣam invati
Griffith: With Indra rest all deeds of might, deeds done and yet to be performed,
Devanāgarī: यस्मै त्वं वसो दानाय मंहसे स रायस्पोषमिन्वति
pada pāṭha: yasmai | tvam | vaso iti | dānāya | maṁhase | saḥ | rāyaḥ | poṣam | invati || vasu-yavaḥ | vasu-patim | śata-kratum | stomaiḥ | indram | havāmahe ||8.52.6||

IAST: vasūyavo vasupatiṁ śatakratuṁ stomair indraṁ havāmahe
Griffith: Whom singers know devoid of guile.
pada pāṭha: yasmai | tvam | vaso iti | dānāya | maṁhase | saḥ | rāyaḥ | poṣam | invati || vasu-yavaḥ | vasu-patim | śata-kratum | stomaiḥ | indram | havāmahe ||8.52.6||

IAST: kadā cana pra yucchasy ubhe ni pāsi janmanī
Griffith: When the Five Tribes with all their men to Indra have sent out their voice,
Devanāgarī: कदा चन प्र युच्छस्युभे नि पासि जन्मनी
pada pāṭha: kadā | cana | pra | yucchasi | ubhe iti | ni | pāsi | janmanī iti || turīya | āditya | havanam | te | indriyam | ā | tasthau | amr̥tam | divi ||8.52.7||

IAST: turīyāditya havanaṁ ta indriyam ā tasthāv amṛtaṁ divi
Griffith: And when the priest hath strewn much grass, this is the Friend's own dwellingpiace.
Devanāgarī: तुरीयादित्य हवनं त इन्द्रियमा तस्थावमृतं दिवि
pada pāṭha: kadā | cana | pra | yucchasi | ubhe iti | ni | pāsi | janmanī iti || turīya | āditya | havanam | te | indriyam | ā | tasthau | amr̥tam | divi ||8.52.7||

IAST: yasmai tvam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe
Griffith: This praise is verily thine own: thou hast performed these manly deeds,
Devanāgarī: यस्मै त्वं मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः शिक्षो शिक्षसि दाशुषे
pada pāṭha: yasmai | tvam | magha-van | indra | girvaṇaḥ | śikṣo iti | śikṣasi | dāśuṣe || asmākam | giraḥ | uta | sustutim | vaso iti | kaṇva-vat | śr̥ṇudhi | havam ||8.52.8||

IAST: asmākaṁ gira uta suṣṭutiṁ vaso kaṇvavac chṛṇudhī havam
Griffith: And sped the wheel upon its way.
Devanāgarī: अस्माकं गिर उत सुष्टुतिं वसो कण्ववच्छृणुधी हवम्
pada pāṭha: yasmai | tvam | magha-van | indra | girvaṇaḥ | śikṣo iti | śikṣasi | dāśuṣe || asmākam | giraḥ | uta | sustutim | vaso iti | kaṇva-vat | śr̥ṇudhi | havam ||8.52.8||

IAST: astāvi manma pūrvyam brahmendrāya vocata
Griffith: At the o'erflowing of this Steer, boldly he strode for life, and took
pada pāṭha: astāvi | manma | pūrvyam | brahma | indrāya | vocata || pūrvīḥ | r̥tasya | br̥hatīḥ | anūṣata | stotuḥ | medhāḥ | asr̥kṣata ||8.52.9||

IAST: pūrvīr ṛtasya bṛhatīr anūṣata stotur medhā asṛkṣata
Griffith: Soma as cattle take their corn.
pada pāṭha: astāvi | manma | pūrvyam | brahma | indrāya | vocata || pūrvīḥ | r̥tasya | br̥hatīḥ | anūṣata | stotuḥ | medhāḥ | asr̥kṣata ||8.52.9||

IAST: sam indro rāyo bṛhatīr adhūnuta saṁ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam
Griffith: Receiving this and craving help, we, who with you are Daksa's sons,
Devanāgarī: समिन्द्रो रायो बृहतीरधूनुत सं क्षोणी समु सूर्यम्
pada pāṭha: sam | indraḥ | rāyaḥ | br̥hatīḥ | adhūnuta | sam | kṣoṇī iti | sam | ūm̐ iti | sūryam || sam | śukrāsaḥ | śucayaḥ | sam | go-āśiraḥ | somāḥ | indram | amandiṣuḥ ||8.52.10||

IAST: saṁ śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ saṁ gavāśiraḥ somā indram amandiṣuḥ
Griffith: Would fain exalt the Maruts' Lord.
Devanāgarī: सं शुक्रासः शुचयः सं गवाशिरः सोमा इन्द्रममन्दिषुः
pada pāṭha: sam | indraḥ | rāyaḥ | br̥hatīḥ | adhūnuta | sam | kṣoṇī iti | sam | ūm̐ iti | sūryam || sam | śukrāsaḥ | śucayaḥ | sam | go-āśiraḥ | somāḥ | indram | amandiṣuḥ ||8.52.10||

IAST: upamaṁ tvā maghonāṁ jyeṣṭhaṁ ca vṛṣabhāṇām
Griffith: MAY our hymns give thee great delight. Display thy bounty, Thunderer.
Devanāgarī: उपमं त्वा मघोनां ज्येष्ठं च वृषभाणाम्
pada pāṭha: upa-mam | tvā | maghonām | jyeṣṭham | ca | vr̥ṣabhāṇām || purbhit-tamam | magha-van | indra | go-vidam | īśānam | rāyaḥ | īmahe ||8.53.1||

IAST: pūrbhittamam maghavann indra govidam īśānaṁ rāya īmahe
Griffith: Drive off the enemies of prayer.
pada pāṭha: upa-mam | tvā | maghonām | jyeṣṭham | ca | vr̥ṣabhāṇām || purbhit-tamam | magha-van | indra | go-vidam | īśānam | rāyaḥ | īmahe ||8.53.1||

IAST: ya āyuṁ kutsam atithigvam ardayo vāvṛdhāno dive-dive
Griffith: Crush with thy foot the niggard churls who bring no gifts. Mighty art thou
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | āyum | kutsam | atithi-gvam | ardayaḥ | vavr̥dhānaḥ | dive-dive || tam | tvā | vayam | hari-aśvam | śata-kratum | vāja-yantaḥ | havāmahe ||8.53.2||

IAST: taṁ tvā vayaṁ haryaśvaṁ śatakratuṁ vājayanto havāmahe
Griffith: There is not one to equal thee.
Devanāgarī: तं त्वा वयं हर्यश्वं शतक्रतुं वाजयन्तो हवामहे
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | āyum | kutsam | atithi-gvam | ardayaḥ | vavr̥dhānaḥ | dive-dive || tam | tvā | vayam | hari-aśvam | śata-kratum | vāja-yantaḥ | havāmahe ||8.53.2||

IAST: ā no viśveṣāṁ rasam madhvaḥ siñcantv adrayaḥ
Griffith: Thou art the Lord of Soma pressed, Soma impressed is also thine.
Devanāgarī: आ नो विश्वेषां रसं मध्वः सिञ्चन्त्वद्रयः
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśveṣām | rasam | madhvaḥ | siñcantu | adrayaḥ || ye | parā-vati | sunvire | janeṣu | ā | ye | arvā-vati | indavaḥ ||8.53.3||

IAST: ye parāvati sunvire janeṣv ā ye arvāvatīndavaḥ
Griffith: Thou art the Sovran of the folk.
Devanāgarī: ये परावति सुन्विरे जनेष्वा ये अर्वावतीन्दवः
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśveṣām | rasam | madhvaḥ | siñcantu | adrayaḥ || ye | parā-vati | sunvire | janeṣu | ā | ye | arvā-vati | indavaḥ ||8.53.3||

IAST: viśvā dveṣāṁsi jahi cāva cā kṛdhi viśve sanvantv ā vasu
Griffith: Come, go thou forth, dwelling in heaven and listening to the prayers of men:
Devanāgarī: विश्वा द्वेषांसि जहि चाव चा कृधि विश्वे सन्वन्त्वा वसु
pada pāṭha: viśvā | dveṣāṁsi | jahi | ca | ava | ca | ā | kr̥dhi | viśve | sanvantu | ā | vasu || śīṣṭeṣu | cit | te | madirāsaḥ | aṁśavaḥ | yatra | somasya | tr̥mpasi ||8.53.4||

IAST: śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāso aṁśavo yatrā somasya tṛmpasi
Griffith: Thou fillest both the heavens and earth.
Devanāgarī: शीष्टेषु चित्ते मदिरासो अंशवो यत्रा सोमस्य तृम्पसि
pada pāṭha: viśvā | dveṣāṁsi | jahi | ca | ava | ca | ā | kr̥dhi | viśve | sanvantu | ā | vasu || śīṣṭeṣu | cit | te | madirāsaḥ | aṁśavaḥ | yatra | somasya | tr̥mpasi ||8.53.4||

IAST: indra nedīya ed ihi mitamedhābhir ūtibhiḥ
Griffith: Even that hill with rocky heights, with hundreds, thousands, held within.
pada pāṭha: indra | nedīyaḥ | ā | it | ihi | mita-medhābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ || ā | śam-tama | śam-tamābhiḥ | abhiṣṭi-bhiḥ | ā | su-āpe | svāpi-bhiḥ ||8.53.5||

IAST: ā śaṁtama śaṁtamābhir abhiṣṭibhir ā svāpe svāpibhiḥ
Griffith: Thou for thy worshippers brakest through.
pada pāṭha: indra | nedīyaḥ | ā | it | ihi | mita-medhābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ || ā | śam-tama | śam-tamābhiḥ | abhiṣṭi-bhiḥ | ā | su-āpe | svāpi-bhiḥ ||8.53.5||

IAST: ājituraṁ satpatiṁ viśvacarṣaṇiṁ kṛdhi prajāsv ābhagam
Griffith: We call on thee both night and day to taste the flowing Soma juice:
pada pāṭha: āji-turam | sat-patim | viśva-carṣaṇim | kr̥dhi | pra-jāsu | ā-bhagam || pra | su | tira | śacībhiḥ | ye | te | ukthinaḥ | kratum | punate | ānuṣak ||8.53.6||

IAST: pra sū tirā śacībhir ye ta ukthinaḥ kratum punata ānuṣak
Griffith: Do thou fulfil our heart's desire.
Devanāgarī: प्र सू तिरा शचीभिर्ये त उक्थिनः क्रतुं पुनत आनुषक्
pada pāṭha: āji-turam | sat-patim | viśva-carṣaṇim | kr̥dhi | pra-jāsu | ā-bhagam || pra | su | tira | śacībhiḥ | ye | te | ukthinaḥ | kratum | punate | ānuṣak ||8.53.6||

IAST: yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vase te syāma bhareṣu te
Griffith: Where is that ever-youthful Steer, strong. necked and never yet bent down?
Devanāgarī: यस्ते साधिष्ठोऽवसे ते स्याम भरेषु ते
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | te | sādhiṣṭhaḥ | avase | te | syāma | bhareṣu | te || vayam | hotrābhiḥ | uta | devahūti-bhiḥ | sasa-vāṁsaḥ | manāmahe ||8.53.7||

IAST: vayaṁ hotrābhir uta devahūtibhiḥ sasavāṁso manāmahe
Griffith: What Brahman ministers to him?
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | te | sādhiṣṭhaḥ | avase | te | syāma | bhareṣu | te || vayam | hotrābhiḥ | uta | devahūti-bhiḥ | sasa-vāṁsaḥ | manāmahe ||8.53.7||

IAST: ahaṁ hi te harivo brahma vājayur ājiṁ yāmi sadotibhiḥ
Griffith: To whose libation doth the Steer, betake him with delight therein?
Devanāgarī: अहं हि ते हरिवो ब्रह्म वाजयुराजिं यामि सदोतिभिः
pada pāṭha: aham | hi | te | hari-vaḥ | brahma | vāja-yuḥ | ājim | yāmi | sadā | ūti-bhiḥ || tvām | it | eva | tam | ame | sam | aśva-yuḥ | gavyuḥ | agre | mathīnām ||8.53.8||

IAST: tvām id eva tam ame sam aśvayur gavyur agre mathīnām
Griffith: Who takes delight in Indra now?
pada pāṭha: aham | hi | te | hari-vaḥ | brahma | vāja-yuḥ | ājim | yāmi | sadā | ūti-bhiḥ || tvām | it | eva | tam | ame | sam | aśva-yuḥ | gavyuḥ | agre | mathīnām ||8.53.8||

IAST: etat ta indra vīryaṁ gīrbhir gṛṇanti kāravaḥ
Griffith: THOUGH, Indra, thou art called by men from east and west, from north and soutb,
pada pāṭha: etat | te | indra | vīryam | gīḥ-bhiḥ | gr̥ṇanti | kāravaḥ || te | stobhantaḥ | ūrjam | āvan | ghr̥ta-ścutam | paurāsaḥ | nakṣan | dhīti-bhiḥ ||8.54.1||

IAST: te stobhanta ūrjam āvan ghṛtaścutam paurāso nakṣan dhītibhiḥ
Griffith: Come hither quickly with fleet steeds
pada pāṭha: etat | te | indra | vīryam | gīḥ-bhiḥ | gr̥ṇanti | kāravaḥ || te | stobhantaḥ | ūrjam | āvan | ghr̥ta-ścutam | paurāsaḥ | nakṣan | dhīti-bhiḥ ||8.54.1||

IAST: nakṣanta indram avase sukṛtyayā yeṣāṁ suteṣu mandase
Griffith: If in the effluence of heaven, rich in its light, thou takest joy,
Devanāgarī: नक्षन्त इन्द्रमवसे सुकृत्यया येषां सुतेषु मन्दसे
pada pāṭha: nakṣante | indram | avase | su-kr̥tyayā | yeṣām | suteṣu | mandase || yathā | sam-varte | amadaḥ | yathā | kr̥śe | eva | asme iti | indra | matsva ||8.54.2||

IAST: yathā saṁvarte amado yathā kṛśa evāsme indra matsva
Griffith: Or in the sea in Soma juice.
Devanāgarī: यथा संवर्ते अमदो यथा कृश एवास्मे इन्द्र मत्स्व
pada pāṭha: nakṣante | indram | avase | su-kr̥tyayā | yeṣām | suteṣu | mandase || yathā | sam-varte | amadaḥ | yathā | kr̥śe | eva | asme iti | indra | matsva ||8.54.2||

IAST: ā no viśve sajoṣaso devāso gantanopa naḥ
Griffith: With songs I call thee, Great and Wide, even as a cow to profit us,
Devanāgarī: आ नो विश्वे सजोषसो देवासो गन्तनोप नः
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśve | sa-joṣasaḥ | devāsaḥ | gantana | upa | naḥ || vasavaḥ | rudrāḥ | avase | naḥ | ā | gaman | śr̥ṇvantu | marutaḥ | havam ||8.54.3||

IAST: vasavo rudrā avase na ā gamañ chṛṇvantu maruto havam
Griffith: Indra, to drink the Soma-draught.
Devanāgarī: वसवो रुद्रा अवसे न आ गमञ्छृण्वन्तु मरुतो हवम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | viśve | sa-joṣasaḥ | devāsaḥ | gantana | upa | naḥ || vasavaḥ | rudrāḥ | avase | naḥ | ā | gaman | śr̥ṇvantu | marutaḥ | havam ||8.54.3||

IAST: pūṣā viṣṇur havanam me sarasvaty avantu sapta sindhavaḥ
Griffith: Hither, O Indra, let thy Bays bear up and, bring upon thy car
Devanāgarī: पूषा विष्णुर्हवनं मे सरस्वत्यवन्तु सप्त सिन्धवः
pada pāṭha: pūṣā | viṣṇuḥ | havanam | me | sarasvatī | avantu | sapta | sindhavaḥ || āpaḥ | vātaḥ | parvatāsaḥ | vanaspatiḥ | śr̥ṇotu | pr̥thivī | havam ||8.54.4||

IAST: āpo vātaḥ parvatāso vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam
Griffith: Thy glory, God! and majesty.
Devanāgarī: आपो वातः पर्वतासो वनस्पतिः शृणोतु पृथिवी हवम्
pada pāṭha: pūṣā | viṣṇuḥ | havanam | me | sarasvatī | avantu | sapta | sindhavaḥ || āpaḥ | vātaḥ | parvatāsaḥ | vanaspatiḥ | śr̥ṇotu | pr̥thivī | havam ||8.54.4||

IAST: yad indra rādho asti te māghonam maghavattama
Griffith: Thou, Indra, wouldst be sung and praised as great, strong, lordly in thy deeds
Devanāgarī: यदिन्द्र राधो अस्ति ते माघोनं मघवत्तम
pada pāṭha: yat | indra | rādhaḥ | asti | te | māghonam | maghavat-tama || tena | naḥ | bodhi | sadha-mādyaḥ | vr̥dhe | bhagaḥ | dānāya | vr̥tra-han ||8.54.5||

IAST: tena no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe bhago dānāya vṛtrahan
Griffith: Come hither, drink our Soma juice.
Devanāgarī: तेन नो बोधि सधमाद्यो वृधे भगो दानाय वृत्रहन्
pada pāṭha: yat | indra | rādhaḥ | asti | te | māghonam | maghavat-tama || tena | naḥ | bodhi | sadha-mādyaḥ | vr̥dhe | bhagaḥ | dānāya | vr̥tra-han ||8.54.5||

IAST: ājipate nṛpate tvam id dhi no vāja ā vakṣi sukrato
Griffith: We who have shed the Soma and prepared the feast are calling thee.
Devanāgarī: आजिपते नृपते त्वमिद्धि नो वाज आ वक्षि सुक्रतो
pada pāṭha: āji-pate | nr̥-pate | tvam | it | hi | naḥ | vāje | ā | vakṣi | sukrato iti su-krato || vītī | hotrābhiḥ | uta | devavīti-bhiḥ | sasa-vāṁsaḥ | vi | śr̥ṇvire ||8.54.6||

IAST: vītī hotrābhir uta devavītibhiḥ sasavāṁso vi śṛṇvire
Griffith: To sit on this our sacred grass.
Devanāgarī: वीती होत्राभिरुत देववीतिभिः ससवांसो वि शृण्विरे
pada pāṭha: āji-pate | nr̥-pate | tvam | it | hi | naḥ | vāje | ā | vakṣi | sukrato iti su-krato || vītī | hotrābhiḥ | uta | devavīti-bhiḥ | sasa-vāṁsaḥ | vi | śr̥ṇvire ||8.54.6||

IAST: santi hy arya āśiṣa indra āyur janānām
Griffith: As, Indra, thou art evermore the common Lord of all alike,
pada pāṭha: santi | hi | arye | ā-śiṣaḥ | indre | āyuḥ | janānām || asmān | nakṣasva | magha-van | upa | avase | dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīm | iṣam ||8.54.7||

IAST: asmān nakṣasva maghavann upāvase dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam
Griffith: As such we invocate thee now.
pada pāṭha: santi | hi | arye | ā-śiṣaḥ | indre | āyuḥ | janānām || asmān | nakṣasva | magha-van | upa | avase | dhukṣasva | pipyuṣīm | iṣam ||8.54.7||

IAST: vayaṁ ta indra stomebhir vidhema tvam asmākaṁ śatakrato
Griffith: The men with stones have milked for thee this nectar of the Soma juice:
Devanāgarī: वयं त इन्द्र स्तोमेभिर्विधेम त्वमस्माकं शतक्रतो
pada pāṭha: vayam | te | indra | stomebhiḥ | vidhema | tvam | asmākam | śatakrato iti śata-krato || mahi | sthūram | śaśayam | rādhaḥ | ahrayam | praskaṇvāya | ni | tośaya ||8.54.8||

IAST: mahi sthūraṁ śaśayaṁ rādho ahrayam praskaṇvāya ni tośaya
Griffith: Indra, be pleased with it, and drink.
Devanāgarī: महि स्थूरं शशयं राधो अह्रयं प्रस्कण्वाय नि तोशय
pada pāṭha: vayam | te | indra | stomebhiḥ | vidhema | tvam | asmākam | śatakrato iti śata-krato || mahi | sthūram | śaśayam | rādhaḥ | ahrayam | praskaṇvāya | ni | tośaya ||8.54.8||

IAST: bhūrīd indrasya vīryaṁ vy akhyam abhy āyati
Griffith: LOUD singing at the sacred rite where Soma flows we priests invoke
pada pāṭha: bhūri | it | indrasya | vīryam | vi | akhyam | abhi | ā | ayati || rādhaḥ | te | dasyave | vr̥ka ||8.55.1||

IAST: rādhas te dasyave vṛka
Griffith: With haste, that he may help, as the bard's Cherisher, Indra who findeth wealth for you.
pada pāṭha: bhūri | it | indrasya | vīryam | vi | akhyam | abhi | ā | ayati || rādhaḥ | te | dasyave | vr̥ka ||8.55.1||

IAST: śataṁ śvetāsa ukṣaṇo divi tāro na rocante
Griffith: Whom with fair helm, in rapture of the juice, the firm resistless slayers hinder not:
Devanāgarī: शतं श्वेतास उक्षणो दिवि तारो न रोचन्ते
pada pāṭha: śatam | śvetāsaḥ | ukṣaṇaḥ | divi | tāraḥ | na | rocante || mahnā | divam | na | tastabhuḥ ||8.55.2||

IAST: mahnā divaṁ na tastabhuḥ
Griffith: Giver of glorious wealth to him who sing a his praise, honouring him who toils and pours:
pada pāṭha: śatam | śvetāsaḥ | ukṣaṇaḥ | divi | tāraḥ | na | rocante || mahnā | divam | na | tastabhuḥ ||8.55.2||

IAST: śataṁ veṇūñ chataṁ śunaḥ śataṁ carmāṇi mlātāni
Griffith: Sakra, who like a curry-comb for horses or a golden goad,
Devanāgarī: शतं वेणूञ्छतं शुनः शतं चर्माणि म्लातानि
pada pāṭha: śatam | veṇūn | śatam | śunaḥ | śatam | carmāṇi | mlātāni || śatam | me | balbaja-stukāḥ | aruṣīṇām | catuḥ-śatam ||8.55.3||

IAST: śatam me balbajastukā aruṣīṇāṁ catuḥśatam
Griffith: Indra, the Vrtra-slayer, urges eagerly the opening of the stall of kine:
pada pāṭha: śatam | veṇūn | śatam | śunaḥ | śatam | carmāṇi | mlātāni || śatam | me | balbaja-stukāḥ | aruṣīṇām | catuḥ-śatam ||8.55.3||

IAST: sudevāḥ stha kāṇvāyanā vayo-vayo vicarantaḥ
Griffith: Who for the worshipper scatters forth ample wealth, even though buried, piled in heaps:
pada pāṭha: su-devāḥ | stha | kāṇvāyanāḥ | vayaḥ-vayaḥ | vi-carantaḥ || aśvāsaḥ | na | caṅkramata ||8.55.4||

IAST: aśvāso na caṅkramata
Griffith: May Indra, Lord of Bay Steeds, fair-helmed Thunderer, act at his pleasure, as he lists.
pada pāṭha: su-devāḥ | stha | kāṇvāyanāḥ | vayaḥ-vayaḥ | vi-carantaḥ || aśvāsaḥ | na | caṅkramata ||8.55.4||

IAST: ād it sāptasya carkirann ānūnasya mahi śravaḥ
Griffith: Hero whom many praise, what thou hast longed for, oven of old, from men.
pada pāṭha: āt | it | sāptasya | carkiran | na | anūnasya | mahi | śravaḥ || śyāvīḥ | ati-dhvasan | pathaḥ | cakṣuṣā | cana | sam-naśe ||8.55.5||

IAST: śyāvīr atidhvasan pathaś cakṣuṣā cana saṁnaśe
Griffith: All that we offer unto thee, O Indra, now, sacrifice, laud, effectual speech.
pada pāṭha: āt | it | sāptasya | carkiran | na | anūnasya | mahi | śravaḥ || śyāvīḥ | ati-dhvasan | pathaḥ | cakṣuṣā | cana | sam-naśe ||8.55.5||

IAST: prati te dasyave vṛka rādho adarśy ahrayam
Griffith: Now pray we to these Ksatriyas, to the Adityas for their aid,
Devanāgarī: प्रति ते दस्यवे वृक राधो अदर्श्यह्रयम्
pada pāṭha: prati | te | dasyave | vr̥ka | rādhaḥ | adarśi | ahrayam || dyauḥ | na | prathinā | śavaḥ ||8.56.1||

IAST: dyaur na prathinā śavaḥ
Griffith: These who are gracious to assist.
pada pāṭha: prati | te | dasyave | vr̥ka | rādhaḥ | adarśi | ahrayam || dyauḥ | na | prathinā | śavaḥ ||8.56.1||

IAST: daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ
Griffith: May Mitra bear us oer distress, and Varuna and Aryaman,
Devanāgarī: दश मह्यं पौतक्रतः सहस्रा दस्यवे वृकः
pada pāṭha: daśa | mahyam | pauta-krataḥ | sahasrā | dasyave | vr̥kaḥ || nityāt | rāyaḥ | amaṁhata ||8.56.2||

IAST: nityād rāyo amaṁhata
Griffith: Yea, the Adityas, as they know.
pada pāṭha: daśa | mahyam | pauta-krataḥ | sahasrā | dasyave | vr̥kaḥ || nityāt | rāyaḥ | amaṁhata ||8.56.2||

IAST: śatam me gardabhānāṁ śatam ūrṇāvatīnām
Griffith: For wonderful and meet for praise is these Adityas' saving help
pada pāṭha: śatam | me | gardabhānām | śatam | ūrṇā-vatīnām || śatam | dāsān | ati | srajaḥ ||8.56.3||

IAST: śataṁ dāsām̐ ati srajaḥ
Griffith: To him who offers and prepares.
pada pāṭha: śatam | me | gardabhānām | śatam | ūrṇā-vatīnām || śatam | dāsān | ati | srajaḥ ||8.56.3||

IAST: tatro api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā
Griffith: The mighty aid of you, the Great, Varuna, Mitra, Aryarnan,
pada pāṭha: tatro iti | api | pra | anīyata | pūta-kratāyai | vi-aktā || aśvānām | it | na | yūthyām ||8.56.4||

IAST: aśvānām in na yūthyām
Griffith: We claim to be our sure defence.
pada pāṭha: tatro iti | api | pra | anīyata | pūta-kratāyai | vi-aktā || aśvānām | it | na | yūthyām ||8.56.4||

IAST: acety agniś cikitur havyavāṭ sa sumadrathaḥ
Griffith: Guard us, Adityas, still alive, before the deadly weapon strike:
pada pāṭha: aceti | agniḥ | cikituḥ | havya-vāṭ | saḥ | sumat-rathaḥ || agniḥ | śukreṇa | śociṣā | br̥hat | sūraḥ | arocata | divi | sūryaḥ | arocata ||8.56.5||

IAST: agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūro arocata divi sūryo arocata
Griffith: Are yc not they who hear our call?
Devanāgarī: अग्निः शुक्रेण शोचिषा बृहत्सूरो अरोचत दिवि सूर्यो अरोचत
pada pāṭha: aceti | agniḥ | cikituḥ | havya-vāṭ | saḥ | sumat-rathaḥ || agniḥ | śukreṇa | śociṣā | br̥hat | sūraḥ | arocata | divi | sūryaḥ | arocata ||8.56.5||

IAST: yuvaṁ devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṁ yajatrā
Griffith: EVEN as a car to give us aid, we draw thee hither for our bliss,
Devanāgarī: युवं देवा क्रतुना पूर्व्येण युक्ता रथेन तविषं यजत्रा
pada pāṭha: yuvam | devā | kratunā | pūrvyeṇa | yuktā | rathena | taviṣam | yajatrā || ā | agacchatam | nāsatyā | śacībhiḥ | idam | tr̥tīyam | savanam | pibāthaḥ ||8.57.1||

IAST: āgacchataṁ nāsatyā śacībhir idaṁ tṛtīyaṁ savanam pibāthaḥ
Griffith: Strong in thy deeds, checking assault, Lord, Mightiest Indra, of the brave!
Devanāgarī: आगच्छतं नासत्या शचीभिरिदं तृतीयं सवनं पिबाथः
pada pāṭha: yuvam | devā | kratunā | pūrvyeṇa | yuktā | rathena | taviṣam | yajatrā || ā | agacchatam | nāsatyā | śacībhiḥ | idam | tr̥tīyam | savanam | pibāthaḥ ||8.57.1||

IAST: yuvāṁ devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt
Griffith: Great in tby power and wisdom, Strong, with thought that comprehendeth all
Devanāgarī: युवां देवास्त्रय एकादशासः सत्याः सत्यस्य ददृशे पुरस्तात्
pada pāṭha: yuvām | devāḥ | trayaḥ | ekādaśāsaḥ | satyāḥ | satyasya | dadr̥śe | purastāt || asmākam | yajñam | savanam | juṣāṇā | pātam | somam | aśvinā | dīdyagnī iti dīdi-agnī ||8.57.2||

IAST: asmākaṁ yajñaṁ savanaṁ juṣāṇā pātaṁ somam aśvinā dīdyagnī
Griffith: Thou hast filled full with majesty.
Devanāgarī: अस्माकं यज्ञं सवनं जुषाणा पातं सोममश्विना दीद्यग्नी
pada pāṭha: yuvām | devāḥ | trayaḥ | ekādaśāsaḥ | satyāḥ | satyasya | dadr̥śe | purastāt || asmākam | yajñam | savanam | juṣāṇā | pātam | somam | aśvinā | dīdyagnī iti dīdi-agnī ||8.57.2||

IAST: panāyyaṁ tad aśvinā kṛtaṁ vāṁ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
Griffith: Thou very Mighty One, whose hands by virtue of thy greatness grasp,
Devanāgarī: पनाय्यं तदश्विना कृतं वां वृषभो दिवो रजसः पृथिव्याः
pada pāṭha: panāyyam | tat | aśvinā | kr̥tam | vām | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | divaḥ | rajasaḥ | pr̥thivyāḥ || sahasram | śaṁsāḥ | uta | ye | go-iṣṭau | sarvān | it | tān | upa | yāta | pibadhyai ||8.57.3||

IAST: sahasraṁ śaṁsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvām̐ it tām̐ upa yātā pibadhyai
Griffith: The golden bolt that breaks its way.
Devanāgarī: सहस्रं शंसा उत ये गविष्टौ सर्वाँ इत्ताँ उप याता पिबध्यै
pada pāṭha: panāyyam | tat | aśvinā | kr̥tam | vām | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | divaḥ | rajasaḥ | pr̥thivyāḥ || sahasram | śaṁsāḥ | uta | ye | go-iṣṭau | sarvān | it | tān | upa | yāta | pibadhyai ||8.57.3||

IAST: ayaṁ vām bhāgo nihito yajatremā giro nāsatyopa yātam
Griffith: Your Lord of might that ne'er hath bent, that ruleth over all mankind,
Devanāgarī: अयं वां भागो निहितो यजत्रेमा गिरो नासत्योप यातम्
pada pāṭha: ayam | vām | bhāgaḥ | ni-hitaḥ | yajatrā | imāḥ | giraḥ | nāsatyā | upa | yātam || pibatam | somam | madhu-mantam | asme iti | pra | dāśvāṁsam | avatam | śacībhiḥ ||8.57.4||

IAST: pibataṁ somam madhumantam asme pra dāśvāṁsam avataṁ śacībhiḥ
Griffith: I call, that he, as he is wont, may aid the chariots and the men.
Devanāgarī: पिबतं सोमं मधुमन्तमस्मे प्र दाश्वांसमवतं शचीभिः
pada pāṭha: ayam | vām | bhāgaḥ | ni-hitaḥ | yajatrā | imāḥ | giraḥ | nāsatyā | upa | yātam || pibatam | somam | madhu-mantam | asme iti | pra | dāśvāṁsam | avatam | śacībhiḥ ||8.57.4||

IAST: yam ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñam imaṁ vahanti
Griffith: I SEND you forth the song of praise for Indu, hero-gladdener.
Devanāgarī: यमृत्विजो बहुधा कल्पयन्तः सचेतसो यज्ञमिमं वहन्ति
pada pāṭha: yam | r̥tvijaḥ | bahudhā | kalpayantaḥ | sa-cetasaḥ | yajñam | imam | vahanti || yaḥ | anūcānaḥ | brāhmaṇaḥ | yuktaḥ | āsīt | kā | svit | tatra | yajamānasya | sam-vit ||8.58.1||

IAST: yo anūcāno brāhmaṇo yukta āsīt kā svit tatra yajamānasya saṁvit
Griffith: With hymn and plenty he invites you to complete the sacrifice.
Devanāgarī: यो अनूचानो ब्राह्मणो युक्त आसीत्का स्वित्तत्र यजमानस्य संवित्
pada pāṭha: yam | r̥tvijaḥ | bahudhā | kalpayantaḥ | sa-cetasaḥ | yajñam | imam | vahanti || yaḥ | anūcānaḥ | brāhmaṇaḥ | yuktaḥ | āsīt | kā | svit | tatra | yajamānasya | sam-vit ||8.58.1||

IAST: eka evāgnir bahudhā samiddha ekaḥ sūryo viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ
Griffith: Thou wishest for thy kine a bull, for those who long for his approach,
Devanāgarī: एक एवाग्निर्बहुधा समिद्ध एकः सूर्यो विश्वमनु प्रभूतः
pada pāṭha: ekaḥ | eva | agniḥ | bahudhā | sam-iddhaḥ | ekaḥ | sūryaḥ | viśvam | anu | pra-bhūtaḥ || ekā | eva | uṣāḥ | sarvam | idam | vi | bhāti | ekam | vai | idam | vi | babhūva | sarvam ||8.58.2||

IAST: ekaivoṣāḥ sarvam idaṁ vi bhāty ekaṁ vā idaṁ vi babhūva sarvam
Griffith: For those who turn away from him, lord of thy cows whom none may kill.
Devanāgarī: एकैवोषाः सर्वमिदं वि भात्येकं वा इदं वि बभूव सर्वम्
pada pāṭha: ekaḥ | eva | agniḥ | bahudhā | sam-iddhaḥ | ekaḥ | sūryaḥ | viśvam | anu | pra-bhūtaḥ || ekā | eva | uṣāḥ | sarvam | idam | vi | bhāti | ekam | vai | idam | vi | babhūva | sarvam ||8.58.2||

IAST: jyotiṣmantaṁ ketumantaṁ tricakraṁ sukhaṁ rathaṁ suṣadam bhūrivāram
Griffith: The dappled kine who stream with milk prepare his draught of Soma juice:
Devanāgarī: ज्योतिष्मन्तं केतुमन्तं त्रिचक्रं सुखं रथं सुषदं भूरिवारम्
pada pāṭha: jyotiṣmantam | ketu-mantam | tri-cakram | su-kham | ratham | su-sadam | bhūri-vāram || citra-maghā | yasya | yoge | adhi-jajñe | tam | vām | huve | ati | riktam | pibadhyai ||8.58.3||

IAST: citrāmaghā yasya yoge 'dhijajñe taṁ vāṁ huve ati riktam pibadhyai
Griffith: Clans in the birth-place of the Gods, in the three luminous realms of heaven.
Devanāgarī: चित्रामघा यस्य योगेऽधिजज्ञे तं वां हुवे अति रिक्तं पिबध्यै
pada pāṭha: jyotiṣmantam | ketu-mantam | tri-cakram | su-kham | ratham | su-sadam | bhūri-vāram || citra-maghā | yasya | yoge | adhi-jajñe | tam | vām | huve | ati | riktam | pibadhyai ||8.58.3||

IAST: imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrata indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām
Griffith: HE who, as Sovran Lord of men, moves with his chariots unrestrained,
Devanāgarī: इमानि वां भागधेयानि सिस्रत इन्द्रावरुणा प्र महे सुतेषु वाम्
pada pāṭha: imāni | vām | bhāga-dheyāni | sisrate | indrāvaruṇā | pra | mahe | suteṣu | vām || yajñe-yajñe | ha | savanā | bhuraṇyathaḥ | yat | sunvate | yajamānāya | śikṣathaḥ ||8.59.1||

IAST: yajñe-yajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyatho yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ
Griffith: The Vrtra-slayer vanquisher, of fighting hosts, preeminent, is praised with song.
Devanāgarī: यज्ञेयज्ञे ह सवना भुरण्यथो यत्सुन्वते यजमानाय शिक्षथः
pada pāṭha: imāni | vām | bhāga-dheyāni | sisrate | indrāvaruṇā | pra | mahe | suteṣu | vām || yajñe-yajñe | ha | savanā | bhuraṇyathaḥ | yat | sunvate | yajamānāya | śikṣathaḥ ||8.59.1||

IAST: niṣṣidhvarīr oṣadhīr āpa āstām indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata
Griffith: Honour that Indra, Puruhanman! for his aid, in whose sustaining hand of old,
pada pāṭha: niḥ-sidhvarīḥ | oṣadhīḥ | āpaḥ | āstām | indrāvaruṇā | mahimānam | āśata || yā | sisratuḥ | rajasaḥ | pāre | adhvanaḥ | yayoḥ | śatruḥ | nakiḥ | adevaḥ | ohate ||8.59.2||

IAST: yā sisratū rajasaḥ pāre adhvano yayoḥ śatrur nakir ādeva ohate
Griffith: The splendid bolt of thunder was deposited, as the great Sun was set in heaven.
Devanāgarī: या सिस्रतू रजसः पारे अध्वनो ययोः शत्रुर्नकिरादेव ओहते
pada pāṭha: niḥ-sidhvarīḥ | oṣadhīḥ | āpaḥ | āstām | indrāvaruṇā | mahimānam | āśata || yā | sisratuḥ | rajasaḥ | pāre | adhvanaḥ | yayoḥ | śatruḥ | nakiḥ | adevaḥ | ohate ||8.59.2||

IAST: satyaṁ tad indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām madhva ūrmiṁ duhate sapta vāṇīḥ
Griffith: No one by deed attains to him who works and strengthens evermore:
Devanāgarī: सत्यं तदिन्द्रावरुणा कृशस्य वां मध्व ऊर्मिं दुहते सप्त वाणीः
pada pāṭha: satyam | tat | indrāvaruṇā | kr̥śasya | vām | madhvaḥ | ūrmim | duhate | sapta | vāṇīḥ || tābhiḥ | dāśvāṁsam | avatam | śubhaḥ | patī iti | yaḥ | vām | adabdhaḥ | abhi | pāti | citti-bhiḥ ||8.59.3||

IAST: tābhir dāśvāṁsam avataṁ śubhas patī yo vām adabdho abhi pāti cittibhiḥ
Griffith: No, not by sacrifice, to Indra. praised o all, resistless, daring, bold in might.
Devanāgarī: ताभिर्दाश्वांसमवतं शुभस्पती यो वामदब्धो अभि पाति चित्तिभिः
pada pāṭha: satyam | tat | indrāvaruṇā | kr̥śasya | vām | madhvaḥ | ūrmim | duhate | sapta | vāṇīḥ || tābhiḥ | dāśvāṁsam | avatam | śubhaḥ | patī iti | yaḥ | vām | adabdhaḥ | abhi | pāti | citti-bhiḥ ||8.59.3||

IAST: ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyā jīradānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadana ṛtasya
Griffith: The potent Conqueror, invincible in war, him at whose birth the Mighty Ones,
Devanāgarī: घृतप्रुषः सौम्या जीरदानवः सप्त स्वसारः सदन ऋतस्य
pada pāṭha: ghr̥ta-pruṣaḥ | saumyāḥ | jīra-dānavaḥ | sapta | svasāraḥ | sadane | r̥tasya || yāḥ | ha | vām | indrāvaruṇā | ghr̥ta-ścutaḥ | tābhiḥ | dhattam | yajamānāya | śikṣatam ||8.59.4||

IAST: yā ha vām indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tābhir dhattaṁ yajamānāya śikṣatam
Griffith: The Kine who spread aftar, sent their loud voices out, heavens, earths seat their loud voices out,
Devanāgarī: या ह वामिन्द्रावरुणा घृतश्चुतस्ताभिर्धत्तं यजमानाय शिक्षतम्
pada pāṭha: ghr̥ta-pruṣaḥ | saumyāḥ | jīra-dānavaḥ | sapta | svasāraḥ | sadane | r̥tasya || yāḥ | ha | vām | indrāvaruṇā | ghr̥ta-ścutaḥ | tābhiḥ | dhattam | yajamānāya | śikṣatam ||8.59.4||

IAST: avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyaṁ tveṣābhyām mahimānam indriyam
Griffith: O Indra, if a hundred heavens and if a hundred earths were thine-
Devanāgarī: अवोचाम महते सौभगाय सत्यं त्वेषाभ्यां महिमानमिन्द्रियम्
pada pāṭha: avocāma | mahate | saubhagāya | satyam | tveṣābhyām | mahimānam | indriyam || asmān | su | indrāvaruṇā | ghr̥ta-ścutaḥ | tri-bhiḥ | sāptebhiḥ | avatam | śubhaḥ | patī iti ||8.59.5||

IAST: asmān sv indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tribhiḥ sāptebhir avataṁ śubhas patī
Griffith: No, not a thousand Suns could match thee at thy birth, not both the worlds, O Thunderer.
pada pāṭha: avocāma | mahate | saubhagāya | satyam | tveṣābhyām | mahimānam | indriyam || asmān | su | indrāvaruṇā | ghr̥ta-ścutaḥ | tri-bhiḥ | sāptebhiḥ | avatam | śubhaḥ | patī iti ||8.59.5||

IAST: indrāvaruṇā yad ṛṣibhyo manīṣāṁ vāco matiṁ śrutam adattam agre
Griffith: Thou, Hero, hast performed thy hero deeds with might, yea, all with strength, O Strongest One.
Devanāgarī: इन्द्रावरुणा यदृषिभ्यो मनीषां वाचो मतिं श्रुतमदत्तमग्रे
pada pāṭha: indrāvaruṇā | yat | r̥ṣi-bhyaḥ | manīṣām | vācaḥ | matim | śrutam | adattam | agre || yāni | sthānāni | asr̥janta | dhīrāḥ | yajñam | tanvānāḥ | tapasā | abhi | apaśyam ||8.59.6||

IAST: yāni sthānāny asṛjanta dhīrā yajñaṁ tanvānās tapasābhy apaśyam
Griffith: Maghavan, help us to a stable full of kine, O Thunderer, with wondrous aids.
pada pāṭha: indrāvaruṇā | yat | r̥ṣi-bhyaḥ | manīṣām | vācaḥ | matim | śrutam | adattam | agre || yāni | sthānāni | asr̥janta | dhīrāḥ | yajñam | tanvānāḥ | tapasā | abhi | apaśyam ||8.59.6||

IAST: indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptaṁ rāyas poṣaṁ yajamāneṣu dhattam
Griffith: Let not a godless mortal gain this food, O thou whose life is long!
pada pāṭha: indrāvaruṇā | saumanasam | adr̥ptam | rāyaḥ | poṣam | yajamāneṣu | dhattam || pra-jām | puṣṭim | bhūtim | asmāsu | dhattam | dīrghāyu-tvāya | pra | tiratam | naḥ | āyuḥ ||8.59.7||

IAST: prajām puṣṭim bhūtim asmāsu dhattaṁ dīrghāyutvāya pra tirataṁ na āyuḥ
Griffith: But one who yokes the bright-hued steeds, the Etasas, even Indra yoker of the Bays.
Devanāgarī: प्रजां पुष्टिं भूतिमस्मासु धत्तं दीर्घायुत्वाय प्र तिरतं न आयुः
pada pāṭha: indrāvaruṇā | saumanasam | adr̥ptam | rāyaḥ | poṣam | yajamāneṣu | dhattam || pra-jām | puṣṭim | bhūtim | asmāsu | dhattam | dīrghāyu-tvāya | pra | tiratam | naḥ | āyuḥ ||8.59.7||

IAST: agna ā yāhy agnibhir hotāraṁ tvā vṛṇīmahe
Griffith: O AGNI, with thy mighty wealth guard us from all malignity,
pada pāṭha: agne | ā | yāhi | agni-bhiḥ | hotāram | tvā | vr̥ṇīmahe || ā | tvām | anaktu | pra-yatā | haviṣmatī | yajiṣṭham | barhiḥ | ā-sade ||8.60.1||

IAST: ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhir āsade
Griffith: Yea, from all hate of mortal man.
Devanāgarī: आ त्वामनक्तु प्रयता हविष्मती यजिष्ठं बर्हिरासदे
pada pāṭha: agne | ā | yāhi | agni-bhiḥ | hotāram | tvā | vr̥ṇīmahe || ā | tvām | anaktu | pra-yatā | haviṣmatī | yajiṣṭham | barhiḥ | ā-sade ||8.60.1||

IAST: acchā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaś caranty adhvare
Griffith: For over thee, O Friend from birih, the wrath of man hath no control:
Devanāgarī: अच्छा हि त्वा सहसः सूनो अङ्गिरः स्रुचश्चरन्त्यध्वरे
pada pāṭha: accha | hi | tvā | sahasaḥ | sūno iti | aṅgiraḥ | srucaḥ | caranti | adhvare || ūrjaḥ | napātam | ghr̥ta-keśam | īmahe | agnim | yajñeṣu | pūrvyam ||8.60.2||

IAST: ūrjo napātaṁ ghṛtakeśam īmahe 'gniṁ yajñeṣu pūrvyam
Griffith: Nay, Guardian of the earth art thou.
pada pāṭha: accha | hi | tvā | sahasaḥ | sūno iti | aṅgiraḥ | srucaḥ | caranti | adhvare || ūrjaḥ | napātam | ghr̥ta-keśam | īmahe | agnim | yajñeṣu | pūrvyam ||8.60.2||

IAST: agne kavir vedhā asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ
Griffith: As such, with all the Gods, O Son of Strength, auspicious in thy flame.
Devanāgarī: अग्ने कविर्वेधा असि होता पावक यक्ष्यः
pada pāṭha: agne | kaviḥ | vedhāḥ | asi | hotā | pāvaka | yakṣyaḥ || mandraḥ | yajiṣṭhaḥ | adhvareṣu | īḍyaḥ | viprebhiḥ | śukra | manma-bhiḥ ||8.60.3||

IAST: mandro yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyo viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ
Griffith: Give us wealth bringing all things good.
Devanāgarī: मन्द्रो यजिष्ठो अध्वरेष्वीड्यो विप्रेभिः शुक्र मन्मभिः
pada pāṭha: agne | kaviḥ | vedhāḥ | asi | hotā | pāvaka | yakṣyaḥ || mandraḥ | yajiṣṭhaḥ | adhvareṣu | īḍyaḥ | viprebhiḥ | śukra | manma-bhiḥ ||8.60.3||

IAST: adrogham ā vahośato yaviṣṭhya devām̐ ajasra vītaye
Griffith: Malignities stay not from wealth the mortal man whom, Agni, thou
Devanāgarī: अद्रोघमा वहोशतो यविष्ठ्य देवाँ अजस्र वीतये
pada pāṭha: adrogham | ā | vaha | uśataḥ | yaviṣṭhya | devān | ajasra | vītaye || abhi | prayāṁsi | su-dhitā | ā | vaso iti | gahi | mandasva | dhīti-bhiḥ | hitaḥ ||8.60.4||

IAST: abhi prayāṁsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ
Griffith: Protectest while he offers gifts.
Devanāgarī: अभि प्रयांसि सुधिता वसो गहि मन्दस्व धीतिभिर्हितः
pada pāṭha: adrogham | ā | vaha | uśataḥ | yaviṣṭhya | devān | ajasra | vītaye || abhi | prayāṁsi | su-dhitā | ā | vaso iti | gahi | mandasva | dhīti-bhiḥ | hitaḥ ||8.60.4||

IAST: tvam it saprathā asy agne trātar ṛtas kaviḥ
Griffith: Sage Agni, be whom thou dost urge, in worship of the Gods, to wealth,
pada pāṭha: tvam | it | sa-prathāḥ | asi | agne | trātaḥ | r̥taḥ | kaviḥ || tvām | viprāsaḥ | sam-idhāna | dīdi-vaḥ | ā | vivāsanti | vedhasaḥ ||8.60.5||

IAST: tvāṁ viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdiva ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ
Griffith: With thine assistance winneth kine.
Devanāgarī: त्वां विप्रासः समिधान दीदिव आ विवासन्ति वेधसः
pada pāṭha: tvam | it | sa-prathāḥ | asi | agne | trātaḥ | r̥taḥ | kaviḥ || tvām | viprāsaḥ | sam-idhāna | dīdi-vaḥ | ā | vivāsanti | vedhasaḥ ||8.60.5||

IAST: śocā śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayo rāsva stotre mahām̐ asi
Griffith: Riches with many heroes thou hast for the man who offers gifts:
Devanāgarī: शोचा शोचिष्ठ दीदिहि विशे मयो रास्व स्तोत्रे महाँ असि
pada pāṭha: śoca | śociṣṭha | dīdihi | viśe | mayaḥ | rāsva | stotre | mahān | asi || devānām | śarman | mama | santu | sūrayaḥ | śatru-sahaḥ | su-agnayaḥ ||8.60.6||

IAST: devānāṁ śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ svagnayaḥ
Griffith: Lead thou us on to higher bliss.
Devanāgarī: देवानां शर्मन्मम सन्तु सूरयः शत्रूषाहः स्वग्नयः
pada pāṭha: śoca | śociṣṭha | dīdihi | viśe | mayaḥ | rāsva | stotre | mahān | asi || devānām | śarman | mama | santu | sūrayaḥ | śatru-sahaḥ | su-agnayaḥ ||8.60.6||

IAST: yathā cid vṛddham atasam agne saṁjūrvasi kṣami
Griffith: Save us, O Jatavedas, nor abandon us to him who sins,
pada pāṭha: yathā | cit | vr̥ddham | atasam | agne | sam-jūrvasi | kṣami || eva | daha | mitra-mahaḥ | yaḥ | asma-dhruk | duḥ-manmā | kaḥ | ca | venati ||8.60.7||

IAST: evā daha mitramaho yo asmadhrug durmanmā kaś ca venati
Griffith: Unto the evil-hearted man.
Devanāgarī: एवा दह मित्रमहो यो अस्मध्रुग्दुर्मन्मा कश्च वेनति
pada pāṭha: yathā | cit | vr̥ddham | atasam | agne | sam-jūrvasi | kṣami || eva | daha | mitra-mahaḥ | yaḥ | asma-dhruk | duḥ-manmā | kaḥ | ca | venati ||8.60.7||

IAST: mā no martāya ripave rakṣasvine māghaśaṁsāya rīradhaḥ
Griffith: O Agni, let no godless man avert thy bounty as a God:
Devanāgarī: मा नो मर्ताय रिपवे रक्षस्विने माघशंसाय रीरधः
pada pāṭha: mā | naḥ | martāya | ripave | rakṣasvine | mā | agha-śaṁsāya | rīradhaḥ || asredhat-bhiḥ | taraṇi-bhiḥ | yaviṣṭhya | śivebhiḥ | pāhi | pāyu-bhiḥ ||8.60.8||

IAST: asredhadbhis taraṇibhir yaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ
Griffith: Over all treasures thou art Lord.
pada pāṭha: mā | naḥ | martāya | ripave | rakṣasvine | mā | agha-śaṁsāya | rīradhaḥ || asredhat-bhiḥ | taraṇi-bhiḥ | yaviṣṭhya | śivebhiḥ | pāhi | pāyu-bhiḥ ||8.60.8||

IAST: pāhi no agna ekayā pāhy uta dvitīyayā
Griffith: So, Son of Strength, tbou aidest us to what is great and excellent.
Devanāgarī: पाहि नो अग्न एकया पाह्युत द्वितीयया
pada pāṭha: pāhi | naḥ | agne | ekayā | pāhi | uta | dvitīyayā || pāhi | gīḥ-bhiḥ | tisr̥-bhiḥ | ūrjām | pate | pāhi | catasr̥-bhiḥ | vaso iti ||8.60.9||

IAST: pāhi gīrbhis tisṛbhir ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhir vaso
Griffith: Those, Vasu! Friend! who sing thy praise.
pada pāṭha: pāhi | naḥ | agne | ekayā | pāhi | uta | dvitīyayā || pāhi | gīḥ-bhiḥ | tisr̥-bhiḥ | ūrjām | pate | pāhi | catasr̥-bhiḥ | vaso iti ||8.60.9||

IAST: pāhi viśvasmād rakṣaso arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu no 'va
Griffith: Let our songs come anear to him beauteous and bright with piercing flame
Devanāgarī: पाहि विश्वस्माद्रक्षसो अराव्णः प्र स्म वाजेषु नोऽव
pada pāṭha: pāhi | viśvasmāt | rakṣasaḥ | arāvṇaḥ | pra | sma | vājeṣu | naḥ | ava || tvām | it | hi | nediṣṭham | deva-tātaye | āpim | nakṣāmahe | vr̥dhe ||8.60.10||

IAST: tvām id dhi nediṣṭhaṁ devatātaya āpiṁ nakṣāmahe vṛdhe
Griffith: Our offerings, with our homage, to the Lord of wealth, to him whom many praise, for help.
Devanāgarī: त्वामिद्धि नेदिष्ठं देवतातय आपिं नक्षामहे वृधे
pada pāṭha: pāhi | viśvasmāt | rakṣasaḥ | arāvṇaḥ | pra | sma | vājeṣu | naḥ | ava || tvām | it | hi | nediṣṭham | deva-tātaye | āpim | nakṣāmahe | vr̥dhe ||8.60.10||

IAST: ā no agne vayovṛdhaṁ rayim pāvaka śaṁsyam
Griffith: To Agni Jatavedas, to the Son of Strength, that he may give us precious gifts,
Devanāgarī: आ नो अग्ने वयोवृधं रयिं पावक शंस्यम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | agne | vayaḥ-vr̥dham | rayim | pāvaka | śaṁsyam || rāsva | ca | naḥ | upa-māte | puru-spr̥ham | su-nītī | svayaśaḥ-taram ||8.60.11||

IAST: rāsvā ca na upamāte puruspṛhaṁ sunītī svayaśastaram
Griffith: Immortal, from of old Priest among mortal men, the most delightful in the house.
Devanāgarī: रास्वा च न उपमाते पुरुस्पृहं सुनीती स्वयशस्तरम्
pada pāṭha: ā | naḥ | agne | vayaḥ-vr̥dham | rayim | pāvaka | śaṁsyam || rāsva | ca | naḥ | upa-māte | puru-spr̥ham | su-nītī | svayaśaḥ-taram ||8.60.11||

IAST: yena vaṁsāma pṛtanāsu śardhatas taranto arya ādiśaḥ
Griffith: Agni, made yours by sacrifice, Agni, while holy rites advance;
Devanāgarī: येन वंसाम पृतनासु शर्धतस्तरन्तो अर्य आदिशः
pada pāṭha: yena | vaṁsāma | pr̥tanāsu | śardhataḥ | tarantaḥ | aryaḥ | ā-diśaḥ || saḥ | tvam | naḥ | vardha | prayasā | śacīvaso iti śacī-vaso | jinva | dhiyaḥ | vasu-vidaḥ ||8.60.12||

IAST: sa tvaṁ no vardha prayasā śacīvaso jinvā dhiyo vasuvidaḥ
Griffith: Agni, the first in songs, first with the warrior steed; Agril to win the land for us.
Devanāgarī: स त्वं नो वर्ध प्रयसा शचीवसो जिन्वा धियो वसुविदः
pada pāṭha: yena | vaṁsāma | pr̥tanāsu | śardhataḥ | tarantaḥ | aryaḥ | ā-diśaḥ || saḥ | tvam | naḥ | vardha | prayasā | śacīvaso iti śacī-vaso | jinva | dhiyaḥ | vasu-vidaḥ ||8.60.12||

IAST: śiśāno vṛṣabho yathāgniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat
Griffith: May Agni who is Lord of wealth vouchsafe us food for friendship sake.
pada pāṭha: śiśānaḥ | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | yathā | agniḥ | śr̥ṅge iti | davidhvat || tigmāḥ | asya | hanavaḥ | na | prati-dhr̥ṣe | su-jambhaḥ | sahasaḥ | yahuḥ ||8.60.13||

IAST: tigmā asya hanavo na pratidhṛṣe sujambhaḥ sahaso yahuḥ
Griffith: Agni we ever seek for seed and progeny, the Vasu who protects our lives.
Devanāgarī: तिग्मा अस्य हनवो न प्रतिधृषे सुजम्भः सहसो यहुः
pada pāṭha: śiśānaḥ | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | yathā | agniḥ | śr̥ṅge iti | davidhvat || tigmāḥ | asya | hanavaḥ | na | prati-dhr̥ṣe | su-jambhaḥ | sahasaḥ | yahuḥ ||8.60.13||

IAST: nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāso yad vitiṣṭhase
Griffith: Solicit with your chants, for help, Agni the God with piercing flame,
Devanāgarī: नहि ते अग्ने वृषभ प्रतिधृषे जम्भासो यद्वितिष्ठसे
pada pāṭha: nahi | te | agne | vr̥ṣabha | prati-dhr̥ṣe | jambhāsaḥ | yat | vi-tiṣṭhase || saḥ | tvam | naḥ | hotariti | su-hutam | haviḥ | kr̥dhi | vaṁsva | naḥ | vāryā | puru ||8.60.14||

IAST: sa tvaṁ no hotaḥ suhutaṁ haviṣ kṛdhi vaṁsvā no vāryā puru
Griffith: For riches famous Agni, Purumilha and ye men! Agni to light our dwelling well.
Devanāgarī: स त्वं नो होतः सुहुतं हविष्कृधि वंस्वा नो वार्या पुरु
pada pāṭha: nahi | te | agne | vr̥ṣabha | prati-dhr̥ṣe | jambhāsaḥ | yat | vi-tiṣṭhase || saḥ | tvam | naḥ | hotariti | su-hutam | haviḥ | kr̥dhi | vaṁsva | naḥ | vāryā | puru ||8.60.14||

IAST: śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ saṁ tvā martāsa indhate
Griffith: Agni we laud that he may keep our foes afar, Agni to give us health and strength.
Devanāgarī: शेषे वनेषु मात्रोः सं त्वा मर्तास इन्धते
pada pāṭha: śeṣe | vaneṣu | mātroḥ | sam | tvā | martāsaḥ | indhate || atandraḥ | havyā | vahasi | haviḥ-kr̥taḥ | āt | it | deveṣu | rājasi ||8.60.15||

IAST: atandro havyā vahasi haviṣkṛta ād id deveṣu rājasi
Griffith: Let him as Guardian be invoked in all the tribes, the lighter-up of glowing brands.
Devanāgarī: अतन्द्रो हव्या वहसि हविष्कृत आदिद्देवेषु राजसि
pada pāṭha: śeṣe | vaneṣu | mātroḥ | sam | tvā | martāsaḥ | indhate || atandraḥ | havyā | vahasi | haviḥ-kr̥taḥ | āt | it | deveṣu | rājasi ||8.60.15||

IAST: sapta hotāras tam id īḻate tvāgne sutyajam ahrayam
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: sapta | hotāraḥ | tam | it | īḷate | tvā | agne | su-tyajam | ahrayam || bhinatsi | adrim | tapasā | vi | śociṣā | pra | agne | tiṣṭha | janān | ati ||8.60.16||

IAST: bhinatsy adriṁ tapasā vi śociṣā prāgne tiṣṭha janām̐ ati
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: भिनत्स्यद्रिं तपसा वि शोचिषा प्राग्ने तिष्ठ जनाँ अति
pada pāṭha: sapta | hotāraḥ | tam | it | īḷate | tvā | agne | su-tyajam | ahrayam || bhinatsi | adrim | tapasā | vi | śociṣā | pra | agne | tiṣṭha | janān | ati ||8.60.16||

IAST: agnim-agniṁ vo adhriguṁ huvema vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: agnim-agnim | vaḥ | adhri-gum | huvema | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || agnim | hita-prayasaḥ | śaśvatīṣu | ā | hotāram | carṣaṇīnām ||8.60.17||

IAST: agniṁ hitaprayasaḥ śaśvatīṣv ā hotāraṁ carṣaṇīnām
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: agnim-agnim | vaḥ | adhri-gum | huvema | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ || agnim | hita-prayasaḥ | śaśvatīṣu | ā | hotāram | carṣaṇīnām ||8.60.17||

IAST: ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇy agne tubhyaṁ cikitvanā
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: ketena | śarman | sacate | su-sāmani | agne | tubhyam | cikitvanā || iṣaṇyayā | naḥ | puru-rūpam | ā | bhara | vājan | nediṣṭham | ūtaye ||8.60.18||

IAST: iṣaṇyayā naḥ pururūpam ā bhara vājaṁ nediṣṭham ūtaye
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: इषण्यया नः पुरुरूपमा भर वाजं नेदिष्ठमूतये
pada pāṭha: ketena | śarman | sacate | su-sāmani | agne | tubhyam | cikitvanā || iṣaṇyayā | naḥ | puru-rūpam | ā | bhara | vājan | nediṣṭham | ūtaye ||8.60.18||

IAST: agne jaritar viśpatis tepāno deva rakṣasaḥ
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: agne | jaritaḥ | viśpatiḥ | tepānaḥ | deva | rakṣasaḥ || aproṣi-vān | gr̥ha-patiḥ | mahān | asi | divaḥ | pāyuḥ | duroṇa-yuḥ ||8.60.19||

IAST: aproṣivān gṛhapatir mahām̐ asi divas pāyur duroṇayuḥ
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: agne | jaritaḥ | viśpatiḥ | tepānaḥ | deva | rakṣasaḥ || aproṣi-vān | gr̥ha-patiḥ | mahān | asi | divaḥ | pāyuḥ | duroṇa-yuḥ ||8.60.19||

IAST: mā no rakṣa ā veśīd āghṛṇīvaso mā yātur yātumāvatām
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: मा नो रक्ष आ वेशीदाघृणीवसो मा यातुर्यातुमावताम्
pada pāṭha: mā | naḥ | rakṣaḥ | ā | veśīt | āghr̥ṇivaso ityāghr̥ṇi-vaso | mā | yātuḥ | yātu-māvatām || paraḥ-gavyūti | anirām | apa | kṣudham | agne | sedha | rakṣasvinaḥ ||8.60.20||

IAST: parogavyūty anirām apa kṣudham agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: mā | naḥ | rakṣaḥ | ā | veśīt | āghr̥ṇivaso ityāghr̥ṇi-vaso | mā | yātuḥ | yātu-māvatām || paraḥ-gavyūti | anirām | apa | kṣudham | agne | sedha | rakṣasvinaḥ ||8.60.20||

IAST: ubhayaṁ śṛṇavac ca na indro arvāg idaṁ vacaḥ
Griffith: PREPARE oblation: let him come; and let the minister serve again
Devanāgarī: उभयं शृणवच्च न इन्द्रो अर्वागिदं वचः
pada pāṭha: ubhayam | śr̥ṇavat | ca | naḥ | indraḥ | arvāk | idam | vacaḥ || satrācyā | magha-vā | soma-pītaye | dhiyā | śaviṣṭhaḥ | ā | gamat ||8.61.1||

IAST: satrācyā maghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā gamat
Griffith: Who knows the ordering thereof,
Devanāgarī: सत्राच्या मघवा सोमपीतये धिया शविष्ठ आ गमत्
pada pāṭha: ubhayam | śr̥ṇavat | ca | naḥ | indraḥ | arvāk | idam | vacaḥ || satrācyā | magha-vā | soma-pītaye | dhiyā | śaviṣṭhaḥ | ā | gamat ||8.61.1||

IAST: taṁ hi svarājaṁ vṛṣabhaṁ tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ
Griffith: Rejoicing in his friendship, let the priest be seated over man,
Devanāgarī: तं हि स्वराजं वृषभं तमोजसे धिषणे निष्टतक्षतुः
pada pāṭha: tam | hi | sva-rājam | vr̥ṣabham | tam | ojase | dhiṣaṇe iti | niḥ-tatakṣatuḥ || uta | upa-mānām | prathamaḥ | ni | sīdasi | soma-kāmam | hi | te | manaḥ ||8.61.2||

IAST: utopamānām prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṁ hi te manaḥ
Griffith: Beside the shoot of active power.
Devanāgarī: उतोपमानां प्रथमो नि षीदसि सोमकामं हि ते मनः
pada pāṭha: tam | hi | sva-rājam | vr̥ṣabham | tam | ojase | dhiṣaṇe iti | niḥ-tatakṣatuḥ || uta | upa-mānām | prathamaḥ | ni | sīdasi | soma-kāmam | hi | te | manaḥ ||8.61.2||

IAST: ā vṛṣasva purūvaso sutasyendrāndhasaḥ
Griffith: Him, glowing bright beyond all thought, they seek among the race of man;
pada pāṭha: ā | vr̥ṣasva | puruvaso iti puru-vaso | sutasya | indra | andhasaḥ || vidma | hi | tvā | hari-vaḥ | pr̥t-su | sasahim | adhr̥ṣṭam | cit | dadhr̥ṣvaṇim ||8.61.3||

IAST: vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahim adhṛṣṭaṁ cid dadhṛṣvaṇim
Griffith: With him for tougue they seize the food.
Devanāgarī: विद्मा हि त्वा हरिवः पृत्सु सासहिमधृष्टं चिद्दधृष्वणिम्
pada pāṭha: ā | vr̥ṣasva | puruvaso iti puru-vaso | sutasya | indra | andhasaḥ || vidma | hi | tvā | hari-vaḥ | pr̥t-su | sasahim | adhr̥ṣṭam | cit | dadhr̥ṣvaṇim ||8.61.3||

IAST: aprāmisatya maghavan tathed asad indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ
Griffith: He hath inflamed the twofold plain: lifegiving, he hath climbed the wood,
pada pāṭha: aprāmi-satya | magha-van | tathā | it | asat | indra | kratvā | yathā | vaśaḥ || sanema | vājam | tava | śiprin | avasā | makṣu | cit | yantaḥ | adri-vaḥ ||8.61.4||

IAST: sanema vājaṁ tava śiprinn avasā makṣū cid yanto adrivaḥ
Griffith: And with his tongue hath struck the rock.
Devanāgarī: सनेम वाजं तव शिप्रिन्नवसा मक्षू चिद्यन्तो अद्रिवः
pada pāṭha: aprāmi-satya | magha-van | tathā | it | asat | indra | kratvā | yathā | vaśaḥ || sanema | vājam | tava | śiprin | avasā | makṣu | cit | yantaḥ | adri-vaḥ ||8.61.4||

IAST: śagdhy ū ṣu śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ
Griffith: Wandering here the radiant Calf finds none to fetter him, and seeks
pada pāṭha: śagdhi | ūm̐ iti | su | śacī-pate | indra | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ || bhagam | na | hi | tvā | yaśasam | vasu-vidam | anu | śūra | carāmasi ||8.61.5||

IAST: bhagaṁ na hi tvā yaśasaṁ vasuvidam anu śūra carāmasi
Griffith: The Mother to declare his praise.
Devanāgarī: भगं न हि त्वा यशसं वसुविदमनु शूर चरामसि
pada pāṭha: śagdhi | ūm̐ iti | su | śacī-pate | indra | viśvābhiḥ | ūti-bhiḥ || bhagam | na | hi | tvā | yaśasam | vasu-vidam | anu | śūra | carāmasi ||8.61.5||

IAST: pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavām asy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ
Griffith: And now that great and mighty team, the team of horses that are his,
pada pāṭha: pauraḥ | aśvasya | puru-kr̥t | gavām | asi | utsaḥ | deva | hiraṇyayaḥ || nakiḥ | hi | dānam | pari-mardhiṣat | tve iti | yat-yat | yāmi | tat | ā | bhara ||8.61.6||

IAST: nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yad-yad yāmi tad ā bhara
Griffith: And traces of his car, are seen.
Devanāgarī: नकिर्हि दानं परिमर्धिषत्त्वे यद्यद्यामि तदा भर
pada pāṭha: pauraḥ | aśvasya | puru-kr̥t | gavām | asi | utsaḥ | deva | hiraṇyayaḥ || nakiḥ | hi | dānam | pari-mardhiṣat | tve iti | yat-yat | yāmi | tat | ā | bhara ||8.61.6||

IAST: tvaṁ hy ehi cerave vidā bhagaṁ vasuttaye
Griffith: The seven milk a single cow; the two set other five to work,
Devanāgarī: त्वं ह्येहि चेरवे विदा भगं वसुत्तये
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | ā | ihi | cerave | vidāḥ | bhagam | vasuttaye || ut | vavr̥ṣasva | magha-van | go-iṣṭaye | ut | indra | aśvam-iṣṭaye ||8.61.7||

IAST: ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaya ud indrāśvamiṣṭaye
Griffith: On the stream's loud-resounding bank.
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | ā | ihi | cerave | vidāḥ | bhagam | vasuttaye || ut | vavr̥ṣasva | magha-van | go-iṣṭaye | ut | indra | aśvam-iṣṭaye ||8.61.7||

IAST: tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṁhase
Griffith: Entreated by Vivasvan's ten, Indra cast down the water-jar
Devanāgarī: त्वं पुरू सहस्राणि शतानि च यूथा दानाय मंहसे
pada pāṭha: tvam | puru | sahasrāṇi | śatāni | ca | yūthā | dānāya | maṁhase || ā | puram-daram | cakr̥ma | vipra-vacasaḥ | indram | gāyantaḥ | avase ||8.61.8||

IAST: ā puraṁdaraṁ cakṛma vipravacasa indraṁ gāyanto 'vase
Griffith: With threefold hammer from the sky.
Devanāgarī: आ पुरंदरं चकृम विप्रवचस इन्द्रं गायन्तोऽवसे
pada pāṭha: tvam | puru | sahasrāṇi | śatāni | ca | yūthā | dānāya | maṁhase || ā | puram-daram | cakr̥ma | vipra-vacasaḥ | indram | gāyantaḥ | avase ||8.61.8||

IAST: avipro vā yad avidhad vipro vendra te vacaḥ
Griffith: Three times the newIy-kindled flame proceeds around the sacrifice:
Devanāgarī: अविप्रो वा यदविधद्विप्रो वेन्द्र ते वचः
pada pāṭha: avipraḥ | vā | yat | avidhat | vipraḥ | vā | indra | te | vacaḥ || saḥ | pra | mamandat | tvā-yā | śatakrato iti śāta-krato | prācāmanyo iti prācā-manyo | aham-sana ||8.61.9||

IAST: sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṁsana
Griffith: The priests anoint it with the meath.
Devanāgarī: स प्र ममन्दत्त्वाया शतक्रतो प्राचामन्यो अहंसन
pada pāṭha: avipraḥ | vā | yat | avidhat | vipraḥ | vā | indra | te | vacaḥ || saḥ | pra | mamandat | tvā-yā | śatakrato iti śāta-krato | prācāmanyo iti prācā-manyo | aham-sana ||8.61.9||

IAST: ugrabāhur mrakṣakṛtvā puraṁdaro yadi me śṛṇavad dhavam
Griffith: With reverence they drain the fount that circles with its wheel above,
pada pāṭha: ugra-bāhuḥ | mrakṣa-kr̥tvā | puram-daraḥ | yadi | me | śr̥ṇavat | havam || vasu-yavaḥ | vasu-patim | śata-kratum | stomaiḥ | indram | havāmahe ||8.61.10||

IAST: vasūyavo vasupatiṁ śatakratuṁ stomair indraṁ havāmahe
Griffith: Exhaustless, with the mouth below.
pada pāṭha: ugra-bāhuḥ | mrakṣa-kr̥tvā | puram-daraḥ | yadi | me | śr̥ṇavat | havam || vasu-yavaḥ | vasu-patim | śata-kratum | stomaiḥ | indram | havāmahe ||8.61.10||

IAST: na pāpāso manāmahe nārāyāso na jaḻhavaḥ
Griffith: The pressing-stones are set at work: the meath is poured into the tank,
Devanāgarī: न पापासो मनामहे नारायासो न जळ्हवः
pada pāṭha: na | pāpāsaḥ | manāmahe | na | arāyāsaḥ | na | jaḷhavaḥ || yat | it | nu | indram | vr̥ṣaṇam | sacā | sute | sakhāyam | kr̥ṇavāmahai ||8.61.11||

IAST: yad in nv indraṁ vṛṣaṇaṁ sacā sute sakhāyaṁ kṛṇavāmahai
Griffith: At the out-shedding of the fount.
Devanāgarī: यदिन्न्विन्द्रं वृषणं सचा सुते सखायं कृणवामहै
pada pāṭha: na | pāpāsaḥ | manāmahe | na | arāyāsaḥ | na | jaḷhavaḥ || yat | it | nu | indram | vr̥ṣaṇam | sacā | sute | sakhāyam | kr̥ṇavāmahai ||8.61.11||

IAST: ugraṁ yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātim adābhyam
Griffith: Ye cows, protect the fount: the two Mighty Ones bless the sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: ugram | yuyujma | pr̥tanāsu | sasahim | r̥ṇa-kātim | adābhyam || veda | bhr̥mam | cit | sanitā | rathi-tamaḥ | vājinam | yam | it | ūm̐ iti | naśat ||8.61.12||

IAST: vedā bhṛmaṁ cit sanitā rathītamo vājinaṁ yam id ū naśat
Griffith: The handles twain are wrought of gold.
Devanāgarī: वेदा भृमं चित्सनिता रथीतमो वाजिनं यमिदू नशत्
pada pāṭha: ugram | yuyujma | pr̥tanāsu | sasahim | r̥ṇa-kātim | adābhyam || veda | bhr̥mam | cit | sanitā | rathi-tamaḥ | vājinam | yam | it | ūm̐ iti | naśat ||8.61.12||

IAST: yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṁ kṛdhi
Griffith: Pour on the juice the ornament which reaches both the heaven and earth
Devanāgarī: यत इन्द्र भयामहे ततो नो अभयं कृधि
pada pāṭha: yataḥ | indra | bhayāmahe | tataḥ | naḥ | abhayam | kr̥dhi || magha-van | śagdhi | tava | tat | naḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | vi | dviṣaḥ | vi | mr̥dhaḥ | jahi ||8.61.13||

IAST: maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi
Griffith: Supply the liquid to the Bull.
Devanāgarī: मघवञ्छग्धि तव तन्न ऊतिभिर्वि द्विषो वि मृधो जहि
pada pāṭha: yataḥ | indra | bhayāmahe | tataḥ | naḥ | abhayam | kr̥dhi || magha-van | śagdhi | tava | tat | naḥ | ūti-bhiḥ | vi | dviṣaḥ | vi | mr̥dhaḥ | jahi ||8.61.13||

IAST: tvaṁ hi rādhaspate rādhaso mahaḥ kṣayasyāsi vidhataḥ
Griffith: These know their own abiding-place: like calves beside the mother cows
Devanāgarī: त्वं हि राधस्पते राधसो महः क्षयस्यासि विधतः
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | rādhaḥ-pate | rādhasaḥ | mahaḥ | kṣayasya | asi | vidhataḥ || tam | tvā | vayam | magha-van | indra | girvaṇaḥ | suta-vantaḥ | havāmahe ||8.61.14||

IAST: taṁ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe
Griffith: They meet together with their kin.
Devanāgarī: तं त्वा वयं मघवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः सुतावन्तो हवामहे
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | rādhaḥ-pate | rādhasaḥ | mahaḥ | kṣayasya | asi | vidhataḥ || tam | tvā | vayam | magha-van | indra | girvaṇaḥ | suta-vantaḥ | havāmahe ||8.61.14||

IAST: indraḥ spaḻ uta vṛtrahā paraspā no vareṇyaḥ
Griffith: Devouring in their greedy jaws, they make sustaining food in heaven,
Devanāgarī: इन्द्रः स्पळुत वृत्रहा परस्पा नो वरेण्यः
pada pāṭha: indraḥ | spaṭ | uta | vr̥tra-hā | paraḥ-pāḥ | naḥ | vareṇyaḥ || saḥ | naḥ | rakṣiṣat | caramam | saḥ | madhyamam | saḥ | paścāt | pātu | naḥ | puraḥ ||8.61.15||

IAST: sa no rakṣiṣac caramaṁ sa madhyamaṁ sa paścāt pātu naḥ puraḥ
Griffith: To Indra, Agni light and prayer.
Devanāgarī: स नो रक्षिषच्चरमं स मध्यमं स पश्चात्पातु नः पुरः
pada pāṭha: indraḥ | spaṭ | uta | vr̥tra-hā | paraḥ-pāḥ | naḥ | vareṇyaḥ || saḥ | naḥ | rakṣiṣat | caramam | saḥ | madhyamam | saḥ | paścāt | pātu | naḥ | puraḥ ||8.61.15||

IAST: tvaṁ naḥ paścād adharād uttarāt pura indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ
Griffith: The Pious One milked out rich food, sustenance dealt in portions seven,
Devanāgarī: त्वं नः पश्चादधरादुत्तरात्पुर इन्द्र नि पाहि विश्वतः
pada pāṭha: tvam | naḥ | paścāt | adharāt | uttarāt | puraḥ | indra | ni | pāhi | viśvataḥ || āre | asmat | kr̥ṇuhi | daivyam | bhayam | āre | hetīḥ | adevīḥ ||8.61.16||

IAST: āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam āre hetīr adevīḥ
Griffith: Together with the Sun's seven rays.
pada pāṭha: tvam | naḥ | paścāt | adharāt | uttarāt | puraḥ | indra | ni | pāhi | viśvataḥ || āre | asmat | kr̥ṇuhi | daivyam | bhayam | āre | hetīḥ | adevīḥ ||8.61.16||

IAST: adyādyā śvaḥ-śva indra trāsva pare ca naḥ
Griffith: I took some Soma when the Sun rose up, O Mitra, Varuna.
Devanāgarī: अद्याद्या श्वःश्व इन्द्र त्रास्व परे च नः
pada pāṭha: adya-adya | śvaḥ-śvaḥ | indras | trāsva | pare | ca | naḥ || viśvā | ca | naḥ | jaritr̥̄n | sat-pate | ahā | divā | naktam | ca | rakṣiṣaḥ ||8.61.17||

IAST: viśvā ca no jaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktaṁ ca rakṣiṣaḥ
Griffith: That is the sick man's medicine.
Devanāgarī: विश्वा च नो जरितॄन्सत्पते अहा दिवा नक्तं च रक्षिषः
pada pāṭha: adya-adya | śvaḥ-śvaḥ | indras | trāsva | pare | ca | naḥ || viśvā | ca | naḥ | jaritr̥̄n | sat-pate | ahā | divā | naktam | ca | rakṣiṣaḥ ||8.61.17||

IAST: prabhaṅgī śūro maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiślo viryāya kam
Griffith: From where oblations must be laid, which is the Well-beloved's home,
Devanāgarī: प्रभङ्गी शूरो मघवा तुवीमघः सम्मिश्लो विर्याय कम्
pada pāṭha: pra-bhaṅgī | śūraḥ | magha-vā | tuvi-maghaḥ | sam-miślaḥ | vīryāya | kam || ubhā | te | bāhū iti | vr̥ṣaṇā | śatakrato iti śata-krato | ni | yā | vajram | mimikṣatuḥ ||8.61.18||

IAST: ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ
Griffith: He with his tongue hath compassed heaven.
Devanāgarī: उभा ते बाहू वृषणा शतक्रतो नि या वज्रं मिमिक्षतुः
pada pāṭha: pra-bhaṅgī | śūraḥ | magha-vā | tuvi-maghaḥ | sam-miślaḥ | vīryāya | kam || ubhā | te | bāhū iti | vr̥ṣaṇā | śatakrato iti śata-krato | ni | yā | vajram | mimikṣatuḥ ||8.61.18||

IAST: pro asmā upastutim bharatā yaj jujoṣati
Griffith: ROUSE ye for him who keeps the Law, yoke your steeds, Aiyins, to your car
pada pāṭha: pro iti | asmai | upa-stutim | bharata | yat | jujoṣati || ukthaiḥ | indrasya | māhinam | vayaḥ | vardhanti | sominaḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.1||

IAST: ukthair indrasya māhinaṁ vayo vardhanti somino bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: उक्थैरिन्द्रस्य माहिनं वयो वर्धन्ति सोमिनो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: pro iti | asmai | upa-stutim | bharata | yat | jujoṣati || ukthaiḥ | indrasya | māhinam | vayaḥ | vardhanti | sominaḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.1||

IAST: ayujo asamo nṛbhir ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr ayāsyaḥ
Griffith: Come, Asvins, with your car more swift than is the twinkling of an eye
pada pāṭha: ayujaḥ | asamaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | ekaḥ | kr̥ṣṭīḥ | ayāsyaḥ || pūrvīḥ | ati | pra | vavr̥dhe | viśvā | jātāni | ojasā | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.2||

IAST: pūrvīr ati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātāny ojasā bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: पूर्वीरति प्र वावृधे विश्वा जातान्योजसा भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: ayujaḥ | asamaḥ | nr̥-bhiḥ | ekaḥ | kr̥ṣṭīḥ | ayāsyaḥ || pūrvīḥ | ati | pra | vavr̥dhe | viśvā | jātāni | ojasā | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.2||

IAST: ahitena cid arvatā jīradānuḥ siṣāsati
Griffith: Asvins, ye overlaid with cold the fiery pit for Atri's sake:
pada pāṭha: ahitena | cit | arvatā | jīra-dānuḥ | sisāsati || pra-vācyam | indra | tat | tava | vīryāṇi | kariṣyataḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.3||

IAST: pravācyam indra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: प्रवाच्यमिन्द्र तत्तव वीर्याणि करिष्यतो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: ahitena | cit | arvatā | jīra-dānuḥ | sisāsati || pra-vācyam | indra | tat | tava | vīryāṇi | kariṣyataḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.3||

IAST: ā yāhi kṛṇavāma ta indra brahmāṇi vardhanā
Griffith: Where are ye? whither are ye gone? whither, like falcons, have ye flown?
Devanāgarī: आ याहि कृणवाम त इन्द्र ब्रह्माणि वर्धना
pada pāṭha: ā | yāhi | kr̥ṇavāma | te | indra | brahmāṇi | vardhanā || yebhiḥ | śaviṣṭha | cākanaḥ | bhadram | iha | śravasyate | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.4||

IAST: yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākano bhadram iha śravasyate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: येभिः शविष्ठ चाकनो भद्रमिह श्रवस्यते भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: ā | yāhi | kr̥ṇavāma | te | indra | brahmāṇi | vardhanā || yebhiḥ | śaviṣṭha | cākanaḥ | bhadram | iha | śravasyate | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.4||

IAST: dhṛṣataś cid dhṛṣan manaḥ kṛṇoṣīndra yat tvam
Griffith: If ye at any time this day are listening to this my call,
pada pāṭha: dhr̥ṣataḥ | cit | dhr̥ṣat | manaḥ | kr̥ṇoṣi | indra | yat | tvam || tīvraiḥ | somaiḥ | saparyataḥ | namaḥ-bhiḥ | prati-bhūṣataḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.5||

IAST: tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyato namobhiḥ pratibhūṣato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: तीव्रैः सोमैः सपर्यतो नमोभिः प्रतिभूषतो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: dhr̥ṣataḥ | cit | dhr̥ṣat | manaḥ | kr̥ṇoṣi | indra | yat | tvam || tīvraiḥ | somaiḥ | saparyataḥ | namaḥ-bhiḥ | prati-bhūṣataḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.5||

IAST: ava caṣṭa ṛcīṣamo 'vatām̐ iva mānuṣaḥ
Griffith: The Asvins, fust to hear our prayer, for closest kinship I approach:
pada pāṭha: ava | caṣṭe | r̥cīṣamaḥ | avatān-iva | mānuṣaḥ || juṣṭvī | dakṣasya | sominaḥ | sakhāyam | kr̥ṇute | yujam | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.6||

IAST: juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyaṁ kṛṇute yujam bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: जुष्ट्वी दक्षस्य सोमिनः सखायं कृणुते युजं भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: ava | caṣṭe | r̥cīṣamaḥ | avatān-iva | mānuṣaḥ || juṣṭvī | dakṣasya | sominaḥ | sakhāyam | kr̥ṇute | yujam | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.6||

IAST: viśve ta indra vīryaṁ devā anu kratuṁ daduḥ
Griffith: For Atri ye, O Asvins, made a dwellingplace to shield him well,
Devanāgarī: विश्वे त इन्द्र वीर्यं देवा अनु क्रतुं ददुः
pada pāṭha: viśve | te | indra | vīryam | devāḥ | anu | kratum | daduḥ || bhuvaḥ | viśvasya | go-patiḥ | puru-stuta | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.7||

IAST: bhuvo viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: भुवो विश्वस्य गोपतिः पुरुष्टुत भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: viśve | te | indra | vīryam | devāḥ | anu | kratum | daduḥ || bhuvaḥ | viśvasya | go-patiḥ | puru-stuta | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.7||

IAST: gṛṇe tad indra te śava upamaṁ devatātaye
Griffith: Ye warded off the fervent heat for Atri when he sweetly spake:
Devanāgarī: गृणे तदिन्द्र ते शव उपमं देवतातये
pada pāṭha: gr̥ṇe | tat | indra | te | śavaḥ | upa-mam | deva-tātaye || yat | haṁsi | vr̥tram | ojasā | śacī-pate | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.8||

IAST: yad dhaṁsi vṛtram ojasā śacīpate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: यद्धंसि वृत्रमोजसा शचीपते भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: gr̥ṇe | tat | indra | te | śavaḥ | upa-mam | deva-tātaye || yat | haṁsi | vr̥tram | ojasā | śacī-pate | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.8||

IAST: samaneva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavan mānuṣā yugā
Griffith: Erst Saptavadbri by his prayer obtained the trenchant edge of fire:
pada pāṭha: samanā-iva | vapuṣyataḥ | kr̥ṇavat | mānuṣā | yugā || vide | tat | indraḥ | cetanam | adha | śrutaḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.9||

IAST: vide tad indraś cetanam adha śruto bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: विदे तदिन्द्रश्चेतनमध श्रुतो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: samanā-iva | vapuṣyataḥ | kr̥ṇavat | mānuṣā | yugā || vide | tat | indraḥ | cetanam | adha | śrutaḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.9||

IAST: uj jātam indra te śava ut tvām ut tava kratum
Griffith: Come hither, O ye Lords of wealth, and listen to this call of mine:
pada pāṭha: ut | jātam | indra | te | śavaḥ | ut | tvām | ut | tava | kratum || bhūrigo iti bhūri-go | bhūri | vavr̥dhuḥ | magha-van | tava | śarmaṇi | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.10||

IAST: bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhur maghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: भूरिगो भूरि वावृधुर्मघवन्तव शर्मणि भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: ut | jātam | indra | te | śavaḥ | ut | tvām | ut | tava | kratum || bhūrigo iti bhūri-go | bhūri | vavr̥dhuḥ | magha-van | tava | śarmaṇi | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.10||

IAST: ahaṁ ca tvaṁ ca vṛtrahan saṁ yujyāva sanibhya ā
Griffith: What is this praise told forth of you as Elders in the ancient way?
Devanāgarī: अहं च त्वं च वृत्रहन्सं युज्याव सनिभ्य आ
pada pāṭha: aham | ca | tvam | ca | vr̥tra-han | sam | yujyāva | sani-bhyaḥ | ā || arāti-vā | cit | adri-vaḥ | anu | nau | śūra | maṁsate | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.11||

IAST: arātīvā cid adrivo 'nu nau śūra maṁsate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: अरातीवा चिदद्रिवोऽनु नौ शूर मंसते भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: aham | ca | tvam | ca | vr̥tra-han | sam | yujyāva | sani-bhyaḥ | ā || arāti-vā | cit | adri-vaḥ | anu | nau | śūra | maṁsate | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.11||

IAST: satyam id vā u taṁ vayam indraṁ stavāma nānṛtam
Griffith: One common brotherhood is yours, Asvins your kindred is the same:
Devanāgarī: सत्यमिद्वा उ तं वयमिन्द्रं स्तवाम नानृतम्
pada pāṭha: satyam | it | vai | ūm̐ iti | tam | vayam | indram | stavāma | na | anr̥tam || mahān | asunvataḥ | vadhaḥ | bhūri | jyotīṁṣi | sunvataḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.12||

IAST: mahām̐ asunvato vadho bhūri jyotīṁṣi sunvato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
Griffith: Let your protecting help be near.
Devanāgarī: महाँ असुन्वतो वधो भूरि ज्योतींषि सुन्वतो भद्रा इन्द्रस्य रातयः
pada pāṭha: satyam | it | vai | ūm̐ iti | tam | vayam | indram | stavāma | na | anr̥tam || mahān | asunvataḥ | vadhaḥ | bhūri | jyotīṁṣi | sunvataḥ | bhadrāḥ | indrasya | rātayaḥ ||8.62.12||

IAST: sa pūrvyo mahānāṁ venaḥ kratubhir ānaje
Griffith: EXERTING all our strength with thoughts of power we glorify in speech
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pūrvyaḥ | mahānām | venaḥ | kratu-bhiḥ | ānaje || yasya | dvārā | manuḥ | pitā | deveṣu | dhiyaḥ | ānaje ||8.63.1||

IAST: yasya dvārā manuṣ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje
Griffith: Agni your dear familiar Friend, the darling Guest in every home.
Devanāgarī: यस्य द्वारा मनुष्पिता देवेषु धिय आनजे
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pūrvyaḥ | mahānām | venaḥ | kratu-bhiḥ | ānaje || yasya | dvārā | manuḥ | pitā | deveṣu | dhiyaḥ | ānaje ||8.63.1||

IAST: divo mānaṁ not sadan somapṛṣṭhāso adrayaḥ
Griffith: Whom, served with sacrificial oil like Mitra, men presenting gifts
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | mānam | na | ut | sadan | soma-pr̥ṣṭhāsaḥ | adrayaḥ || ukthā | brahma | ca | śaṁsyā ||8.63.2||

IAST: ukthā brahma ca śaṁsyā
Griffith: Eulogize with their songs of praise
pada pāṭha: divaḥ | mānam | na | ut | sadan | soma-pr̥ṣṭhāsaḥ | adrayaḥ || ukthā | brahma | ca | śaṁsyā ||8.63.2||

IAST: sa vidvām̐ aṅgirobhya indro gā avṛṇod apa
Griffith: Much-lauded Jatavedas, him who bears oblations up to heaven
Devanāgarī: स विद्वाँ अङ्गिरोभ्य इन्द्रो गा अवृणोदप
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vidvān | aṅgiraḥ-bhyaḥ | indraḥ | gāḥ | avr̥ṇot | apa || stuṣe | tat | asya | pauṁsyam ||8.63.3||

IAST: stuṣe tad asya pauṁsyam
Griffith: Prepared in service of the Gods.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | vidvān | aṅgiraḥ-bhyaḥ | indraḥ | gāḥ | avr̥ṇot | apa || stuṣe | tat | asya | pauṁsyam ||8.63.3||

IAST: sa pratnathā kavivṛdha indro vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ
Griffith: To noblest Agni, Friend of man, best Vrtra-slayer, are we come,
Devanāgarī: स प्रत्नथा कविवृध इन्द्रो वाकस्य वक्षणिः
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pratna-thā | kavi-vr̥dhaḥ | indraḥ | vākasya | vakṣaṇiḥ || śivaḥ | arkasya | homani | asma-trā | gantu | avase ||8.63.4||

IAST: śivo arkasya homany asmatrā gantv avase
Griffith: Him in whose presence Rksa's son, mighty Srutarvan, waxes great;
pada pāṭha: saḥ | pratna-thā | kavi-vr̥dhaḥ | indraḥ | vākasya | vakṣaṇiḥ || śivaḥ | arkasya | homani | asma-trā | gantu | avase ||8.63.4||

IAST: ād ū nu te anu kratuṁ svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ
Griffith: To deathless Jatavedas, meet for praise, adored, with sacred oil,
Devanāgarī: आदू नु ते अनु क्रतुं स्वाहा वरस्य यज्यवः
pada pāṭha: āt | ūm̐ iti | nu | te | anu | kratum | svāhā | varasya | yajyavaḥ || śvātram | arkāḥ | anūṣata | indra | gotrasya | dāvane ||8.63.5||

IAST: śvātram arkā anūṣatendra gotrasya dāvane
Griffith: Visible through the gloom o:f night
pada pāṭha: āt | ūm̐ iti | nu | te | anu | kratum | svāhā | varasya | yajyavaḥ || śvātram | arkāḥ | anūṣata | indra | gotrasya | dāvane ||8.63.5||

IAST: indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca
Griffith: Even Agni whom these priestly men worship with sacrificial gifts,
Devanāgarī: इन्द्रे विश्वानि वीर्या कृतानि कर्त्वानि च
pada pāṭha: indre | viśvāni | vīryā | kr̥tāni | kartvāni | ca || yam | arkāḥ | adhvaram | viduḥ ||8.63.6||

IAST: yam arkā adhvaraṁ viduḥ
Griffith: With lifted ladles offering them.
pada pāṭha: indre | viśvāni | vīryā | kr̥tāni | kartvāni | ca || yam | arkāḥ | adhvaram | viduḥ ||8.63.6||

IAST: yat pāñcajanyayā viśendre ghoṣā asṛkṣata
Griffith: O Agni, this our newest hymn hath been addressed from us to thee,
pada pāṭha: yat | pāñca-janyayā | viśā | indre | ghoṣāḥ | asr̥kṣata || astr̥ṇāt | barhaṇā | vipaḥ | aryaḥ | mānasya | saḥ | kṣayaḥ ||8.63.7||

IAST: astṛṇād barhaṇā vipo 'ryo mānasya sa kṣayaḥ
Griffith: O cheerful Guest, well-born, most wise, worker of wonders, ne'er deceived.
pada pāṭha: yat | pāñca-janyayā | viśā | indre | ghoṣāḥ | asr̥kṣata || astr̥ṇāt | barhaṇā | vipaḥ | aryaḥ | mānasya | saḥ | kṣayaḥ ||8.63.7||

IAST: iyam u te anuṣṭutiś cakṛṣe tāni pauṁsyā
Griffith: Agni, may it be dear to thee, most grateful, and exceeding sweet:
pada pāṭha: iyam | ūm̐ iti | te | anu-stutiḥ | cakr̥ṣe | tāni | pauṁsyā || pra | āvaḥ | cakrasya | vartanim ||8.63.8||

IAST: prāvaś cakrasya vartanim
Griffith: Grow mightier, eulogized therewith.
pada pāṭha: iyam | ūm̐ iti | te | anu-stutiḥ | cakr̥ṣe | tāni | pauṁsyā || pra | āvaḥ | cakrasya | vartanim ||8.63.8||

IAST: asya vṛṣṇo vyodana uru kramiṣṭa jīvase
Griffith: Splendid with splendours may it be, and in the battle with the foe
Devanāgarī: अस्य वृष्णो व्योदन उरु क्रमिष्ट जीवसे
pada pāṭha: asya | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | vi-odane | uru | kramiṣṭa | jīvase || yavam | na | paśvaḥ | ā | dade ||8.63.9||

IAST: yavaṁ na paśva ā dade
Griffith: Add loftier glory to thy fame.
pada pāṭha: asya | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | vi-odane | uru | kramiṣṭa | jīvase || yavam | na | paśvaḥ | ā | dade ||8.63.9||

IAST: tad dadhānā avasyavo yuṣmābhir dakṣapitaraḥ
Griffith: Steed, cow, a lord of heroes, bright like Indra, who shall fill the car.
pada pāṭha: tat | dadhānāḥ | avasyavaḥ | yuṣmābhiḥ | dakṣa-pitaraḥ || syāma | marutvataḥ | vr̥dhe ||8.63.10||

IAST: syāma marutvato vṛdhe
Griffith: Whose high renown ye celebrate, and people praise each glorious deed.
pada pāṭha: tat | dadhānāḥ | avasyavaḥ | yuṣmābhiḥ | dakṣa-pitaraḥ || syāma | marutvataḥ | vr̥dhe ||8.63.10||

IAST: baḻ ṛtviyāya dhāmna ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ
Griffith: Thou whom Gopavana made glad with song, O Agni Angiras,
pada pāṭha: baṭ | r̥tviyāya | dhāmne | r̥kva-bhiḥ | śūra | nonumaḥ || jeṣāma | indra | tvayā | yujā ||8.63.11||

IAST: jeṣāmendra tvayā yujā
Griffith: Hear this my call, thou Holy One.
pada pāṭha: baṭ | r̥tviyāya | dhāmne | r̥kva-bhiḥ | śūra | nonumaḥ || jeṣāma | indra | tvayā | yujā ||8.63.11||

IAST: asme rudrā mehanā parvatāso vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ
Griffith: Thou whom the priestly folk implore to aid the gathering of the spoil,
Devanāgarī: अस्मे रुद्रा मेहना पर्वतासो वृत्रहत्ये भरहूतौ सजोषाः
pada pāṭha: asme iti | rudrāḥ | mehanā | parvatāsaḥ | vr̥tra-hatye | bhara-hūtau | sa-joṣāḥ || yaḥ | śaṁsate | stuvate | dhāyi | pajraḥ | indra-jyeṣṭhāḥ | asmān | avantu | devāḥ ||8.63.12||

IAST: yaḥ śaṁsate stuvate dhāyi pajra indrajyeṣṭhā asmām̐ avantu devāḥ
Griffith: Such be thou in the fight with foes.
Devanāgarī: यः शंसते स्तुवते धायि पज्र इन्द्रज्येष्ठा अस्माँ अवन्तु देवाः
pada pāṭha: asme iti | rudrāḥ | mehanā | parvatāsaḥ | vr̥tra-hatye | bhara-hūtau | sa-joṣāḥ || yaḥ | śaṁsate | stuvate | dhāyi | pajraḥ | indra-jyeṣṭhāḥ | asmān | avantu | devāḥ ||8.63.12||

IAST: ut tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ
Griffith: YOKE, Agni, as a charioteer, thy steeds who best invite the Gods:
Devanāgarī: उत्त्वा मन्दन्तु स्तोमाः कृणुष्व राधो अद्रिवः
pada pāṭha: ut | tvā | mandantu | stomāḥ | kr̥ṇuṣva | rādhaḥ | adri-vaḥ || ava | brahma-dviṣaḥ | jahi ||8.64.1||

IAST: ava brahmadviṣo jahi
Griffith: As ancient Herald seat thyself.
pada pāṭha: ut | tvā | mandantu | stomāḥ | kr̥ṇuṣva | rādhaḥ | adri-vaḥ || ava | brahma-dviṣaḥ | jahi ||8.64.1||

IAST: padā paṇīm̐r arādhaso ni bādhasva mahām̐ asi
Griffith: And, God, as skilfullest of all, call for us bitherward the Gods:
Devanāgarī: पदा पणीँरराधसो नि बाधस्व महाँ असि
pada pāṭha: padā | paṇīn | arādhasaḥ | ni | bādhasva | mahān | asi || nahi | tvā | kaḥ | cana | prati ||8.64.2||

IAST: nahi tvā kaś cana prati
Griffith: Give all our wishes sure effect.
pada pāṭha: padā | paṇīn | arādhasaḥ | ni | bādhasva | mahān | asi || nahi | tvā | kaḥ | cana | prati ||8.64.2||

IAST: tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām
Griffith: For thou, Most Youthful, Son of Strength, thou to whom sacrifice is paid,
pada pāṭha: tvam | īśiṣe | sutānām | indra | tvam | asutānām || tvam | rājā | janānām ||8.64.3||

IAST: tvaṁ rājā janānām
Griffith: Art holy, faithful to the Law.
pada pāṭha: tvam | īśiṣe | sutānām | indra | tvam | asutānām || tvam | rājā | janānām ||8.64.3||

IAST: ehi prehi kṣayo divy āghoṣañ carṣaṇīnām
Griffith: This Agni, Lord of wealth and spoil hundredfold, thousandfold, is head
pada pāṭha: ā | ihi | pra | ihi | kṣayaḥ | divi | ā-ghoṣan | carṣaṇīṇām || ā | ubhe iti | pr̥ṇāsi | rodasī iti ||8.64.4||

IAST: obhe pṛṇāsi rodasī
Griffith: And chief of riches and a Sage.
pada pāṭha: ā | ihi | pra | ihi | kṣayaḥ | divi | ā-ghoṣan | carṣaṇīṇām || ā | ubhe iti | pr̥ṇāsi | rodasī iti ||8.64.4||

IAST: tyaṁ cit parvataṁ giriṁ śatavantaṁ sahasriṇam
Griffith: As craftsmen bend the felly, so bend at our general call: come nigh,
pada pāṭha: tyam | cit | parvatam | girim | śata-vantam | sahasriṇam || vi | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | rurojitha ||8.64.5||

IAST: vi stotṛbhyo rurojitha
Griffith: Angiras, to the sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: tyam | cit | parvatam | girim | śata-vantam | sahasriṇam || vi | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | rurojitha ||8.64.5||

IAST: vayam u tvā divā sute vayaṁ naktaṁ havāmahe
Griffith: Now, O Virupa, rouse for him, Strong God who shines at early morn,
Devanāgarī: वयमु त्वा दिवा सुते वयं नक्तं हवामहे
pada pāṭha: vayam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | divā | sute | vayam | naktam | havāmahe || asmākam | kāmam | ā | pr̥ṇa ||8.64.6||

IAST: asmākaṁ kāmam ā pṛṇa
Griffith: Fair praise with voice that ceases not.
pada pāṭha: vayam | ūm̐ iti | tvā | divā | sute | vayam | naktam | havāmahe || asmākam | kāmam | ā | pr̥ṇa ||8.64.6||

IAST: kva sya vṛṣabho yuvā tuvigrīvo anānataḥ
Griffith: With missile of this Agni, his who looks afar, will we lay low
Devanāgarī: क्व स्य वृषभो युवा तुविग्रीवो अनानतः
pada pāṭha: kva | syaḥ | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | yuvā | tuvi-grīvaḥ | anānataḥ || brahmā | kaḥ | tam | saparyati ||8.64.7||

IAST: brahmā kas taṁ saparyati
Griffith: The thief in combat for the kine.
pada pāṭha: kva | syaḥ | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | yuvā | tuvi-grīvaḥ | anānataḥ || brahmā | kaḥ | tam | saparyati ||8.64.7||

IAST: kasya svit savanaṁ vṛṣā jujuṣvām̐ ava gacchati
Griffith: Let not the Companies of Gods fail us, like Dawns that float away,
Devanāgarī: कस्य स्वित्सवनं वृषा जुजुष्वाँ अव गच्छति
pada pāṭha: kasya | svit | savanam | vr̥ṣā | jujuṣvān | ava | gacchati || indram | kaḥ | ūm̐ iti | svit | ā | cake ||8.64.8||

IAST: indraṁ ka u svid ā cake
Griffith: Like cows who leave the niggardly.
pada pāṭha: kasya | svit | savanam | vr̥ṣā | jujuṣvān | ava | gacchati || indram | kaḥ | ūm̐ iti | svit | ā | cake ||8.64.8||

IAST: kaṁ te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kaṁ suvīryā
Griffith: Let not the sinful tyranny of any fiercely hating foe
Devanāgarī: कं ते दाना असक्षत वृत्रहन्कं सुवीर्या
pada pāṭha: kam | te | dānāḥ | asakṣata | vr̥tra-han | kam | su-vīryā || ukthe | kaḥ | ūm̐ iti | svit | antamaḥ ||8.64.9||

IAST: ukthe ka u svid antamaḥ
Griffith: Smite us, as billows smite a ship.
pada pāṭha: kam | te | dānāḥ | asakṣata | vr̥tra-han | kam | su-vīryā || ukthe | kaḥ | ūm̐ iti | svit | antamaḥ ||8.64.9||

IAST: ayaṁ te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate
Griffith: O Agni, God, the people sing reverent praise to thee for strength:
Devanāgarī: अयं ते मानुषे जने सोमः पूरुषु सूयते
pada pāṭha: ayam | te | mānuṣe | jane | somaḥ | pūruṣu | sūyate || tasya | ā | ihi | pra | drava | piba ||8.64.10||

IAST: tasyehi pra dravā piba
Griffith: With terrors trouble thou the foe.
pada pāṭha: ayam | te | mānuṣe | jane | somaḥ | pūruṣu | sūyate || tasya | ā | ihi | pra | drava | piba ||8.64.10||

IAST: ayaṁ te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ
Griffith: Wilt thou not, Agni, lend us aid in winning cattle, winning wealth?
pada pāṭha: ayam | te | śaryaṇā-vati | su-somāyām | adhi | priyaḥ || ārjīkīye | madin-tamaḥ ||8.64.11||

IAST: ārjīkīye madintamaḥ
Griffith: Maker of room, make room for us.
pada pāṭha: ayam | te | śaryaṇā-vati | su-somāyām | adhi | priyaḥ || ārjīkīye | madin-tamaḥ ||8.64.11||

IAST: tam adya rādhase mahe cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye
Griffith: In this great battle cast us not aside as one who bears a load:
Devanāgarī: तमद्य राधसे महे चारुं मदाय घृष्वये
pada pāṭha: tam | adya | rādhase | mahe | cārum | madāya | ghr̥ṣvaye || ā | ihi | īm | indra | drava | piba ||8.64.12||

IAST: ehīm indra dravā piba
Griffith: Snatch up the wealih and win it all.
pada pāṭha: tam | adya | rādhase | mahe | cārum | madāya | ghr̥ṣvaye || ā | ihi | īm | indra | drava | piba ||8.64.12||

IAST: yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ
Griffith: I. NOT to forsake me, I invoke this Indra girt by Maruts,
pada pāṭha: yat | indra | prāk | apāk | udak | nyak | vā | hūyase | nr̥-bhiḥ || ā | yāhi | tūyam | āśu-bhiḥ ||8.65.1||

IAST: ā yāhi tūyam āśubhiḥ
Griffith: Lord Of magic power who rules with might.
pada pāṭha: yat | indra | prāk | apāk | udak | nyak | vā | hūyase | nr̥-bhiḥ || ā | yāhi | tūyam | āśu-bhiḥ ||8.65.1||

IAST: yad vā prasravaṇe divo mādayāse svarṇare
Griffith: This Indra with his Marut Friends clave into pieces Vrtra's bead
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | pra-sravaṇe | divaḥ | mādayāse | svaḥ-nare || yat | vā | samudre | andhasaḥ ||8.65.2||

IAST: yad vā samudre andhasaḥ
Griffith: With hundred-knotted thunderbolt.
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | pra-sravaṇe | divaḥ | mādayāse | svaḥ-nare || yat | vā | samudre | andhasaḥ ||8.65.2||

IAST: ā tvā gīrbhir mahām uruṁ huve gām iva bhojase
Griffith: Indra, with Marut Friends grown strong, hath rent asunder Vrtra, and
Devanāgarī: आ त्वा गीर्भिर्महामुरुं हुवे गामिव भोजसे
pada pāṭha: ā | tvā | gīḥ-bhiḥ | mahām | urum | huve | gām-iva | bhojase || indra | somasya | pītaye ||8.65.3||

IAST: indra somasya pītaye
Griffith: Released the waters of the sea.
pada pāṭha: ā | tvā | gīḥ-bhiḥ | mahām | urum | huve | gām-iva | bhojase || indra | somasya | pītaye ||8.65.3||

IAST: ā ta indra mahimānaṁ harayo deva te mahaḥ
Griffith: This is that Indra who, begirt by Maruts, won the light of heaven
Devanāgarī: आ त इन्द्र महिमानं हरयो देव ते महः
pada pāṭha: ā | te | indra | mahimānam | harayaḥ | deva | te | mahaḥ || rathe | vahantu | bibhrataḥ ||8.65.4||

IAST: rathe vahantu bibhrataḥ
Griffith: That he might drink the Soma juice.
pada pāṭha: ā | te | indra | mahimānam | harayaḥ | deva | te | mahaḥ || rathe | vahantu | bibhrataḥ ||8.65.4||

IAST: indra gṛṇīṣa u stuṣe mahām̐ ugra īśānakṛt
Griffith: Mighty, impetuous, begirt by Maruts, him who loudly roars,
Devanāgarī: इन्द्र गृणीष उ स्तुषे महाँ उग्र ईशानकृत्
pada pāṭha: indra | gr̥ṇīṣe | ūm̐ iti | stuṣe | mahān | ugraḥ | īśāna-kr̥t || ā | ihi | naḥ | sutam | piba ||8.65.5||

IAST: ehi naḥ sutam piba
Griffith: Indra we invocate with songs.
pada pāṭha: indra | gr̥ṇīṣe | ūm̐ iti | stuṣe | mahān | ugraḥ | īśāna-kr̥t || ā | ihi | naḥ | sutam | piba ||8.65.5||

IAST: sutāvantas tvā vayam prayasvanto havāmahe
Griffith: Indra begirt by Maruts we invoke after the ancient plan,
pada pāṭha: suta-vantaḥ | tvā | vayam | prayasvantaḥ | havāmahe || idam | naḥ | barhiḥ | ā-sade ||8.65.6||

IAST: idaṁ no barhir āsade
Griffith: That he may drink the Soma juice.
pada pāṭha: suta-vantaḥ | tvā | vayam | prayasvantaḥ | havāmahe || idam | naḥ | barhiḥ | ā-sade ||8.65.6||

IAST: yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam
Griffith: O liberal Indra, Marut-girt, much-lauded Satakratu, drink
pada pāṭha: yat | cit | hi | śaśvatām | asi | indra | sādhāraṇaḥ | tvam || tam | tvā | vayam | havāmahe ||8.65.7||

IAST: taṁ tvā vayaṁ havāmahe
Griffith: The Soma at this sacrifice.
pada pāṭha: yat | cit | hi | śaśvatām | asi | indra | sādhāraṇaḥ | tvam || tam | tvā | vayam | havāmahe ||8.65.7||

IAST: idaṁ te somyam madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ
Griffith: To thee, O Indra, Marut-girt, these Soma juices, Thunderer!
