pada pāṭha: yāḥ | indra | bhujaḥ | ā | abharaḥ | svaḥ-vān | asurebhyaḥ || stotāram | it | magha-van | asya | vardhaya | ye | ca | tve iti | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ ||8.97.1||

IAST: stotāram in maghavann asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
Griffith: Best breaker-down of forts, kine-winner, Lord of wealth, we seek thee, Indra Maghavan.
Devanāgarī: स्तोतारमिन्मघवन्नस्य वर्धय ये च त्वे वृक्तबर्हिषः
pada pāṭha: yāḥ | indra | bhujaḥ | ā | abharaḥ | svaḥ-vān | asurebhyaḥ || stotāram | it | magha-van | asya | vardhaya | ye | ca | tve iti | vr̥kta-barhiṣaḥ ||8.97.1||

IAST: yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvaṁ gām bhāgam avyayam
Griffith: Thou who subduedst Ayu, Kutsa, Atithigva, waxing daily in thy might,
pada pāṭha: yam | indra | dadhiṣe | tvam | aśvam | gām | bhāgam | avyayam || yajamāne | sunvati | dakṣiṇā-vati | tasmin | tam | dhehi | mā | paṇau ||8.97.2||

IAST: yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin taṁ dhehi mā paṇau
Griffith: As such, rousing thy power, we invocate thee now, thee Satakratu, Lord of Bays.
Devanāgarī: यजमाने सुन्वति दक्षिणावति तस्मिन्तं धेहि मा पणौ
pada pāṭha: yam | indra | dadhiṣe | tvam | aśvam | gām | bhāgam | avyayam || yajamāne | sunvati | dakṣiṇā-vati | tasmin | tam | dhehi | mā | paṇau ||8.97.2||

IAST: ya indra sasty avrato 'nuṣvāpam adevayuḥ
Griffith: The pressing-stones shall pour for us the essence of the meath of all,
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | indra | sasti | avrataḥ | anu-svāpam | adeva-yuḥ || svaiḥ | saḥ | evaiḥ | mumurat | poṣyam | rayim | sanutaḥ | dhehi | tam | tataḥ ||8.97.3||

IAST: svaiḥ ṣa evair mumurat poṣyaṁ rayiṁ sanutar dhehi taṁ tataḥ
Griffith: Drops that have been pressed out afar among the folk, and those that have been pressed near us.
Devanāgarī: स्वैः ष एवैर्मुमुरत्पोष्यं रयिं सनुतर्धेहि तं ततः
pada pāṭha: yaḥ | indra | sasti | avrataḥ | anu-svāpam | adeva-yuḥ || svaiḥ | saḥ | evaiḥ | mumurat | poṣyam | rayim | sanutaḥ | dhehi | tam | tataḥ ||8.97.3||

IAST: yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan
Griffith: Repel all enmities and keep thern far away: let all win treasure for their own.
pada pāṭha: yat | śakra | asi | parā-vati | yat | arvā-vati | vr̥tra-han || ataḥ | tvā | gīḥ-bhiḥ | dyu-gat | indra | keśi-bhiḥ | suta-vān | ā | vivāsati ||8.97.4||

IAST: atas tvā gīrbhir dyugad indra keśibhiḥ sutāvām̐ ā vivāsati
Griffith: Even among Sistas are the stalks that make thee glad, where thou with Soma satest thee.
Devanāgarī: अतस्त्वा गीर्भिर्द्युगदिन्द्र केशिभिः सुतावाँ आ विवासति
pada pāṭha: yat | śakra | asi | parā-vati | yat | arvā-vati | vr̥tra-han || ataḥ | tvā | gīḥ-bhiḥ | dyu-gat | indra | keśi-bhiḥ | suta-vān | ā | vivāsati ||8.97.4||

IAST: yad vāsi rocane divaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi
Griffith: Come, Indra, very near to us with aids of firmly-based resolve;
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | asi | rocane | divaḥ | samudrasya | adhi | viṣṭapi || yat | pārthive | sadane | vr̥trahan-tama | yat | antarikṣe | ā | gahi ||8.97.5||

IAST: yat pārthive sadane vṛtrahantama yad antarikṣa ā gahi
Griffith: Come, most auspicious, with thy most auspicious help, good Kinsman, with good kinsmen, come!
Devanāgarī: यत्पार्थिवे सदने वृत्रहन्तम यदन्तरिक्ष आ गहि
pada pāṭha: yat | vā | asi | rocane | divaḥ | samudrasya | adhi | viṣṭapi || yat | pārthive | sadane | vr̥trahan-tama | yat | antarikṣe | ā | gahi ||8.97.5||

IAST: sa naḥ someṣu somapāḥ suteṣu śavasas pate
Griffith: Bless thou with progeny the chief of men, the lord of heroes, victor in the fray.
Devanāgarī: स नः सोमेषु सोमपाः सुतेषु शवसस्पते
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | someṣu | soma-pāḥ | suteṣu | śavasaḥ | pate || mādayasva | rādhasā | sūnr̥tā-vatā | indra | rāyā | parīṇasā ||8.97.6||

IAST: mādayasva rādhasā sūnṛtāvatendra rāyā parīṇasā
Griffith: Aid with thy powers the men who sing thee lauds and keep their spirits ever pure and bright.
pada pāṭha: saḥ | naḥ | someṣu | soma-pāḥ | suteṣu | śavasaḥ | pate || mādayasva | rādhasā | sūnr̥tā-vatā | indra | rāyā | parīṇasā ||8.97.6||

IAST: mā na indra parā vṛṇag bhavā naḥ sadhamādyaḥ
Griffith: May we be such in battle as are surest to obtain thy grace:
Devanāgarī: मा न इन्द्र परा वृणग्भवा नः सधमाद्यः
pada pāṭha: mā | naḥ | indra | parā | vr̥ṇak | bhava | naḥ | sadha-mādyaḥ || tvam | naḥ | ūtī | tvam | it | naḥ | āpyam | mā | naḥ | indra | parā | vr̥ṇak ||8.97.7||

IAST: tvaṁ na ūtī tvam in na āpyam mā na indra parā vṛṇak
Griffith: With holy offerings and invocations of the Gods, we mean, that we may win the spoil.
Devanāgarī: त्वं न ऊती त्वमिन्न आप्यं मा न इन्द्र परा वृणक्
pada pāṭha: mā | naḥ | indra | parā | vr̥ṇak | bhava | naḥ | sadha-mādyaḥ || tvam | naḥ | ūtī | tvam | it | naḥ | āpyam | mā | naḥ | indra | parā | vr̥ṇak ||8.97.7||

IAST: asme indra sacā sute ni ṣadā pītaye madhu
Griffith: Thine, Lord of Bays, am I. Prayer longeth for the spoil. Still with thy help I seek the fight.
Devanāgarī: अस्मे इन्द्र सचा सुते नि षदा पीतये मधु
pada pāṭha: asme iti | indra | sacā | sute | ni | sada | pītaye | madhu || kr̥dhi | jaritre | magha-van | avaḥ | mahat | asme iti | indra | sacā | sute ||8.97.8||

IAST: kṛdhī jaritre maghavann avo mahad asme indra sacā sute
Griffith: So, at the raiders' head, I, craving steeds and kine, unite myself with thee alone.
Devanāgarī: कृधी जरित्रे मघवन्नवो महदस्मे इन्द्र सचा सुते
pada pāṭha: asme iti | indra | sacā | sute | ni | sada | pītaye | madhu || kr̥dhi | jaritre | magha-van | avaḥ | mahat | asme iti | indra | sacā | sute ||8.97.8||

IAST: na tvā devāsa āśata na martyāso adrivaḥ
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: न त्वा देवास आशत न मर्त्यासो अद्रिवः
pada pāṭha: na | tvā | devāsaḥ | āśata | na | martyāsaḥ | adri-vaḥ || viśvā | jātāni | śavasā | abhi-bhūḥ | asi | na | tvā | devāsaḥ | āśata ||8.97.9||

IAST: viśvā jātāni śavasābhibhūr asi na tvā devāsa āśata
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: विश्वा जातानि शवसाभिभूरसि न त्वा देवास आशत
pada pāṭha: na | tvā | devāsaḥ | āśata | na | martyāsaḥ | adri-vaḥ || viśvā | jātāni | śavasā | abhi-bhūḥ | asi | na | tvā | devāsaḥ | āśata ||8.97.9||

IAST: viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhibhūtaraṁ naraṁ sajūs tatakṣur indraṁ jajanuś ca rājase
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: विश्वाः पृतना अभिभूतरं नरं सजूस्ततक्षुरिन्द्रं जजनुश्च राजसे
pada pāṭha: viśvāḥ | pr̥tanāḥ | abhi-bhūtaram | naram | sa-jūḥ | tatakṣuḥ | indram | jajanuḥ | ca | rājase || kratvā | variṣṭham | vare | ā-murim | uta | ugram | ojiṣṭham | tavasam | tarasvinam ||8.97.10||

IAST: kratvā variṣṭhaṁ vara āmurim utogram ojiṣṭhaṁ tavasaṁ tarasvinam
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: क्रत्वा वरिष्ठं वर आमुरिमुतोग्रमोजिष्ठं तवसं तरस्विनम्
pada pāṭha: viśvāḥ | pr̥tanāḥ | abhi-bhūtaram | naram | sa-jūḥ | tatakṣuḥ | indram | jajanuḥ | ca | rājase || kratvā | variṣṭham | vare | ā-murim | uta | ugram | ojiṣṭham | tavasam | tarasvinam ||8.97.10||

IAST: sam īṁ rebhāso asvarann indraṁ somasya pītaye
Griffith: Not Available
pada pāṭha: sam | īm | rebhāsaḥ | asvaran | indram | somasya | pītaye || svaḥ-patim | yat | īm | vr̥dhe | dhr̥ta-vrataḥ | hi | ojasā | sam | ūti-bhiḥ ||8.97.11||

IAST: svarpatiṁ yad īṁ vṛdhe dhṛtavrato hy ojasā sam ūtibhiḥ
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: स्वर्पतिं यदीं वृधे धृतव्रतो ह्योजसा समूतिभिः
pada pāṭha: sam | īm | rebhāsaḥ | asvaran | indram | somasya | pītaye || svaḥ-patim | yat | īm | vr̥dhe | dhr̥ta-vrataḥ | hi | ojasā | sam | ūti-bhiḥ ||8.97.11||

IAST: nemiṁ namanti cakṣasā meṣaṁ viprā abhisvarā
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: नेमिं नमन्ति चक्षसा मेषं विप्रा अभिस्वरा
pada pāṭha: nemim | namanti | cakṣasā | meṣam | viprāḥ | abhi-svarā || su-dītayaḥ | vaḥ | adruhaḥ | api | karṇe | tarasvinaḥ | sam | r̥kva-bhiḥ ||8.97.12||

IAST: sudītayo vo adruho 'pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: सुदीतयो वो अद्रुहोऽपि कर्णे तरस्विनः समृक्वभिः
pada pāṭha: nemim | namanti | cakṣasā | meṣam | viprāḥ | abhi-svarā || su-dītayaḥ | vaḥ | adruhaḥ | api | karṇe | tarasvinaḥ | sam | r̥kva-bhiḥ ||8.97.12||

IAST: tam indraṁ johavīmi maghavānam ugraṁ satrā dadhānam apratiṣkutaṁ śavāṁsi
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: तमिन्द्रं जोहवीमि मघवानमुग्रं सत्रा दधानमप्रतिष्कुतं शवांसि
pada pāṭha: tam | indram | johavīmi | magha-vānam | ugram | satrā | dadhānam | aprati-skutam | śavāṁsi || maṁhiṣṭhaḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | ā | ca | yajñiyaḥ | vavartat | rāye | naḥ | viśvā | su-pathā | kr̥ṇotu | vajrī ||8.97.13||

IAST: maṁhiṣṭho gīrbhir ā ca yajñiyo vavartad rāye no viśvā supathā kṛṇotu vajrī
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: मंहिष्ठो गीर्भिरा च यज्ञियो ववर्तद्राये नो विश्वा सुपथा कृणोतु वज्री
pada pāṭha: tam | indram | johavīmi | magha-vānam | ugram | satrā | dadhānam | aprati-skutam | śavāṁsi || maṁhiṣṭhaḥ | gīḥ-bhiḥ | ā | ca | yajñiyaḥ | vavartat | rāye | naḥ | viśvā | su-pathā | kr̥ṇotu | vajrī ||8.97.13||

IAST: tvam pura indra cikid enā vy ojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: त्वं पुर इन्द्र चिकिदेना व्योजसा शविष्ठ शक्र नाशयध्यै
pada pāṭha: tvam | puraḥ | indra | cikit | enāḥ | vi | ojasā | śaviṣṭha | śakra | nāśayadhyai || tvat | viśvāni | bhuvanāni | vajrin | dyāvā | rejete iti | pr̥thivī iti | ca | bhīṣā ||8.97.14||

IAST: tvad viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: त्वद्विश्वानि भुवनानि वज्रिन्द्यावा रेजेते पृथिवी च भीषा
pada pāṭha: tvam | puraḥ | indra | cikit | enāḥ | vi | ojasā | śaviṣṭha | śakra | nāśayadhyai || tvat | viśvāni | bhuvanāni | vajrin | dyāvā | rejete iti | pr̥thivī iti | ca | bhīṣā ||8.97.14||

IAST: tan ma ṛtam indra śūra citra pātv apo na vajrin duritāti parṣi bhūri
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: तन्म ऋतमिन्द्र शूर चित्र पात्वपो न वज्रिन्दुरिताति पर्षि भूरि
pada pāṭha: tat | mā | r̥tam | indra | śūra | citra | pātu | apaḥ | na | vajrin | duḥ-itā | ati | parṣi | bhūri || kadā | naḥ | indra | rāyaḥ | ā | daśasyeḥ | viśva-psnyasya | spr̥hayāyyasya | rājan ||8.97.15||

IAST: kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyer viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: कदा न इन्द्र राय आ दशस्येर्विश्वप्स्न्यस्य स्पृहयाय्यस्य राजन्
pada pāṭha: tat | mā | r̥tam | indra | śūra | citra | pātu | apaḥ | na | vajrin | duḥ-itā | ati | parṣi | bhūri || kadā | naḥ | indra | rāyaḥ | ā | daśasyeḥ | viśva-psnyasya | spr̥hayāyyasya | rājan ||8.97.15||

IAST: indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat
Griffith: INDRA, the poets with. their hymns extol this hero might of thine:
Devanāgarī: इन्द्राय साम गायत विप्राय बृहते बृहत्
pada pāṭha: indrāya | sāma | gāyata | viprāya | br̥hate | br̥hat || dharma-kr̥te | vipaḥ-cite | panasyave ||8.98.1||

IAST: dharmakṛte vipaścite panasyave
Griffith: They strengthened, loud in song, thy power that droppeth oil. With hymns the Pauras came to thee.
pada pāṭha: indrāya | sāma | gāyata | viprāya | br̥hate | br̥hat || dharma-kr̥te | vipaḥ-cite | panasyave ||8.98.1||

IAST: tvam indrābhibhūr asi tvaṁ sūryam arocayaḥ
Griffith: Through piety they came to Indra for his aid, they whose libations give theejoy.
pada pāṭha: tvam | indra | abhi-bhūḥ | asi | tvam | sūryam | arocayaḥ || viśva-karmā | viśva-devaḥ | mahān | asi ||8.98.2||

IAST: viśvakarmā viśvadevo mahām̐ asi
Griffith: As thou with, Krsa and Samvarta hast rejoiced, so, Indra, be thou glad with us.
pada pāṭha: tvam | indra | abhi-bhūḥ | asi | tvam | sūryam | arocayaḥ || viśva-karmā | viśva-devaḥ | mahān | asi ||8.98.2||

IAST: vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṁ divaḥ
Griffith: Agreeing in your spirit, all ye Deities, come nigh to us.
pada pāṭha: vi-bhrājan | jyotiṣā | svaḥ | agacchaḥ | rocanam | divaḥ || devāḥ | te | indra | sakhyāya | yemire ||8.98.3||

IAST: devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire
Griffith: Vasus and Rudras shall come near to give us aid, and Maruts listen to our call.
pada pāṭha: vi-bhrājan | jyotiṣā | svaḥ | agacchaḥ | rocanam | divaḥ || devāḥ | te | indra | sakhyāya | yemire ||8.98.3||

IAST: endra no gadhi priyaḥ satrājid agohyaḥ
Griffith: May Pusan, Visnu, and Sarasvati befriend, and the Seven Streams, this call of mine:
pada pāṭha: ā | indra | naḥ | gadhi | priyaḥ | satrā-jit | agohyaḥ || giriḥ | na | viśvataḥ | pr̥thuḥ | patiḥ | divaḥ ||8.98.4||

IAST: girir na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patir divaḥ
Griffith: May Waters, Wind, the Mountains, and the Forest-Lord, and Earth give ear unto my cry.
pada pāṭha: ā | indra | naḥ | gadhi | priyaḥ | satrā-jit | agohyaḥ || giriḥ | na | viśvataḥ | pr̥thuḥ | patiḥ | divaḥ ||8.98.4||

IAST: abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī
Griffith: Indra, with thine own bounteous gift, most liberal of the Mighty Ones,
Devanāgarī: अभि हि सत्य सोमपा उभे बभूथ रोदसी
pada pāṭha: abhi | hi | satya | soma-pāḥ | ubhe iti | babhūtha | rodasī iti || indra | asi | sunvataḥ | vr̥dhaḥ | patiḥ | divaḥ ||8.98.5||

IAST: indrāsi sunvato vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ
Griffith: Be our boon benefactor, Vrtra-slayer, be our feast-companion for our weal.
pada pāṭha: abhi | hi | satya | soma-pāḥ | ubhe iti | babhūtha | rodasī iti || indra | asi | sunvataḥ | vr̥dhaḥ | patiḥ | divaḥ ||8.98.5||

IAST: tvaṁ hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi
Griffith: Leader of heroes, Lord of battle, lead thou us to combat, thou Most Sapient One.
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | śaśvatīnām | indra | dartā | purām | asi || hantā | dasyoḥ | manoḥ | vr̥dhaḥ | patiḥ | divaḥ ||8.98.6||

IAST: hantā dasyor manor vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ
Griffith: High fame is theirs who win by invocations, feasts and entertainment of the Gods.
pada pāṭha: tvam | hi | śaśvatīnām | indra | dartā | purām | asi || hantā | dasyoḥ | manoḥ | vr̥dhaḥ | patiḥ | divaḥ ||8.98.6||

IAST: adhā hīndra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe
Griffith: Our hopes rest on the Faithful One: in Indra is the people's life.
Devanāgarī: अधा हीन्द्र गिर्वण उप त्वा कामान्महः ससृज्महे
pada pāṭha: adha | hi | indra | girvaṇaḥ | upa | tvā | kāmān | mahaḥ | sasr̥jmahe || udā-iva | yantaḥ | uda-bhiḥ ||8.98.7||

IAST: udeva yanta udabhiḥ
Griffith: O Maghavan, come nigh that thou mayst give us aid: make plenteous food stream forth for us.
pada pāṭha: adha | hi | indra | girvaṇaḥ | upa | tvā | kāmān | mahaḥ | sasr̥jmahe || udā-iva | yantaḥ | uda-bhiḥ ||8.98.7||

IAST: vār ṇa tvā yavyābhir vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi
Griffith: Thee would we worship, Indra, with our songs of praise: O Satakratu, be thou ours.
pada pāṭha: vāḥ | na | tvā | yavyābhiḥ | vardhanti | śūra | brahmāṇi || vavr̥dhvāṁsam | cit | adri-vaḥ | dive-dive ||8.98.8||

IAST: vāvṛdhvāṁsaṁ cid adrivo dive-dive
Griffith: Pour down upon Praskanva bounty vast and firm, exuberant, that shall never fail.
pada pāṭha: vāḥ | na | tvā | yavyābhiḥ | vardhanti | śūra | brahmāṇi || vavr̥dhvāṁsam | cit | adri-vaḥ | dive-dive ||8.98.8||

IAST: yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge
Griffith: Not Available
Devanāgarī: युञ्जन्ति हरी इषिरस्य गाथयोरौ रथ उरुयुगे
pada pāṭha: yuñjanti | harī iti | iṣirasya | gāthayā | urau | rathe | uru-yuge || indra-vāhā | vacaḥ-yujā ||8.98.9||
